LUA_MENU_MP_PURCHASE_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to purchase ^3&&1 ^7for ^3&&2 ^7teeth?
LUA_MENU_MP_PUCRCHASE_DENIED: Access Denied! You need ^3&&1 ^7teeth to purchase this upgrade.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_SPECIALIST_DESC: The Specialist has an adrenaline rush, greatly increasing damage done and keeping his clips completely topped off.  Nearby allies also receive a modest damage boost.  The skill is activated by double tapping  and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_SPECIALIST_DESC_PC: The Specialist has an adrenaline rush, greatly increasing damage done and keeping his clips completely topped off.  Nearby allies also receive a modest damage boost.  The skill is activated by double tapping ^3[{+actionslot 5}]^7 and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_TANK_DESC: All Cryptids begin attacking the Tank, who is now invulnerable and able to stun enemies with melee attacks.  The skill is activated by double tapping  and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_TANK_DESC_PC: All Cryptids begin attacking the Tank, who is now invulnerable and able to stun enemies with melee attacks.  The skill is activated by double tapping ^3[{+actionslot 5}]^7 and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_ENGINEER_DESC: The Engineer lays down a Stasis Field that both protects from Scorpion and Seeder attacks and creates a safe zone that Cryptids will not enter.  The skill is activated by double tapping  and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_ENGINEER_DESC_PC: The Engineer lays down a Stasis Field that both protects from Scorpion and Seeder attacks and creates a safe zone that Cryptids will not enter. The skill is activated by double tapping ^3[{+actionslot 5}]^7 and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_MEDIC_DESC: The Medic is surrounded by a therapeutic energy field.  Allies inside the field are healed or revived from last stand. The skill is activated by double tapping  and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_MEDIC_DESC_PC: The Medic is surrounded by a therapeutic energy field.  Allies inside the field are healed or revived from last stand. The skill is activated by double tapping ^3[{+actionslot 5}]^7 and becomes more potent with each rank purchased in-game.
LUA_MENU_MP_ARMORY_SUBTEXT: Open Supply drops and view your weapons inventory
LUA_MENU_MP_ARMORY_DESC:
Spend Teeth in the Armory to purchase upgrades for classes and equipment.

Earn Teeth by Completing Extinction missions. Bonus Teeth are awarded for using relics, playing in Hardcore mode, or helping other players complete a mission for the first time.

Tip: You can also earn teeth by killing hundreds of cryptids.
LUA_MENU_MP_INFECTED_TACTICAL: Leave this slot empty to give the infected a ^3Tactical Insertion^7.
LUA_MENU_MP_INFECTED_SELECT_TACTICAL: Extra Tactical will not give the infected another ^3Tactical Insertion^7.
LUA_MENU_MP_WEAPON_PERSONALIZE_ACCESSORY: You cannot apply accessories to launchers or melee weapons.
LUA_MENU_MP_SIEGE_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Reinforce game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_SIEGE_DESC: Capture points to revive fallen teammates.  Taking all points will win the round.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_FREE_SKILL_POINTS_DE: Start each game with an extra Skill Point.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_DAMAGE_BOOSTER_DESC: Increases the damage of all attacks by 5%.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_SENTRY_HEALTH_DESC: Sentry Guns you place can sustain more damage.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_STUN_ARMOR_DESC: With armor equipped, this will periodically stun attackers.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_ARMOR_PIERCING_DESC: Armor Piercing Ammo will inflict increased damage when impacting a Cryptid's armored head plate.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_HYPNO_RHINO_DESC: With this upgrade, players who use a hypno-knife on a Rhino can turn him into a valuable ally.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_RIOTSHIELD_DESC: A stowed Riot Shield will burn enemies while blocking attacks from the rear.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_FAST_REVIVE_DESC: Shortens the time it takes for you to get revived.
LUA_MENU_MP_MOTD_VOTING_INSTRUCTIONS: Press RIGHT or LEFT to vote for your favorite!
LUA_MENU_MP_OPS_WEAPONS_DESC: Challenges related to your selected weapon.
LUA_MENU_MP_MOTD_DOWNLOAD_PURCHASED_DLC: Your Season Pass grants you access to the following map packs. Head to the store to download them free of charge:
LUA_MENU_MP_FOV_OPTION_SUB: Setting FOV above 65 may result in lower framerate and some graphical issues.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_LOCKER_KEY_DESC: Start with a Locker Key on missions with lockers.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_INCENDIARY_AMMO_DESC: Incendiary Ammo does more total damage.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_MINION_PROTECTION_DE: Take less damage from exploding Seekers and Bombers.
LUA_MENU_MP_WEAPTYPE_KNIFE_FAST_DESC: Gold plated combat knife with ^3Fast Melee^7. Unlocked at ^;Prestige 5^7.
LUA_MENU_MP_WEAPTYPE_GL_PROX_DESC: Grenade Launcher with explode on impact projectiles.
LUA_MENU_MP_WEAPTYPE_PDW_AUTO_DESC: Gold plated PDW with ^3Automatic Fire^7. Unlocked at ^;Prestige 10^7.
LUA_MENU_MP_CUSTOMIZATION_DOG_WARNING: Selection will apply across all loadouts and squad members.
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_OVERWRITE_WARNING: This will overwrite your current loadout. Are you sure you wish to continue?
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_TYPE_DESC_TRACKED: Modify current loadout to work towards your tracked operations
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_TYPE_DESC_PROGRESSED: Focus this loadout on operations that are close to completion
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_TYPE_DESC_MOST: Augment this loadout to work on the most number of operations
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_TYPE_DESC_RANDOM: Randomize your loadout. Are you crazy enough?
LUA_MENU_MP_NEED_REQUIRED_DLC: In order to play online, you need to download new required content. This content is free. Would you like to add it to your download queue?
LUA_MENU_MP_DOWNLOADING_REQUIRED_DLC: The required content has been added to your Active Downloads. This content is free and is required to access Multiplayer. This message will be dismissed when the download is complete.
LUA_MENU_MP_SIGNIN_REQUIRED_DLC: In order to play multiplayer, you need to sign in to a profile. Would you like to sign in to a profile?
LUA_MENU_MP_LIVE_SIGNIN_REQUIRED_DLC: In order to play multiplayer, you need to download new required content. This content is free. You must be connected to Xbox Live in order to download this content. Would you like to sign in to Xbox Live?
LUA_MENU_MP_ERROR_REQUIRED_DLC: There was an error adding required content to the Active Downloads. The required content may already be in the Active Downloads or the download failed to complete. Would you like to attempt to add the required content your download queue again?
LUA_MENU_MP_ERROR_FULL_REQUIRED_DLC: The download of required content could not be completed because the disk is full. In order to play online, you need to download the new required content. This content is free. Would you like to attempt to add the required content your download queue again?
LUA_MENU_MP_ERROR_CANCEL_REQUIRED_DLC: The download of required content was cancelled. In order to play online, you need to download the new required content. This content is free. Would you like to add it to your download queue?
LUA_MENU_MP_ERROR_CORRUPT_REQUIRED_DLC: A downloadable content package was not loaded because it was missing or damaged. In order to play online, you need to download new required content. This content is free. Would you like to add it to your download queue?
LUA_MENU_MP_SQUADS_DLC_DESC_2: Play Safeguard and Wargame on ^3Devastation^7 Maps. Exclusively for players that own DLC: Devastation
LUA_MENU_MP_SQUADS_DLC_DESC_3: Play Safeguard and Wargame on ^3Invasion^7 Maps. Exclusively for players that own DLC: Invasion
LUA_MENU_MP_SQUADS_DLC_DESC_4: Play Safeguard and Wargame on ^3Nemesis^7 Maps. Exclusively for players that own DLC: Nemesis
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_NO_OP_PROGRESS: You do not have any operations that are close to completion. Your loadout was not modified.
LUA_MENU_MP_LB_NO_TRACKED_OPS: You do not have any items that work towards your tracked operations. Your loadout was not modified.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARDS_POC: Leaderboards for the Point of Contact episode.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_POC: Chaos Mode leaderboards for the Point of Contact map.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_NIGHT: Chaos Mode leaderboards for the Nightfall map.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_MAYDA: Chaos Mode leaderboards for the Mayday map.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_POC_C: Point of Contact - Co-Op Chaos Mode Leaderboard.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_POC_S: Point of Contact - Solo Chaos Mode Leaderboard.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_IMS_FIRE_DESC: When equipped, the I.M.S. explosions will leave lingering fire pools.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_KEEP_ATTACHMENTS_DES: Attachments transfer if they are valid for the new weapon.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_IMS_GRACE_DESC: Shortens the time it takes the I.M.S. to detect nearby enemies.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_NO_SNARE_DESC: With this upgrade, Hunter and Seeker Cryptids will no longer snare players with their attacks.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_MAGNUM_ACOG_DESC: Magnum pistols will have an ACOG equipped.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_DLC3: Chaos Mode leaderboards for the Awakening map.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_ARK_PISTOL_DESC: Replaces the Muzzle Brake on your upgraded pistol with the Ark attachment.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_VULTURE_DESC: Extends the duration of the Vulture and increases the frequency of the +4 Vulture firing incendiary rockets.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_SKILLS_COOLDOWN_UPGR: Lessens the cooldown time between uses of the Class Upgrades.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_MASTER_SCAVENGER_DES: Scavenge unique items such as Extended Mags and the Ark attachment as well as more powerful Hypno Knives and Flares.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_MULTICLASS_DESC:
Choose any two Classes with this upgrade. 

Note: Skill Points will be applied to both classes when applied in game.
LUA_MENU_MP_EGGSTRA_UNLOCK: Find and shoot all the hidden eggs in DLC maps.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_COMBINED_AMMO_DESC: This special ammo has the combined firepower of all of the existing ammo types.
LUA_MENU_MP_X1_LOW_REP_WARNING:
Due to continued negative feedback from the community, your reputation has fallen to Avoid Me. Until your conduct improves, you'll only be matched with low reputation players. Due to the limited population of low reputation players, you may have difficulty finding available online matches.

For more information on reputation visit http://enforcement.xbox.com/Home/Reputation
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_STUN_AMMO_DESC: Stun Ammo will arc electricity from one Cryptid to another in close proximity.  The amount of times it arcs is dependent on the upgrade level of the player's Stun Ammo.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESC_LEADERBOARD_CHAOS_LAST: Chaos Mode leaderboards for the Exodus map.
LUA_MENU_MP_RESET_STATS_DESC: Reset your Stats, Rank and Prestige levels. Requires Max Prestige to reset.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_SHOCK_MELEE_DESC: Electrically charges the knife so that a successful melee will arc electricity to nearby Cryptids, stunning them.  The Electric Knife has a recharge time of 4 seconds.
LUA_MENU_MP_UPGRADE_SNIPER_SOFT_DESC: Sniper Rifle hits are always critical and kills will earn more cash.
LUA_MENU_MP_ASSAULT_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Assault game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_ASSAULT_DESC: Attackers attack bomb site. Defenders defend!
LUA_MENU_MP_HONORS_DESC: Look through your collection of Honors
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_SNIPER:
^3Movement:^7 Double Jump
^3Affinity:^7 Unlimited hold breath with ^6Sniper Rifles^7
^3Trait^7: Damaging an enemy highlights them briefly
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_ASSAULT:
^3Movement:^7 Thrust Jump
^3Battle Slide^7: Slide damages, and knocks back enemies.
^3Active-Reload^7: Press ^3[{+activate}]^7 during reload at the correct time for faster health regen for a short time.
^3Affinity:^7 Increased stability with ^6Assault Rifles^7
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_HEAVY:
^3Movement:^7 Damaging Thrust Jump
^3Ground Pound^7: While in the air, press ^3[{+stance}]^7 for a smashing ground attack.
^3Affinity:^7 Reduced damage flinch when using ^6Light Machine Guns^7
^3Health:^7 High
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_SCOUT:
^3Movement:^7 Double Jump
^3Dodge^7: Press [{+sprint}] in any direction to quickly dodge.
^3Affinity:^7 Instant fire after sprint with ^6Shotguns^7
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_FTL:
^3Movement:^7 Thrust Jump
^3Perception^7: Your VISOR glows when enemies are sighting you.
^3Phase Slash^7: Meleeing an enemy causes energy explosion.
^3Affinity:^7 Constant spread when hip firing ^6Submachine Guns^7
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_OPERATOR:
^3Movement:^7 Thrust Jump
^3Personal Trophy^7: Built-in trophy denies projectiles. 15 second recharge.
^3Affinity:^7 Additional bullet when using ^6Launchers^7
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_TECHNICIAN:
^3Weapons:^7   Beam, Pistols, Shotguns
^3Movement:^7 Double Jump
^3Regen Pack^7: Drop a pack on kill that gives teammates a temporary health regen boost.
^3Boost Ammo^7: Temporarily upgrade structures when shooting them.
^3Recharge Kit^7: Naturally recharges the scorestreak meter over time.
^3Affinity:^7 Bonus with ^6Weapon Class^7
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_DESC_DEMO:
^3Weapons:^7 Shotguns
^3Movement:^7 Amped Double Jump
^3Blast Shield^7: Reduced damage taken from explosives. 
^3Martyrdom^7: Drop a grenade on death.
^3Explosive Jump^7: Double jump does explosive area damage.
^3Affinity:^7 Bonus with ^6weapon class^7
LUA_MENU_MP_JACKAL_ASS_DESC: Weaken the enemy ship defenses, breach the ship, and rescue the hostages
LUA_MENU_MP_WEAPTYPE_BEAM_FORGE_DESC: Plasma based beam weapon rifle, with integrated heat meter.
LUA_MENU_MP_WEAPTYPE_BEAM_DESC: Constant energy weapons with auto tracking.
LUA_MENU_MP_LAVA_DESC: Eliminate enemies while avoiding the ground
LUA_MENU_MP_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on The Floor Is Lava game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_LAVA_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on The Floor is Lava game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_ZOMBIES_DESC: Kill zombies and kill more zombies.
LUA_MENU_MP_CONSUMABLES_DESC:
Serums are single match upgrades that can greatly enhance a  subject's abilities.

Up to three can be used per game, and once used they are removed from the inventory.
LUA_MENU_MP_HEALTH_BAR: [ H E A L T H ]
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_SHORT_DESC_SNIPER: Phantom Class battle rig: Specializes in concealment and long-range engagements.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_SHORT_DESC_ASSAULT: Assault Class battle rig: Outfitted for operating in a variety of situations.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_SHORT_DESC_HEAVY: Merc Class battle rig: Focused on heavy defense and suppressive fire.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_SHORT_DESC_SYNAPTIC: C6 Class remote operated robot: Optimized for speed and close quarters combat.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_SHORT_DESC_FTL: Prototype FTL Class battle rig: Utilizes bleeding edge technology to ensure combat advantage.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUIT_SHORT_DESC_OPERATOR: Stryker Class battle rig: Equipped with gear for area control and squad support.
LUA_MENU_MP_POINTS_MAXED_OUT:
You don't have enough points to equip that item.

Would you like to return to Create a Solider to remove an item?
LUA_MENU_MP_FRONTIER_DESC: UNSA Space station orbiting Neptune. A tight combat space where keeping mobile is everything.
LUA_MENU_MP_PARKOUR_DESC: Maximum security penitentiary located on a snowy mountain top. Long engagements are supported by tight bottlenecks.
LUA_MENU_MP_QUARRY_DESC: Support the Mars war effort! A medium-sized SDF munitions factory on the outer edges of Mars that accommodates a variety of play styles.
LUA_MENU_MP_DIVIDE_DESC: Scalding hot mining facility on the surface of an asteroid. Lots of cover and straight up engagements in this mid-sized map.
LUA_MENU_MP_RIOT_DESC: A classic-style map set in ravaged Geneva during the thick of the SDF invasion.
LUA_MENU_MP_DESERT_DESC: A doomed SDF Destroyer, crashed on the edge of a methane lake on Titan. Mid-sized battleground with medium and close-ranged combat.
LUA_MENU_MP_METROPOLIS_DESC: Progressive Shibuya Japan in the early stages of the SDF invasion. Circular flow and open streets give an intense overall pace.
LUA_MENU_MP_PROTO_DESC: Multi-lane research facility atop the icy tundra of Jupiter's moon Europa.
LUA_MENU_MP_FALLEN_DESC: Fight in a variety of spaces and engagements in a 1950s style main street USA locale located on a giant torus-shaped space station.
LUA_MENU_MP_PRIME_DESC: Noir is a grim look at a futuristic Brooklyn that is under heavy curfew. It's a circular 3 lane map that allows a slower pace along the outside lanes, or complete war in the center space.
LUA_MENU_MP_SARATOGA_DESC: Saratoga takes place on board a crashing SDF space ship.
LUA_MENU_MP_SKYWAY_DESC: Re-imagined version of the classic MW2 map located on the moon. Control the power positions for fierce encounters.
LUA_MENU_MP_HARDPOINT_DESC: Capture and hold the zone to earn points for your team.
LUA_MENU_MP_HARDPOINT_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Hardpoint game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_MP_ZOMBIES_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Contagion game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_UPLINK_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Blitz game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_UPLINK_DESC: Upload the satellite drone into the enemy Uplink Station.
LUA_MENU_MP_DEMOLITION_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Demolition game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_DEMOLITION_DESC: Teams alternate in attacking and defending two bomb sites, both of which must be destroyed by the attacking team equipped with bombs.
LUA_MENU_MP_CTF_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the CTF game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_CTF_DESC: Get the enemy flag and return it to your base.
LUA_MENU_MP_RIVET_DESC: Both spacious sightlines and tight combat in a floating SDF shipyard orbiting Mars.
LUA_MENU_MP_BREAKNECK_DESC: A small and intense map that takes place in a derelict UNSA ship that is teetering at the edge of a black hole.
LUA_MENU_MP_LOADOUT_SELECT_OVERKILL_DESC: Take a primary weapon as your secondary weapon.
LUA_MENU_MP_TDEF_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Defender game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_TDEF_DESC: Capture the drone and hold it to upload data and earn points for your team.
LUA_MENU_MP_FRONTLINE_DESC: You always spawn at your base. Use teamwork to eliminate players on the opposing team. The first team to reach the score limit wins.
LUA_MENU_MP_FRONTLINE_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Frontline game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_ENOUGH_CRYPTOKEYS: You have earned enough Keys to purchase &&1 &&2s.
LUA_MENU_MP_DIALOG_DESC: If disabled, mutes dialogue spoken by Multiplayer Rigs. Does not affect callouts for gameplay.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_TACTICAL_D: Equip an additional Tactical charge in your loadout.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_LETHAL_DES: Equip an additional Lethal charge in your loadout.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUPPLY_DROP_NO: You do not have enough Keys to purchase this Supply Drop.
LUA_MENU_MP_SUPPLY_DROP_ERROR: There was an error while purchasing your Supply Drop.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_PERK_1_DES: Equip an additional Perk 1 in your loadout.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_PERK_2_DES: Equip an additional Perk 2 in your loadout.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_PERK_3_DES: Equip an additional Perk 3 in your loadout.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_ATTACH_DES: Equip an additional attachment for your Primary weapon.
LUA_MENU_MP_LOSS_STAT_PREVENTED: Loss stat prevented - Joined in progress
LUA_MENU_MP_GESTURE_PH_DESC: Left handed gesture. Press ^3[{+actionslot 7,+actionslot 3}]^7 to use in combat!
LUA_MENU_MP_CHANGE_RIG_NEXT_SPAWN: Your rig will change the next time you spawn.
LUA_MENU_MP_MAX_POINTS_REACHED: You have used the maximum number of points.
LUA_MENU_MP_CANNOT_PLACE_SUPER_TROPHY: Move the Centurion to a valid location.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POINTS_PER_KILL_DESC: The amount of team score awarded for each kill.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POINTS_PER_DEATH_DESC: The amount of team score decremented for each death. Team score cannot go negative.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POINTS_HEADSHOT_BONUS_: The amount of team score awarded for each Headshot kill.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_DOG_TAGS_DESC: Enemies drop dog tags on death for bonus score.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SPAWN_PROTECTION_TIMER: Number of seconds of damage immunity when spawning. Does not prevent environmental death.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_TIME_LIMIT_DESC: The amount of time the match will last if the score limit is not reached.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CODCASTER_DESC: Allows players to choose CODcaster when selecting a team in game.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_NUMBER_OF_LIVES_DESC: Number of times a player can respawn in the current round or match.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_MAX_HEALTH_DESC: The amount of damage a player can take before death.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_HEALTH_REGEN_DESC: After taking damage, the amount of time before a player starts to regenerate health.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SPECTATING_DESC: Which team or players you are allowed to spectate. Free allows free camera movement.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_KILLCAM_DESC: Allows players to see a recording from the perspective of the player who killed them.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_RADAR_ALWAYS_ON_DESC: Constantly sweeps and shows all players on the HUD minimap when enabled.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_RESPAWN_DELAY_DESC: The minimum amount of time before a player is allowed to respawn.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_WAVE_DELAY_DESC: Rolling timer that determines when all currently dead players can respawn.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_FORCE_RESPAWN_DESC: Dead players must manually press [{+activate}] to respawn if disabled.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_FRIENDLY_FIRE_DESC: Allows teammates to inflict damage on each other when enabled.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_FF_PUNISH_LIMIT_DESC: If friendly fire is set to 'Punish': Max allowed team kills before the offending player enables Reflect Damage on themselves.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_PERKS_DESC: Allows players to spawn in with perks.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_HARDCORE_DESC: Hardcore Ruleset: Limited HUD, low health, no health regen, no killcam, friendly fire enabled.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_HEADSHOTS_ONLY_DESC: Headshots and explosives deal lethal damage. All other damage is negated.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CRANKED_TIMER_DESC: You get extra perks and refresh your timer when getting kills and capturing objectives. However, you explode if your timer runs out.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CASUAL_SCORE_STREAKS_D: Progress towards scorestreaks is not reset upon death.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SUPER_FAST_CHARGE_RATE: Multiplier for how fast your payload weapon or ability charges.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ALLOW_DOUBLE_JUMP_DESC: Allows players to use thrusters for advanced movement.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ALLOW_WALL_RUN_DESC: Allows players to use thrusters to run along some surfaces.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ROUND_TIME_LIMIT_DESC: How long each round will last if the score limit is not reached.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SCORE_LIMIT_DESC: The total score required to win the match.
LUA_MENU_MP_ROUND_SCORE_LIMIT_DESC: Total score required to win each round.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_FLAG_CAPTURE_TIME_DESC: Total time required to stay inside the objective to capture it for your team.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_FLAGS_REQUIRED_TO_SCOR: Total zones your team must control to begin scoring.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POINTS_PER_FLAG_DESC: Amount of team score awarded for each owned zone.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_FLAG_NEUTRALIZATION_DE: Allows zones to be neutralized when captured halfway.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BOMB_TIMER_DESC: Amount of time before a planted bomb will detonate.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_PLANT_TIME_DESC: Time required to plant the bomb at a bomb site.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_DEFUSE_TIME_DESC: Time required to defuse a planted bomb.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_MULTI_BOMB_DESC: All players on the attacking team can plant bombs.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SILENT_PLANT_DESC: Planting and defusing is completely silent.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_WIN_LIMIT_DESC: Total rounds required to win the match.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_WIN_BY_TWO_DESC: Teams must be ahead by 2 rounds to win the match. If max Win by two rounds are reached, an overtime round is played.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_WIN_BY_TWO_MAX_ROUNDS_: Total overtime rounds played if neither team is ahead by two rounds.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ROUND_SWITCH_DESC: Rounds played before switching attacker and defender team roles.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_DOG_TAGS_SD_DESC: Enable Search and Rescue rules. Collect friendly dog tags to revive allies. Collect enemy dog tags to prevent enemy respawns.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POINTS_PER_CONFIRM_DES: Amount of team score awarded for collected enemy dog tags.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POINTS_PER_DENY_DESC: Amount of team score awarded for collected friendly dog tags.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_AON_DESC: Fan favorite ruleset: Custom pistol, throwing knife, no starting ammo. Extra perks are gained on kills. You lose all gained perks and ammo on death.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ZONE_LIFETIME_DESC: Amount of time before the zone moves to the next location.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ZONE_ACTIVATION_DELAY_: Amount of time before a new zone can be captured.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_RANDOM_LOCATION_ORDER_: Zones can be set to spawn in a predetermined or random order.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ADDITIVE_SCORING_DESC: Set scoring to a fixed rate, or determined by the number of players on a controlled zone.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_PAUSE_TIME_DESC: Pauses the match timer when the zone is controlled. The timer resumes if the zone is neutral or contested.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CAPTURE_DELAY_PLAYER_D: Players on the team that control the zone have a spawn delay.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_USE_HQ_RULES_DESC: Classic Headquarters ruleset: Once captured, zones constantly score until they are destroyed. The capture team will not respawn until the zone times out or is destroyed by the enemy team.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_TEAM_TIMER_DESC: Amount of time a team can own the drone before it resets.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_IDLE_RESET_TIME_DESC: Amount of time before the objective resets if there is no carrier.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_EXPLODE_ON_EXPIRE_DESC: The drone collapses into a singularity when the drone times out.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ARMOR_MOD_DESC: Amount of additional damage the drone carrier receives. Resets on every possession.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SHOW_ENEMY_CARRIER_DES: How often the enemy drone carrier's location is pinged.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SCORE_TIME_DESC: How often the team score increases while the drone is held.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SCORE_PER_TICK_DESC: Amount of team score added per score time interval.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CARRIER_BONUS_TIME_DES: Amount of time between scorestreak bonus points awarded to the drone carrier.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CARRIER_BONUS_SCORE_DE: Amount of scorestreak points added per carrier bonus time interval.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_DELAY_PLAYER_DESC: Imposes a respawn delay on the team that currently possesses the drone.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SPAWN_DELAY_DESC: Amount of time before affected players can spawn.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SCORE_CARRY_DESC: Amount of team score added when holding the drone and touching the enemy uplink goal.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SCORE_THROW_DESC: Amount of team score awarded for throwing the drone into the enemy uplink goal.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SATELLITE_COUNT_DESC: Number of satellite drones that spawn.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_PRACTICE_MODE_DESC: Allows the host to summon the satellite drone to his current location.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_EXTRA_TIME_DESC: Amount of time added to the match timer when a bomb site is successfully destroyed.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_OVERTIME_LIMIT_DESC: Initial match timer in the overtime round.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_WIN_RULE_DESC: Changes the win condition between total rounds won or total flags captured.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_CAPTURE_CONDITION_DESC: Determines if your flag is required to be at your base to capture the enemy flag.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_PICKUP_TIME_DESC: Amount of time required to pickup the enemy flag.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_RETURN_TIME_DESC: Amount of time required to return your flag to your base.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SHARED_RUSH_TIMER_DESC: Teams share the rush timer. Whoever controls the majority of the zones when it ends, wins.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_RUSH_TIMER_DESC: Triggers a set match timer once two zones are captured by a single team.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_RUSH_TIMER_AMOUNT_DESC: The match will end when this timer reaches zero. The team controlling the majority of zones wins.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_PRE_CAP_DESC: Starts the match with zones nearest to team start spawns already captured.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BANK_TIME_DESC: Amount of time between each tag you can deposit.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BANK_RATE_DESC: Amount of tags you can deposit at once, per bank time.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BANK_CAPTURE_DESC: Amount of time before you can initiate depositing tags.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_MEGA_BANK_LIMIT_DESC: Deposits number of tags equal to the limit at the same time and awards bonus score.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_MEGA_BANK_BONUS_DESC: Amount of score awarded when triggering a mega bank.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_NUM_INITIAL_DES: Total players infected once the countdown hits zero.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_SURVIVOR_PRIMAR: The primary weapon all survivors spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_SURVIVOR_TACTIC: The tactical equipment all survivors spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_SURVIVOR_LETHAL: The lethal equipment all survivors spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_INFECTED_PRIMAR: The primary weapon all infected spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_INFECTED_TACTIC: The tactical equipment all infected spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_INFECTED_LETHAL: The lethal equipment all infected spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_EXTRA_TIME_PER_: Amount of time added to the match timer for every survivor that is eliminated.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SURVIVOR_ALIVE_SCORE_D: Amount of score multiplied by every eliminated survivor. Awarded to all remaining suvivors.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_STREAK_BONUS_DE: Amount of bonus score awarded to infected players on streaks.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ENABLE_TRACKER_DESC: All infected players spawn with the tracker perk.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ENABLE_PING_DESC: All survivors spawn with the ping perk.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BOUNTY_TIMER_DESC: Amount of time you can stay in your base before a bounty is put on you.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_ALLOW_SUPER_DES: Survivors earn Phase Shift, infected earn Reaper.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SETBACKS_DESC: Number of weapons on the ladder the player is decremented if killed by a melee attack.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_SETBACK_STREAK_DESC: Number of deaths under any circumstances to trigger a setback.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BOUNTY_BONUS_SCORE_DES: Amount of team score enemies receive for killing players that have a bounty on them.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_KILLS_PER_WEAPON_DESC: Number of kills required before advancing to the next weapon.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_LADDER_DESC: Types of weapon classes that the player cycles between on kills.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_DROP_TIME_DESC: Amount of time between drone package deliveries.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ENEMY_BASE_KILL_REVEAL: Amount of time an enemy is outlined if they kill an opponent in the opponent's base.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_ROUND_SCORE_LIMIT_DESC: Total score required to force the next round.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POSSESSION_RESET_CONDI: Determines when the drone will be reset back to its starting position.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_POSSESSION_RESET_TIME_: Time before the drone resets back to its starting position.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_BALL_ACTIVATION_DELAY_: The amount of time before the drone respawns after it resets.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_SURVIVOR_SECOND: The secondary weapon all survivors spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_INFECTED_SECOND: The secondary weapon all infected spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_INITIAL_PRIMARY: The primary weapon all initial infected spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_RULES_INFECT_INITIAL_SECONDA: The secondary weapon all initial infected spawn with.
LUA_MENU_MP_WAR_DESC: Use teamwork to eliminate players on the opposing team. The first team to reach the score limit wins.
LUA_MENU_MP_WAR_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Team Deathmatch game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_DOMINATION_DESC: Capture and defend the designated positions to gain points.
LUA_MENU_MP_DOMINATION_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Domination game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_SD_DESC: Teams take turns defending and destroying an objective. No respawning.

LUA_MENU_MP_CONF_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Kill Confirmed game mode

LUA_MENU_MP_GRIND_DESC: Recover dog tags and take them to the objective marker to score for your team.

LUA_MENU_MP_INFECT_DESC: Eliminated Survivors become Infected.  Infect everyone, or survive the game to win.
LUA_MENU_MP_INFECT_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the Infected game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_GUN_DESC: Be the first player to score a kill with each one of the provided weapons.

LUA_MENU_MP_OIC_RECIPE_DESC: Recipe based on the OIC game mode
LUA_MENU_MP_OIC_DESC: Gain Ammo by eliminating enemies.  Highest score wins.

LUA_MENU_MP_CODE_PERSONALIZATION_PACK:
C.O.D.E. Courage Personalization Pack

Equip the Call of Duty™ Endowment (C.O.D.E.) Courage Personalization Pack for a full suite of exclusive content including: C.O.D.E. Weapon Camo and Weapon Accessory, a Reticle and Emblem, plus an animated C.O.D.E. Calling Card. Fly your flag as all items show off the official colors of the Call of Duty™ Endowment (C.O.D.E.)

When you purchase the C.O.D.E. Courage Personalization Pack, you’re helping Veterans find meaningful employment after leaving service. 100% of Gross proceeds received by Activision will be donated to the Call of Duty Endowment and will go directly to funding non-profits that place veterans into high quality jobs.

Visit www.callofdutyendowment.org to learn more.
LUA_MENU_MP_QUARTERMASTER_HOLIDAY_BUNDLE: For a limited time, purchase the Quartermaster Holiday Bundle of 25 Rare Supply Drops and 250 Salvage for 2,500 CP. Limit of 1 bundle per user: offer expires Dec 27, 10am PT.
LUA_MENU_MP_PICK10_SLOT_EXTRA_PRIMARY_WE: Equip a Primary Weapon in the Secondary Weapon slot
LUA_MENU_MP_AFGHAN_DESC: A remake of the Modern Warfare 2 classic, Dominion takes the sprawling ranged battleground to a partially terraformed Mars. The action is once again anchored by a crashed ship in the center where players can take cover from the many overlooks.
LUA_MENU_MP_GENEVA_DESC: Taking place adjacent to the idyllic Venetian canals, Renaissance is an intense urban-scale map with a strong linear flow.
LUA_MENU_MP_NEON_DESC: Neon takes place in a virtual city that is partially glitched out. It's a large, z-layout map with long sightlines down the center for snipers to patrol which is flanked by side paths that allow for dense close-quarter combat.
LUA_MENU_MP_ZOMBIES_HOLIDAY_BUNDLE_DESC: For a limited time, purchase the Zombies Holiday Bundle of 25 Rare Zombie Crates and 250 Salvage for 2,500 CP. Limit of 1 bundle per user: offer expires Dec 27, 10am PT.
LUA_MENU_MP_MKII_HELP_POPUP_DESC:
Mark-II is the pinnacle of next gen weapon fabrication. These highly rare weapons are manufactured from the most valuable materials throughout our solar system and can only be found in Supply Drops. In addition to the standard Gun Perks, Mark-II weapon variants grant an extra 15% soldier XP per kill!

 
With stunning new visuals and a hefty bonus to XP gain, the Mark-II weapon is the superior gun of choice for today’s elite soldier.

 
Happy Hunting!
LUA_MENU_MP_MAPPACK1_DESC: Sabotage, the first DLC pack for Call of Duty®: Infinite Warfare, includes the next terrifying Zombies installment from Willard Wyler’s horror film archive: Rave in the Redwoods plus four unique multiplayer environments including 'Dominion,' a re-imagining of the Call of Duty®: Modern Warfare 2 classic, 'Afghan.'

LUA_MENU_MP_MARSOASIS_DESC: Turista is a plush spa and resort for affluent galactic travelers, nestled in the middle of a giant skeleton of a long dead creature. It’s a long, linear 3 lane map that allows a variety of playstyles.
LUA_MENU_MP_FLIP_DESC: Perched atop a gilded penthouse in a sprawling metropolis, Excess is an intense re-imagining of the classic Modern Warfare 2 map, Rust. Fast paced action on a small map.
LUA_MENU_MP_MANSION_DESC: The contemporary setting of an exclusive art gallery is a direct contrast to the frenetic action. Tight close quarter encounters bloom out into open exterior battlegrounds in this wide, three-lane style map.
LUA_MENU_MP_JUNK_DESC: Long sightlines and tactical pathways intersect in Scrap. Taking place on mankind’s final dumping ground on the Moon, players will need to keep moving at all times. Flip your perspective on the gravity-defying sniper perches and get the drop on enemies.
LUA_MENU_MP_QUARTERMASTER_BUNDLE_15_BONU: Mega bundle! Get 15 random Rare Supply Drops and 1 random Epic Supply Drop plus a guaranteed Epic Mark II Prototype and Epic Weapon Camo.
LUA_MENU_MP_HACK_MKII_SET_DESC: Get 1 Mark II Weapon, Camo, and Accessory, Rare or better.
LUA_MENU_MP_QUARTERMASTER_BUNDLE_50_DESC: Mega sale! Save 50% on 50 Rare Supply Drops.

LUA_MENU_MP_HACK_COMPLETE_MKII_DESC: Guarantees 1 Mark II Prototype weapon, 1 Weapon Camo, and 1 Weapon Accessory.
LUA_MENU_MP_ARMORY_STREAK_LAB_UNLOCK_MSG: Unlock by crafting previous prototype rarities
LUA_MENU_MP_LOADOUT_WIPE_WARN: Restricted loadout items will be removed.

LUA_MENU_MP_MARSOASIS2_DESC: Turista is a plush spa and resort for affluent galactic travelers, nestled in the middle of a giant skeleton of a long dead creature. It’s a long, linear 3 lane map that allows a variety of playstyles.
LUA_MENU_MP_CWL2_PERSONALIZATION_PACK: Equip the Championship Premium Personalization Pack for an array of content including: Taunt featuring the Championship trophy, an animated camo, a Warfighter Championship Rig, a weapon accessory, animated calling card and emblem.  All attendees arriving at Champs will get a code for the pack with their ticket.
LUA_MENU_MP_PARIS_DESC: Remake of Resistance from Modern Warfare 3. Techno-renaissance architecture that takes place in a post-apocalyptic future where the surrounding areas are smoldering ruins.
LUA_MENU_MP_PIXEL_DESC: A minature golf theme park. Fun for the whole family! A large battlefield with multiple hotspots and long sightlines.
LUA_MENU_MP_OVERFLOW_DESC: Taking place in the broken-down remains of Chicago after a planet wide freeze, Permafrost is a medium sized map with a circular flow.
LUA_MENU_MP_NOVA_DESC: Scavenged civilization stranded on a sandbar in the middle of an ocean. Tight 3 lane map with a long linear layout.
LUA_MENU_MP_QUARTERMASTER_BUNDLE_10_AR_D: Receive a bundle of 10 Rare Supply Drops and 1 Assault Rifle Hack. Hack guarantees one Assault Rifle of Legendary or better quality.

LUA_MENU_MP_QUARTERMASTER_BUNDLE_5_LSD_C: Receive a bundle of 5 Rare Zombie Crates and 1 Legendary Supply Drop. Legendary Supply Drop guarantees an item of Legendary rarity or better. Already owned items grant salvage.

LUA_MENU_MP_BRIBE_SUMMER_CRATE_ALL_DESC: Guarantees 3 non-duplicate Days of Summer items.  This hack will drop duplicates if you already own all Days of Summer items!
LUA_MENU_MP_RALLY_DESC: Post apocalyptic rally race along the Northern California coast. Long sightlines and environmental hazards are at the forefront of this figure 8 map.
LUA_MENU_MP_CODPHISH_DESC: High end shopping mall on the edge of the universe. Quick flank routes frame a chaotic center in this medium sized map.
LUA_MENU_MP_DEPOT_DESC: Last stop watering hole at the end of civilization. Depot 22 is a medium sized 3 lane map that focuses on medium ranged encounters.
LUA_MENU_MP_HAWKWAR_DESC: A modified Z map marks the return of Warhawk from Ghosts. A simulation of Americana for tourists to experience the past.

PATCH_MENU_WAIT_TO_VOTE: You must wait &&1 seconds between votes.
PATCH_MENU_THEATER_RECORDING_DESC: Enable or disable theater demo recording.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_SPEED_DESC: Perks for increased movement speed and reloading. Includes: Ready Up, Sleight of Hand, Agility, Marathon, and Stalker.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_HANDLING_DESC: Perks for increased weapon and equipment handling. Includes: Strong-Arm, On the Go, Reflex, Steady Aim, and Quickdraw.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_STEALTH_DESC: Perks for enhanced stealth capabilities. Includes: Takedown, Blind Eye, Dead Silence, Incog, and Off the Grid.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_AWARENESS_DESC: Perks for enhanced situational awareness. Includes: Recon, Scavenger, SitRep, Amplify, and Wiretap.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_RESISTANCE_DESC: Perks for increased resistance to damage and explosives. Includes: Resilience, ICU, Focus, Tac Resist, and Blast Shield.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_EQUIPMENT_DESC: Perks for extra equipment and ammo. Includes: Extra Tactical, Extra Lethal, Fully Loaded, Extra Attachment, and Danger Close.
PATCH_MENU_PERK_ELITE_DESC: Perks for specialized roles. Includes: Gambler, Hardline, Ping, Overkill, and Deadeye.
PATCH_MENU_ATTACHMENT_SIGHTS_DESC: Advance optical precision sights. Includes: Iron Sights, Red Dot, ACOG, Holographic, VMR, Thermal, Tracker, and Variable Zoom Lens.
PATCH_MENU_ATTACHMENT_BARREL_DESC: Reduce muzzle flash, go silent or extend your weapon's range and damage. Includes: Flash Suppressor, Silencer, Muzzle Brake and Chrome Lined Barrel.
PATCH_MENU_ATTACHMENT_UNDER_BARREL_DESC: Add more stability and firepower to your weapon. Includes: Foregrip, Under Barrel Shotgun and Grenade Launcher, Akimbo and Tactical Knife.
PATCH_MENU_ATTACHMENT_MOD_DESC: Modify your weapon's fire type and ammo. Includes: Armor-Piercing, Rapid Fire, Extended Mags, Slug Rounds, Automatic Fire, Semi-automatic, Burst Fire, Radar, Scrambler, and Titanium Frame.
PATCH_MENU_THIRD_ATTACHMENT_LOCKED: Select a weapon that allows three attachments to make use of your Extra Attachment Perk.
PATCH_MENU_SECOND_ATTACHMENT_LOCKED: Select a weapon that allows two attachments to make use of your Extra Attachment Perk.
PATCH_MENU_RESET_OPTIONS: Reset options back to default settings?
PATCH_MENU_EXTRA_LOADOUT_NO_AI: Extra loadouts cannot be used by AI.
PATCH_MENU_REQUIRES_COD_ACCOUNT: This feature requires a CoD Account to use.
PATCH_MENU_SQUADS_DLC_DESC: Play Safeguard and Wargame on ^3Onslaught^7 Maps. Exclusively for players that own DLC: Onslaught
PATCH_MENU_CLANTAG_NOTALLOWED: You are not authorized to use this clan tag.
PLATFORM_UI_STORE_MUSTLOGIN: You must be connected to the internet to view the Store.
PLATFORM_UI_STEAM_OVERLAY_REQUIRED: You must enable Steam Community In-Game to select this option.
PLATFORM_UI_RESTART_GAME_GRAPHICS_MESSAG: Restart game now to apply graphic settings?
PLATFORM_UI_ADAPTER_DESC: Select which display adapter to use.
PLATFORM_UI_DISPLAY_MODE_DESC_ALT: Select Windowed or Fullscreen. Pressing Alt + Enter will toggle between fullscreen and windowed modes.
PLATFORM_UI_DISPLAY_MODE_DESC: Select Windowed, Fullscreen, or Fullscreen Borderless. Pressing Alt + Enter will toggle between fullscreen and windowed modes.
PLATFORM_UI_REFRESH_RATE_DESC: How often the screen is rendered, higher Hz results in smoother movement.
PLATFORM_UI_VSYNC_DESC: To reduce screen tearing, wait until the monitor is refreshing before displaying the next rendered image.
PLATFORM_UI_ASPECT_RATIO_DESC: Physical aspect ratio of the monitor.  Compensates for aspect ratio of game resolution differing from that of the monitor on which it is displayed.  Rarely needs to be set manually.
PLATFORM_UI_VIDEO_MODE_DESC: Change your display resolutions or window size.
PLATFORM_UI_IMAGE_QUALITY_DESC: Resolution of 3D scene rendering.  Reduce to improve performance on slower video cards.
PLATFORM_UI_TEX_RES_DESC: Higher resolution results in more color detail in surfaces.
PLATFORM_UI_TEX_FILTER_ANISO_DESC: Improves texture quality of surfaces when viewed at an angle.
PLATFORM_UI_SHADOW_MAP_RES_DESC: Higher resolution results in sharper, higher quality shadows.
PLATFORM_UI_SSAO_DESC: Provides small scale soft shadowing of indirect lighting.
PLATFORM_UI_PARTICLE_LIGHTING_DESC: Changes the quality of lighting applied to particle effects.
PLATFORM_UI_DEPTH_OF_FIELD_DESC: Simulates camera lens, out of focus regions appear blurry.
PLATFORM_UI_ANTIALIASING_DESC: Post process effect to reduce perceived jagged edges in the final rendered image.
PLATFORM_UI_BULLET_IMPACT_DESC: Draw effects when bullets impact a surface.
PLATFORM_UI_SSS_DESC: Simulation of light transport through semi-translucent materials
PLATFORM_UI_TESSELLATION_DESC: Changes the amount of some scene geometry which receives subdivision for improved rendering quality.
PLATFORM_UI_PARTICLE_QUALITY_DESC: Set the quality of the particle effects.
PLATFORM_UI_LOD_RAMP_DESC: Changes texture and geometry quality for models at further distances.
PLATFORM_UI_MATERIAL_LOD_DESC: Changes material shading quality for scene geometry at further distances.
PLATFORM_UI_SHADER_PRELOAD_DESC: Preload shaders prior to gameplay.  Incurs longer level load to eliminate potential hitching during gameplay.
PLATFORM_UI_FOV_DESC: Default Field of View value is 80. Changing the scale may result in lower framerate and some graphical artifacts.
PLATFORM_UI_SHADOW_CASTER_DESC: Affects the number of shadow casting objects and shadow casting lights.
PLATFORM_UI_DESC_LIGHT_SHADOW_OPTIONS: Set the Light and Shadow options.
PLATFORM_UI_SMAA_FILMIC_STRENGTH_DESC: Adjust amount of temporal blurring vs. image stability when anti-aliasing the scene.
PLATFORM_UI_CACHED_SPOT_SHADOWS_DESC: Cache spot shadow results. Uses significant video memory.
PLATFORM_UI_CACHED_SUN_SHADOWS_DESC: Cache sun shadow results. Uses significant video memory.
PLATFORM_UI_SHADER_FRONTEND_PRELOAD_ALRE: Full shader preload has already been completed.
PLATFORM_UI_SHADER_FRONTEND_PRELOAD_SKIP: Cancelling shader preloading can cause reduced in-game performance.
PLATFORM_UI_KEEP_DISPLAY_SETTINGS_DESC: Do you want to keep these display settings?

PLATFORM_OFFENSIVE_NO_PANELTY: (You will not be penalized in terms of game completion.)
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG1: Field Orders have to be finished during your current life, and can't be completed by using Killstreaks.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG2: Get Assault and Specialist Killstreak Rewards by getting consecutive kills without dying.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG3: Cranked is a fast-paced game mode where chaining kills gives you speed perks, 2x scoring, and keeps you alive.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG4: Some killstreak rewards are controllable but leave you vulnerable on the ground.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG5: Track your Leaderboard position in the Barracks.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG6: One SAT COM activates 'Eyes On', marking enemies you see to the mini-map. Place more SAT COMs to get a full radar sweep.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG7: Swap out Frag Grenades for Throwing Knives, Canister Bombs and other Lethal equipment.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG8: Your Guard Dog is your best friend. He alerts you to nearby enemies, protects you and avenges your death.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG9: Aiming Down Sights near the edge of an object, vehicle or building activates Contextual Lean.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG10: Change the Patches and Backgrounds you've earned in Character Customization.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG11: Scroll left and right on the Match Summary for more detailed info.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG12: Planting multiple SAT COMs at the same time increases your team's awareness of enemy movements.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG13: Leaving or shutting down mid-game will cause you to lose your Match Bonus.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG14: Earn Care Package airdrops by completing Field Orders. Care Packages award a random killstreak.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG15: In Infected mode, use Tactical Insertions as an Infected to mark where your next respawn will be.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG16: You can Neutralize an enemy controlled flag in Domination by reaching the halfway mark when capturing it.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG17: Complete Operations to earn bonus Patches, XP, Squad Points, and Character Customization gear.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG18: In Blitz, enter the enemy objective zone while it is active to score for your team.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG19: In Blitz, the enemy objective zone has a cool down period after each score; don't stay out in the open.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG20: The Muzzle Brake attachment increases your weapon's maximum effective range.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG21: The Off the Grid Perk makes you invisible to SAT COMs and radar pings.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG22: The Takedown Perk lets you kill enemies without revealing their death locations to their teammates.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG23: Bridge the gap between infantry and sniper with a Marksman Rifle.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG24: Contextual Lean can be disabled in the options menu if you prefer a more classic style of play.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG26: Holding crouch while sprinting initiates a tactical slide to help you get to cover.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG27: Fully charge a 9-Bang to create an EMP effect that temporarily disables Sentry Guns and other automated equipment.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG28: Want more control of your killstreak helicopter? Hop into the cockpit of an AAS-72X as a Helo Pilot.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG29: Use the Incog perk to stay hidden from enemy targeting, Thermal and Tracker sights, and Motion Sensors.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG30: Some maps have special killstreak rewards when calling in Field Order Care Packages.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG31: In Search and Rescue, recover Dog Tags to respawn friendlies and deny enemy respawns.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG32: Check out the Squads playlists to see how your custom Squad stacks up against the competition.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG33: Assault and Marksman Rifle select fire types can be adjusted in the attachments menu.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG34: Provide tactical support from the sky with the Helo Scout killstreak.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG35: The Tracker Sight outlines enemy targets and can be flipped down on the fly for a wider field of view.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG36: The Honey Badger, VKS and K7 have integrated silencer attachments.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG37: The Night Owl drone follows you, detects enemies in close proximity and actively destroys incoming explosives.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG38: Killstreak Rewards attained from airdrop crates do not count towards your killstreak count.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG39: Akimbo weapons give you more firepower but restrict your ability to Aim Down Sight.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG40: Combat Exclusion Rules lifted! Customize the look and gender of your Squad Member.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG41: Customize each Squad Member with its own Strike Package to be ready for any situation that might be thrown at you.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG42: Assault Strike Package items will chain kills to earn the next one.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG43: The Flash Suppressor attachment reduces muzzle flash for better accuracy, while maintaining full weapon damage.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG44: Armor Piercing rounds can penetrate Ballistic Vests, Juggernaut Armor and deal extra damage to killstreaks.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG45: The Wiretap Perk gives you access to active enemy SAT COMs on the field and stacks with your team's SAT COMs as well.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG46: Check out the Squads playlists to see how your custom Squad stacks up against the competition.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG47: The Specialist Strike Package lets you earn additional Perks as you kill, with a larger bonus at the end of your chain.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG48: Strike Packages give you the choice of supporting your team, being on the offensive, or being more of a lone gun.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG49: The Blind Eye Perk makes you undetectable by AI targeting systems of all kinds including air support and sentries.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG50: The Vulture drone is a flying sentry gun that covers your six.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG51: The Trinity Rocket lets you control a missile from above that can fire off additional smart drone projectiles.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG52: The Support Strike Package doesn't reset your killstreak kills when you die.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG53: In a match, you have three killstreak slots with one extra slot to store any killstreaks you get by other means.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG54: Your extra killstreak slot stacks, so you don't need to worry about losing earned killstreaks when changing loadouts.
PLATFORM_DYK_IW5_MSG55: Scroll up and down through your killstreaks and use the one that you want right now.
PLATFORM_CALL_NUKE: Press and hold ^3&&1^7 for Nuclear Strike.
PLATFORM_STEAM_OFFLINE: Must be signed in to Steam in Online mode to play.
PLATFORM_HINT_MOVEONTRUCK: Press movement keys to move on truck.
PLATFORM_JOIN_SESSION_LOST: The game session you were invited to is no longer valid.
PLATFORM_OPTIONS_COLOR_BLIND_ASSIST_DESC: Enable or disable Color Blind Assist for player names.
PLATFORM_FACEBOOK_LEGAL2: By logging into your Facebook account, you agree that Activision may link and display your Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare information, including your Steam username, with your Facebook account information, including your name.
PLATFORM_KICKEDFROMPARTY: You were kicked from the party.
PLATFORM_ONLINEVAULT_MUSTLOGIN: You must be connected to the internet to view the Online Vault.
PLATFORM_NOGUEST: Guest accounts are not supported for Lan Party games in Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare.
PLATFORM_JOIN_WRONG_EXE_MP: This friend is currently playing multiplayer. You must start the multiplayer game mode to join this player.
PLATFORM_JOIN_WRONG_EXE_SP: This friend is currently playing single-player. You must return to the main menu to join this player.
PLATFORM_THEATER_RECORDING_DESC: Enable or disable theater demo recording.
PLATFORM_MISSINGMAP: You do not have this map or it is damaged.  Visit Steam to see if this map is available for download.
PLATFORM_PLAYLIST_REQUIRES_DLC: This playlist requires a map pack that you do not have. You can download map packs from Steam.
PLATFORM_COOP_REQUIRES_DLC: This coop host requires a map pack that you do not have. You can download map packs from Steam.
PLATFORM_DLC_GO_TO_STORE: Launch the Store to purchase new game content?
PLATFORM_P2PAUTH_INVALID_PLAYER: Your account is VAC banned and cannot play online.
PLATFORM_P2PAUTH_PUBLISHER_BANNED: Your account is banned and cannot play online.
PLATFORM_P2PAUTH_LOGGED_ELSEWHERE: Your Steam account is logged in elsewhere.
PLATFORM_P2PAUTH_NOT_CONNECTED_STEAM: You are currently not conncected to Steam.
PLATFORM_P2PAUTH_NO_LICENSE: Your Steam account does not contain a valid license for this game.
PLATFORM_PLAY_ONLINE_SQUADS_DESC: Play Squads online in Call of Duty: Infinite Warfare Multiplayer.
PLATFORM_ODIN_STRUGGLE_FAIL: Use  to aim and [{+attack}] to shoot.
PLATFORM_ODIN_STRUGGLE_FAIL_ALT: Use  to aim and [{+attack}] to shoot.
PLATFORM_WARNING_AUTOSAVE: This game saves data automatically at certain points. Do not turn off the power when the 'Checkpoint reached.' message appears.
PLATFORM_CONTROLLER_DISCONNECTED: Please reconnect your controller or switch to the Mouse & Keyboard control scheme.
PLATFORM_NO_DEMONWARE: Still connecting to the matchmaking server, please wait a few seconds.
PLATFORM_EXTINCTION_CASUAL_NOTICE: Posting to the leaderboards and some achievements are disabled in casual mode.
PLATFORM_PRESS_TO_ORB_DEP_RESPAWN:  Respawn or ^3 [{+attack}] to respawn using Orbital Deployment^7

PLATFORM_OPTIONS_VERT_SENSITIVITY_DESC: Adjust the vertical sensitivity of your controller's sticks.

Most concerns are quickly resolved in this manner to our customers' satisfaction. The parties shall use their best efforts to settle any dispute, claim, question, or disagreement directly through consultation and good faith negotiations which shall be a precondition to either party initiating a lawsuit or arbitration.

Binding Arbitration:  If the parties do not reach an agreed upon solution within a period of 30 days from the time informal dispute resolution is pursued pursuant to the paragraph above, then either party may initiate binding arbitration as the sole means to formally resolve claims, subject to the terms set forth below. Specifically, all claims arising out of or relating to this Agreement (including its interpretation, formation, performance and breach), the parties' relationship with each other and/or your use of the Program shall be finally settled by binding arbitration administered by JAMS in accordance with the provisions of its Comprehensive Arbitration Rules or Streamlined Arbitrations Rules, as appropriate, excluding any rules or procedures governing or permitting class actions. This arbitration provision is made pursuant to a transaction involving interstate commerce, and the Federal Arbitration Act (the "FAA") shall apply to the interpretation, applicability, enforceability and formation of this Agreement notwithstanding any other choice of law provision contained in this Agreement.  The arbitrator, and not any federal, state, or local court or agency, shall have exclusive authority to resolve all disputes arising out of or relating to the interpretation, applicability, enforceability, or formation of this Agreement, including without limitation any claim that all or any part of this Agreement is void or voidable, or whether a claim is subject to arbitration. The arbitrator shall be empowered to grant whatever relief would be available in a court under law or in equity. The arbitrator's award shall be binding on the parties and may be entered as a judgment in any court of competent jurisdiction. 

The JAMS Rules governing the arbitration may be accessed at http://www.jamsadr.com/ or by calling JAMS at (800) 352-5267. Your arbitration fees and your share of arbitrator compensation shall be governed by the JAMS Comprehensive Arbitration Rules and, to the extent applicable, the Consumer Minimum Standards, including the then-current limit on arbitration filing fees. To the extent the filing fee for the arbitration exceeds the cost of filing a lawsuit, Activision will pay the additional cost. The parties understand that, absent this mandatory provision, they would have the right to sue in court and have a jury trial.  They further understand that, in some instances, the costs of arbitration could exceed the costs of litigation and the right to discovery may be more limited in arbitration than in court.

Location:  If you are a resident of the United States, arbitration will take place at any reasonable location within the United States convenient for you. For residents outside the United States, arbitration shall be initiated in Los Angeles County, California, and you and Activision agree to submit to the personal jurisdiction of any federal or state court in Los Angeles County, California, in order to compel arbitration, to stay proceedings pending arbitration, or to confirm, modify, vacate, or enter judgment on the award entered by the arbitrator.
 
Class Action Waiver:  The parties further agree that any arbitration shall be conducted in their individual capacities only and not as a class action or other representative action, and the parties expressly waive their right to file a class action or seek relief on a class basis. YOU AND ACTIVISION AGREE THAT EACH MAY BRING CLAIMS AGAINST THE OTHER ONLY IN YOUR OR ITS INDIVIDUAL CAPACITY, AND NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY PURPORTED CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE PROCEEDING. If any court or arbitrator determines that the class action waiver set forth in this paragraph is void or unenforceable for any reason or that an arbitration can proceed on a class basis, then the arbitration provision set forth above shall be deemed null and void in its entirety and the parties shall be deemed to have not agreed to arbitrate disputes.

Exception - Litigation of Intellectual Property and Small Claims Court Claims: Notwithstanding the parties' decision to resolve all disputes through arbitration, either party may bring an action in state or federal court that only asserts claims for patent infringement or invalidity, copyright infringement, moral rights violations, trademark infringement, and/or trade secret misappropriation, but not, for clarity, claims related to the license granted to you for the Program under this Agreement. Information concerning the exercise of the right of withdrawal

Right of Withdrawal

The withdrawal period will expire after 14 calendar days from the day of the conclusion of the Purchase Contract. To exercise the right of withdrawal, you must inform us (Cooperatie Activision Blizzard International UA of Beechavenue 131, 1119RB Schiphol-Rijk, Netherlands contact details available at www.support.activision.com) of your decision to withdraw from a Purchase Contract by an unequivocal statement (e.g. a letter sent by post, fax or e-mail). You may use the model withdrawal form attached hereafter, but it is not obligatory. To meet the withdrawal deadline, it is sufficient for you to send your communication concerning your exercise of the right of withdrawal before the withdrawal period has expired.

Effects of withdrawal

If you withdraw from the Purchase Contract, we shall reimburse to you all payments received from you under this Purchase Contract, including the costs of delivery (with the exception of the supplementary costs resulting from your choice of a type of delivery other than the least expensive type of standard delivery offered by us), without undue delay and in any event not later than 14 calendar days from the day on which we are informed about your decision to withdraw from this Purchase Contract. We will carry out such reimbursement using the same means of payment as you used for the initial transaction, unless you have expressly agreed otherwise; in any event, you will not incur any fees as a result of such reimbursement.

If you requested to begin the performance of services under a Purchase Contract during the withdrawal period, you shall pay us an amount which is in proportion to what has been provided until you have communicated us your withdrawal from that Purchase Contract, in comparison with the full coverage of these services under the Purchase Contract.

End of the information concerning the exercise of the right of withdrawal

You lose your right of withdrawal, insofar as the Purchase Contract is a service contract, after the service has been fully performed and if the performance has begun with your prior express consent, and with the acknowledgement that you will lose your right of withdrawal once the service has been fully performed by us.

You lose your right of withdrawal insofar as the Purchase Contract comprises the supply of digital content which is not supplied on a tangible medium if the performance has begun with your prior express consent and your acknowledgment that you thereby lose your right of withdrawal.

CP purchased in Infinite Warfare currently may also be used to obtain in-game content in Call of Duty®: Black Ops III.  Use in Black Ops III is not guaranteed and is subject to change.

PLATFORM_GAMEBATTLES_FIRST_TIME_LOBBY:
You're all set for CWL GameBattles tournament and ladder matches! Download the GameBattles app on your smart device or head over to mlg.tv/cwlgamebattles to sign up for upcoming CWL competitions. 
 
Once you're registered, you will be able to play all of your CWL GameBattles matches here. 
 
Use of GameBattles is subject to the Major League Gaming Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
PLATFORM_GAMEBATTLES_REGISTER_POPUP:
Here you can play official CWL GameBattles tournament and ladder matches. Register now and you'll be on your way to going pro! 
 
To register, download the GameBattles app on your smart device or visit mlg.tv/register. After you log in, visit mlg.tv to link your account. Once you've linked your accounts, you'll be able to play your CWL GameBattles matches here and receive this GameBattles animated calling card! 
 
Use of GameBattles is subject to the Major League Gaming Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.

MENU_SP_VF_FILE_01_BODY:
CIA - HR3650092326177 // PSYCHIATRIC REPORT - 10/02

Patient:  GABRIEL T. RORKE
Rank: Captain - ACTIVE DUTY

GABRIEL RORKE was involved in Operation: Sand Viper, and is one of only fifteen operators who survived the conflict.  For the past year, the traumatizing experience seems to have no effect on his combat readiness or mental sharpness.

If anything, I would say the experience has given him purpose.  He seems more focused than ever.  Calm.  It's really quite inspiring, actually.  Most soldiers I've come across have "dead" eyes - they just look right through me, as if I'm not even there.

Captain Rorke displays no medical hindrances, physical or mental.  

Diagnosis:  Combat Ready.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_02_BODY:
CIA - SR91923000932-LW //  DEFENSE SYSTEM VULNERABILITIES

Methods of Infiltration

We've seen an increasing number of attacks against the Liberty Wall.  The source of the attacks, we believe, are Federation Recon Teams (FEDREC) operating in No Man's Land.

As of now, the attacks have slowed.  However, our own FORCE RECON teams have reported an alarming number of civilian casualties outside the wall.  A detachment recently discovered mass graves in the craters south of Los Angeles. 

We were able to determine that Federation forces are attempting to find alternative ways into the city.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_03_BODY:
CIA - SR13727199-G // TIER 1 POWs

Latest reports from OTW Recon show severe breaches in operator safety.  Specific teams that have operated in these areas have proven effective so far, however, at this time, we believe their security has been compromised.

[OPERATOR SAFETY]
We are currently aware of three (3) operators who have gone missing or have been reported K.I.A. near Zones Romeo and Sierra.
Chris Greene    -   "Torch"
Riddian Poe      -   "Grim"
Alex Johnson   -   "Ajax"

Note:  All operators are from the same unit - designation: STALKER
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_04_BODY:
CIA - SR13727201-G  //  ENEMY POSITIONS OTW

New intel from OTW Recon teams outside the wall show enemy fortifications along the outskirts of San Diego, CA, listed below.

[FIREBASE CHARLIE]
An OTW team has tracked one of our missing POWs to a stadium a half-mile inland of San Diego.  Designated FIREBASE CHARLIE by enemy forces, we believe this to be a Forward Operating Base for the Federation, and a staging ground for launching attacks against the Wall.

Intel suggests the enemy has been transporting POWs to this location and attempting to extract information via interrogation and torture. Due to the high level of security clearance these operators possess, we have issued protocols to ensure our safety.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_05_BODY:
CIA - SR0008119192-LW  //  URGENT - IMPENDING ATTACK ON SANTA MONICA

FEDERATION ASSAULT FORCE INBOUND TO FORT SANTA MONICA

Intel has confirmed a large scale enemy force is inbound to Santa Monica and the surrounding areas - including Los Angeles and the Liberty Wall itself. Request immediate deployment of all QRF and Emergency Services.

UPDATE - 5/4 11:23AM
U.S. Forces at Fort Santa Monica have engaged enemy ground troops.  Federation Navy inbound. Attack routes and trajectories hitting GRID 7012 and GRID 3281.

IMMEDIATE ASSISTANCE REQUIRED
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_06_BODY:
CIA - LB000012995  //  FEDERATION RISE TO POWER

TRANSITION OF POWER AND RESOURCES AFTER TEL AVIV WAR

After multiple conflicts in the Middle East, the invasion of Tel Aviv and the resulting collapse of energy and financial resources in the area resulted in crippling effects to First World countries - mainly those relying on such resources provided by allied governments.

With NATO and Allied Forces spread thin, other governments seized an opportunity to monopolize their own resources and consolidate power over neighboring countries.

Venezuela, Brazil, and Chile unite under one banner, calling themselves "The Federation".  Within the next few years, a massive financial boost to the Federation's economy resulted in a global dominance over energy markets.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_07_BODY:
CIA - LB000017955  //  VICTOR RAMOS - PROFILE

Name: Victor H. Ramos
Born: July 1st, ????
Age:  Unknown

Ramos is a high ranking officer in the Federation Science Division, in charge of covert operations outside of San Diego.

Intel suggests he is utilized and protected by the Federation because of his knowledge of reverse engineering classified technology.  Former clients include China, Iran, and North Korea.  His breakthroughs in kinetic energy through projectiles laid the groundwork for the Orbital Defense Initiative (O.D.I.N.) satellite.

He is one of the only people who deals directly with GABRIEL RORKE, and we believe he never stays in the same place more than twenty four hours.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_08_BODY:
CIA - SR21945500  //  OPERATION: DEADBOLT

A heavily damaged laptop was recovered from recent operations in Caracas, VZ, but we were able to pull critical data from the HDD.

From what the files suggest, Rorke moves every twenty four hours, much like Victor Ramos - a man in his employ. We are unsure of how many pre-designated locations are used, however we were able to extract a cluster of them from the laptop.

A series of oil platforms and government housing off the coast of the Yucatan Peninsula is the next stop along his route. Called "The Freeport", we believe this area houses small-arms militias loyal to The Federation.  The area is to be considered extremely hostile. The Freeport is our only link to Rorke and we are currently unsure of when his movement cycle will start over.

Recommended COA:  UTILIZATION OF TIER1 TEAMS FOR IMMEDIATE ACTION
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_09_BODY:
CIA - SR21945616  //  ORDNANCE LAUNCHES IN YUCATAN

Aerial surveillance during OPERATION: DEADBOLT (see CIA - SR21945500) located simultaneous missile-like projectiles launching from the nearby jungle.

Exactly how many projectiles were used is unknown at this time, however allied forces in the area were able to determine at least six (6) of them were successfully launched. Long range tracking lost sight of them within minutes, though the angle of trajectory suggests the ordnance broke into the upper mesosphere.

SAFETY MEASURES FOR U.S. CITIES
Governing bodies of key U.S. cities have been notified, but at this time, the warning is preliminary.  The most current intel we've gathered suggests the projectiles never returned to the stratosphere.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_10_BODY:
CIA - SR24100706  //  DAMAGE ESTIMATES 

Below is a report taken from a recent intelligence-gathering operation in Federation occupied Argentina.  These estimates are potential casualties of an attack that, as of yet, has not occurred.

WASHINGTON, D.C.         NEW YORK CITY, NY.
TOTAL: 309,000 est.       TOTAL:  5,681,019 est.

CHICAGO, IL.                     LOS ANGELES, CA.
TOTAL: 1,510,400 est.     TOTAL: 2,773,380 est.

The number of casualties on impact suggest the Federation plans on using nuclear or kinetic-based attacks on U.S. soil, though the latter is pure speculation at this point.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_11_BODY:
CIA - AP1-385717 (TS)  // THE SHOP

Intelligence gathered from recent operations in Southern Argentina points to a facility near Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, as a hub for Federation activity.  The significance of this facility, referred to as "The Shop", is unknown, but appears to be of great importance to the enemy.

DIRECT ACTION OPERATIONS
Surveillance rotations have resulted in the loss of one UAV drone that was shot down by anti-aircraft fire.  However, the drone was able to feed topography and enemy defense positions back to us.

The Shop is heavily guarded by a naval fleet on the perimeter of two possible entrances.  Any direct action operations would require immobilization of this fleet. Utilizing STALKER on Atlas Platform proved successful.  The Federation naval fleet was diverted to the wreckage, leaving one AEGIS-CLASS DESTROYER guarding The Shop.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_12_BODY:
CIA - RDP921-1 // ADVANCED SYSTEMS OF THE FEDERATION NAVY

Repurposed and reverse engineered U.S. technology has devastated areas where our military was prominent (see 'CIA - RDP921-3'). Current reports indicate an upgraded Arleigh Burke Class (AEGIS) Destroyer being tested somewhere off the coast of Mexico.

The updated sonar-pulse system mimics that of a search sonar found on current AEGIS destroyers active within the U.S. Navy. A report suggests that human subjects (believed to be Federation Soldiers) were used in testing of the device. None were reported to have survived the blasts.

Only one repurposed AEGIS Destroyer has been confirmed. We can safely assume more are in production.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_13_BODY:
CIA - IA699614202 (TS)  //  REVERSE ENGINEERED U.S. TECHNOLOGY

Following operations near Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, and IA of "The Shop" (CIA - AP1-385717), we have learned of reverse engineering (RE) efforts of the Federation to rebuild and enhance wreckage of the United States Orbital Defense Initiative (ODIN) program.

We believe that Victor RAMOS (see Library File LB000017955) aided the Federation in this effort before being declared K.I.A. in Caracas, VZ earlier this year.

As of June, we have confirmation from eyes on the ground and STALKER that these efforts proved effective.  The Federation is in control of a working prototype of the ODIN satellite, referred to hereafter as "LOKI".  We believe Gabriel T. RORKE is responsible for divulging classified ODIN information to the Federation, allowing them to complete a prototype of LOKI.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_14_BODY:
CIA - IA700001892 (TS)  //  COMPROMISED GHOST SAFEHOUSE

Recently a location near Las Vegas, NV used by GHOST was compromised by a former operator in the team, Gabriel RORKE.  In the resulting attack, four operators were taken hostage and one, Elias T. WALKER, was killed in action.

The three remaining operators taken hostage underwent interrogation from RORKE, but we currently do not believe any national security was compromised.  Debrief of the three operators concluded that RORKE's intention was "...vendetta more than [intelligence gathering]".

RORKE was presumed dead during the events of Operation: Return to Sender, but we have since learned he survived and has been working for the Federation, primarily targeting members of GHOST.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_15_BODY:
CIA - OA1005382-2 (TS)  //  OPERATION: BLINDSLIDE

ADVISE:  OPERATIONS ARE CURRENTLY UNDERWAY

NORAD has approved an offensive strike against a satellite array (SATFARM) in the Atacama Desert of Chile.  The SATFARM is communicating with the Federation controlled satellite (CIA-IA699614202) in an attempt to coordinate kinetic strikes against the United States.

At this time, mobilization of forces is already underway at Fort Santa Monica.  Additional coordination with SOCOM and utilization of GHOST requested.  However, due to recent flaws of operational security assets, it is unknown if they can be of assistance.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_16_BODY:
CIA - OA1005382-3 (TS)  //  OPERATION: BLINDSLIDE

LOKI / SATFARM CONNECTION
The SATFARM communicates with FEDSAT to direct attacks, however the satellite is still capable of kinetic bombardment of areas without any assistance.  These attacks would deal catastrophic damage to targets, but without SATFARM's involvement, FEDSAT is firing blind.

CONTINGENCY OPERATIONS
A decommissioned space shuttle has been repurposed for a direct action mission aimed directly at FEDSAT.  NORAD currently has an assault team standing by for tasking, should the SATFARM operation prove successful.  With SATFARM disabled, FEDSAT will be vulnerable to attack, allowing us to put strike teams onboard the station itself.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_17_BODY:
CIA - OA1005382-4 (TS)  // ENHANCEMENTS OVER ODIN

Further developments from intel recovered from The Shop (see CIA-AP1-385717) show that the Federation Satellite (FEDSAT) is an upgraded, more streamlined enhancement of the original ODIN prototype.

Enhancements from intelligence gathered at The Shop described below:
- Tungsten rod variations
The U.S. operated ODIN used only 6.1 x 0.3m tungsten cylinders as projectiles. FEDSAT is using various sized rods not exceeding those of ODIN.  This allows for impacts closer to allied forces without the fear of danger close fire.

- Necklace configuration
FEDSAT is using subsidiary firing platforms controlled by a central HUB satellite.  These platforms allow for a greater range of potential targets. Current intel suggests the United States and Allied European countries are at the highest risk.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_18_BODY:
I am Gabriel Rorke.

I have been trained by your Government to be a weapon.  Trained to kill and destroy.  All in the name of Liberty and Justice.  Even surrender my very life in service to your country.

But I am not one of you. The "Just" have turned their backs and become deaf to your cries.  Who, then, will show them justice?  Who will show you the Liberty they have promised?  The weapon they have created will be their undoing.

But do not fear this.  Do not fear me.  It is only natural.  Like the collapse of Rome, your cities will crumble and there will be great sorrow.  But from the ashes of this diseased metropolis, a rebirth will occur.  It will be paid for with blood and steel. Liberty must be restored. I am Gabriel Rorke, and I am here to show you the true meaning of justice.
MENU_SP_CLASSIFIED_19_CAPS: PROFILE: ELIAS T. WALKER, CPT. RET.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_19_BODY:
Age: 51
Rank: Captain, RET.
Birthplace: San Diego, CA
Callsign: Scarecrow

Captain Walker is the acting commander of GHOST, and is also one of its oldest operators.  A career soldier, his 30+ years of service have been invaluable to the safety of the United States.

His two sons, Logan and David "Hesh" Walker, are also active duty operators - performing S&R/Recon outside the wall.

Captain Walker has been nominated for the Congressional Medal of Honor, multiple Silver and Bronze stars, but has declined to receive any, preferring anonymity.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_20_BODY:
Age: 28
Rank: Lieutenant
Birthplace: San Diego, CA

David Walker ("HESH") is the oldest son of Captain Elias T. Walker, RET.  His brother, Logan Walker, also serves in the same Outside the Wall (OTW) Recon team.

Lt. Walker has received numerous commendations for operations near the border zone, referred to as No Man's Land.  His superiors have called him a "...natural born leader."

At this time, he is being considered as a top tier candidate for Task Force: STALKER.
MENU_SP_VF_FILE_21_BODY:
Age: 41
Rank: Captain
Birthplace: Sacramento, CA

Thomas A. Merrick ("MERRICK") joined the United States Navy at age 17, and quickly became one of the youngest recruits to ever complete SEAL training. He was later assigned to SEAL Team Two, deploying to the Middle East.

He was one of fifteen survivors of an operation near the Iran border. He was later assigned to Task Force STALKER (GHOST), where he currently resides as team leader in the field.

Merrick is the third generation of his family to serve with the U.S. Military.  His grandfather, Clyde E. Merrick, was killed in Normandy during Operation Neptune. His father, SSgt. Nicholas "Bull" Merrick, was killed in Fallujah.
