HUD_THRUST: [ T H R U S T ]
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_THERMAL: Magnified optic that shows enemy heat signatures.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_ELO: Emitted Light Optic with a floating illuminated reticle.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_HYBRID: Variable Magnification Compensator sight. Hold ^3[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to engage zoom, enabling recoil stability and target illumination.
ATTACHMENTS_HYBRID_NO_ALT: Variable Magnification Compensator sight with fixed zoom, recoil, and target illumination.
ATTACHMENTS_ZOOMSCOPE: 16x scope with variable Scout Sight functionality.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_VARIABLE_ZOOM_SCOPE: While scoped in, press ^3[{+changezoom}]^7 to adjust between 3 different zoom levels.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_OSCOPE: Upgrades the default optics to outline enemy targets.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_SILENCER: Invisible on radar when firing and reduces muzzle flash. Shortens effective damage range.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_SILENCER_ENERGY: Invisible on radar when firing and reduces muzzle flash. Shortens effective damage range.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_SILENCER_SONIC: Invisible on radar when firing. Shortens effective damage range.
ATTACHMENTS_GRENADE_LAUNCHER_ATTACHMENT2: Under Barrel mounted grenade launcher. Tap ^3[{+frag}]^7 to fire quickly or hold for precision aiming.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_SHOTGUN: Under Barrel mounted, semi-auto shotgun that can be fired instantly with ^3[{+frag}]^7.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_CPU: Reduces sway when aiming down sights.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_FMJ: Increases bullet penetration and damage against equipment.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_REFLECT: Creates additional reflections on energy shots. Increases damage against equipment.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_XMAGS_ENERGY: Rapidly generates energy ammo, even when stowed.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_XMAGS_SONIC: Rapidly generates energy ammo, even when stowed.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_SMART: Integrated IFF system that guides pellets to target while aiming down sights.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_ROF_ENERGY: Increased battery cycling rate for faster shots per minute.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_FAST_AIM: Custom grip for fast aiming down sights.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_HIP_AIM: Reduces bullet spread when firing from the hip.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_STOCK: Increases maneuverability while aiming down sights.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_BARREL_BORED: Increases damage with increased kick and slower aim time.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_BARREL_BORED_ENERGY: Increases damage with increased kick and slower aim time.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_FIRE_TYPE_AUTO: Converts the gun into a full-auto weapon.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_FIRE_TYPE_AUTO_ENERGY: Converts the gun into a full-auto weapon.
ATTACHMENTS_ENHANCED_ZOOM_ACOG_SCOPE: Range Increasing Combat Optic with enhanced zoom. Hold ^3[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to activate the projected reticle for close quarters engagements.
ATTACHMENTS_ACOG_NO_ALT: Range Increasing Combat Optic with enhanced zoom.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_PHASE_SIGHT: Tracking optic that outlines enemies, even through smoke.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_M4: Shots that hit enemies outline them for a short time.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_AKE: Increases the damage output per round with the trade-off of the weapon firing in a semi-auto mode
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_FMG: Advanced chip changes the akimbo mode into two short-range but powerful energy shotguns.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_SDFAR: Software hack that enables the R3K to fire in full-auto mode.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_MAULER: Heavier rounds fire out of the weapon slower, but with the trade-off that they do a lot more damage.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_SDFLMG: Allows the RAW to carry double the ammo capacity of normal.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_LMG03: Hotwires your Titan to fire faster, stronger rounds, but adds a short charge up time.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_ERAD: Converts the primary fire mode of the ERAD to be a slow firing, vertical spread shot. Hold ^3[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to have the weapon create a horizontal pattern instead.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_CRB: Burst-fire Karma-45 that has increased stability and high caliber rounds. Rewards accuracy with increased damage output.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_RIPPER: Primary fire-mode of the RPR Evo is switched to burst-fire, giving the weapon increased range and damage.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_FHR: Full Metal Jacket rounds allow the rounds to penetrate thin walls and fire through cover.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_SONIC: Upgrades the deafening effect of the Banshee so that it can stun C6s.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_EMC: Modifies the EMC to fire a spread-shot blast of energy.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_NRG: Reduced fall-off damage at the cost of a slower fire rate.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_G18: Part swaps the Kendall 44 into the Hornet, a full-auto variant.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_M8: After a small charge-up, the ERB-800 shoots three rapid-fire blasts.
ATTACHMENTS_DESC_EPIC_KBS: Increases the amount of ammo the Longbow carries and heavily reduces sway while scoped in.

PERKS_DESC_BOMB_SQUAD: Detect enemy explosives and tactical equipment.
PERKS_DESC_SELECTIVE_HEARING: Louder enemy footsteps makes them easier to detect. Allows you to hear Dead Silence players.
PERKS_DESC_WEAPON_READY_FASTER: Weapon is ready faster after sprinting.
PERKS_DESC_SWAP_WEAPONS_FASTER: Swap weapons and use equipment faster.
PERKS_DESC_OVERKILL: Carry two primary weapons. ^2 Weapons stowed on your back auto-reload after a short time.^7
PERKS_DESC_IRON_LUNGS: Identify enemy targets at longer range.
PERKS_CHARGE_OF_PLASTIC_EXPLOSIVES: Charge of plastic explosives, set off manually with a detonator.
PERKS_DESC_C4: High explosives that stick to surfaces and can be detonated remotely with [{+frag}] or by double-tapping [{+reload}].
PERKS_DESC_PROXIMITY_EXPLOSIVE: Improvised proximity explosive device that sticks to the environment. Arms shortly after deployment.
PERKS_DESC_CREATE_A_STREAK_REWARDS: Create and customize your Assault and Support Strike Packages.
PERKS_DESC_SPECIALIST_STRIKE_PACKAGE: Create and customize your Specialist Strike Package.
PERKS_COMPLETE_THE_MARKSMAN: Complete the Marksman challenge for this weapon.
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV5: Unlocked at Private First Class I (Lv5).
PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV6: Unlocked at Private First Class II (Lv6).

PERKS_UNLOCKED_AT_LV39: Unlocked at Command Sergeant Major III (Lv39).
PERKS_DESC_FINALSTAND: Get back up after being wounded.
PERKS_UPGRADE_QUICKDRAW: +Recover from equipment and grenade usage quicker.
PERKS_DESC_RECOVER_QUICKER: Recover from equipment and grenade usage quicker.
PERKS_DESC_HARDLINE: Gain bonus points for each non-scorestreak kill up to 8 kills per life.  2 Assists will give you the same bonus.
PERKS_UPGRADE_HARDLINE: Every two assists counts as a kill towards your killstreak.
PERKS_DESC_FRAG_GRENADE: Hold to control fuse time, remember to release. Produces lethal radius damage upon detonation.
PERKS_DESC_SEMTEX: Timed explosive device that starts its countdown on release. Sticks to any surface.
PERKS_DESC_THROWING_KNIFE: Retrievable knife that causes instant death on impact.
PERKS_DESC_THROWING_KNIFE_C4: Retrievable explosive that detonates on contact with any biological matter.
PERKS_DESC_THROWING_KNIFE_TELE: Launch to victim's location on impact.
PERKS_RIOT_SHIELD: Ballistic-proof and explosive-resistant blunt shield weapon.
PERKS_DESC_SHARPSHOOTER: Play as the Scout Sniper Class.
PERKS_DESC_CROWD_CONTROL: Play as the Riot Control Class.
PERKS_DESC_CREATE_A_CLASS: Create and customize your own character classes.
PERKS_DESC_CHALLENGES: Complete Challenges to gain experience and unlock a variety of items.
PERKS_DESC_GHILLIE_ARCTIC: You will now be camouflaged when sniping in snowy environments.
PERKS_DESC_GHILLIE_DESERT: You will now be camouflaged when sniping in desert environments.
PERKS_DESC_GHILLIE_URBAN: You will now be camouflaged when sniping in urban environments.
PERKS_DESC_BOUNCING_BETTY: Launches into the air before detonating.
PERKS_DESC_ASSAULT: Your streak count resets upon death.  Rewards punish the other team.
PERKS_DESC_SUPPORT: Your streak count persists through death.  Rewards support your team.
PERKS_DESC_SPECIALIST: Earn extra perks through your streak.  The streak and rewards reset upon death.
PERKS_DESC_TROPHY: Deployable autonomous defense system that destroys up to two incoming explosives.
PERKS_DESC_STUN_RESISTANCE:
Increase resistance to flash and stun effects. 
 
Counters: 
■ Jammer Grenade (Stun effects) 
■ Blackout Grenade
■ Cryo Mine
■ Melee Stun
PERKS_DESC_DEADSILENCE:
Footsteps and jump packs are silenced. 
 
Countered by: 
■ Tracker
PERKS_DESC_UAV: Get a UAV when you spawn.
PERKS_DESC_SENSOR_GRENADE: Outlines enemies on your hud. Temporarily disorients and slows enemies on explode.
PERKS_DESC_GRAVITY_GRENADE: Temporarily stuns and lifts targets into the air.
PERKS_DESC_CLUSTER_GRENADE: Grenade that splits into additional mini grenades upon impact.  The longer you cook, the more grenades it will spawn.
PERKS_DESC_SMOKE_GRENADE: Temporarily creates a smoke screen that obscures sight and blocks automated targeting systems. ^2Cannot be used with Extra Tactical perk.^7
PERKS_DESC_BLINDEYE:
Undetectable by AI targeting systems, including air and ground scorestreaks and payloads. 
 
Counters: 
■ Vulture 
■ Shock Sentry 
■ Warden 
■ R-C8 
■ Micro Turret
PERKS_UPGRADE_BLINDEYE: +Launchers lock-on quicker. Extra bullet damage versus air support and sentries.
PERKS_UPGRADE_ASSASSIN: No red crosshair or name when targeted.
PERKS_DESC_PAINT: Enemies hit with explosive damage are tagged and can be seen through objects for a short time.
PERKS_UPGRADE_PAINT: +Bullet damage paints the target on the mini-map.
PERKS_DESC_MARKSMAN: Acquire enemy names from a greater distance. Reduced flinch that primarily affects sniper rifles but gives a very minor benefit to other weapons.
PERKS_DESC_DEEP_IMPACT: Bullets carry more damage through materials.
PERKS_DESC_SHARPFOCUS: Reduced weapon sway when aiming down sights and reduced flinch when hit.
PERKS_DESC_HOLDBREATHWHILEADS: Hold breath while aiming down the sights.
PERKS_DESC_REDUCEDSWAY: Reduced weapon sway while aiming down the sights.
PERKS_DESC_MOVE_QUIETLY: Move silently, making you harder to detect. Players with Amplify can still hear your footsteps.
PERKS_DESC_STEADY_AIM_PRO: Increased hip fire accuracy while moving.
PERKS_DESC_9BANG_GRENADE: Holding produces more flashes to blind enemies. Fully cooked 9-Bangs create an EMP effect that stuns electronics.
PERKS_DESC_EXPLOSIVE_DAMAGE: Damage dealt with explosives goes through blast shield.
PERKS_DESC_THERMOBARIC_GRENADE: Fuel-air grenade that creates a large but low damage blast radius and weakens armor.
PERKS_DESC_TACTICAL_STREAKTYPE: Your choice to be offensive or defensive.  The streak and rewards reset upon death.
PERKS_DESC_EXTRA_EQUIPMENT: Additional Tactical equipment. Does not work with Smoke and Exo Trophy.
PERKS_DESC_STUN_IMMUNE: Additional protection and virtually immune to stuns and flashbangs.
PERKS_DESC_MORTAR_SHELL: Mixed chemical bomb that has to be primed before release and detonates shortly after throwing.
PERKS_PULL_OUT_YOUR_PISTOL: Pull your secondary weapon before you die
PERKS_DESC_MOTION_SENSOR: Triggered by enemy proximity. Tags the target, allowing them to be tracked through objects for a short time.
PERKS_DESC_MOBILE_RADAR: This mine will latch onto an enemy, creating a mobile ping pulse that will constantly reveal their teammates nearby.
PERKS_DESC_PITCHER: Throw equipment farther, decrease the cook time of grenades and reset the fuse when throwing back explosives.
PERKS_DESC_BOOM: Kills and assists activate a minimap ping at the enemy's location.
PERKS_DESC_SILENTKILL: Kill enemies without revealing their death locations.
PERKS_DESC_TRIGGERHAPPY: Auto-reload after a non killstreak kill.
PERKS_DESC_DEADEYE: Consecutive kills increase the chance to deal more damage with bullet weapons.
PERKS_DESC_NOPLAYERTARGET: Undetectable by player controlled killstreaks: ODIN, Oracle, Helo Pilot, Trinity Rocket, and Gryphon.
PERKS_DESC_GPSJAMMER:
Invisible to UAV and radar pings. 
 
Counters: 
■ UAVs (except the Advanced UAV)
■ Ping 
■ Relay
PERKS_DESC_INCOG: Resistant to targeting systems including: Recon, Thermal Scope, Tracker Sight and Motion Sensor. No name, red crosshairs, or enemy call-outs when targeted.
PERKS_AR_BREN: Fully automatic. Next generation modular weapon that is strong and versatile overall.
PERKS_AR_HONEYBADGER: Fully automatic. Integrated ^5Silencer^7 keeps your shots off the radar.
PERKS_AR_SC2010: Fully automatic. Redesigned barrel provides longer range with reduced recoil for higher accuracy.
PERKS_AR_AK12: Fully automatic. Increased damage with an improved design for less recoil.
PERKS_AR_ARX160: Fully automatic. High rate of fire, reduced recoil for the first 3 rounds, and a ^5Laser Sight^7 for increased hip-fire accuracy.
PERKS_AR_MSBS: ^53 Round Burst^7 allows for high damage output. Fast rate of fire in full auto.
PERKS_AR_R5RGP: Fully automatic. High damage output and range combined with a reduced fire rate for stability.
PERKS_AR_AR57: Full-auto ballistic rifle.  Channels a fast fire rate through a ^5lightweight mold^7 for increased hip fire control and mobility.
PERKS_AR_AKE: Full-auto energy rifle.  Deploys best-in-class stopping power at a low, dependable fire rate.
PERKS_AR_AKE_SEMI: Semi-auto energy rifle.  Deploys best in class stopping power with single shot action.
PERKS_AR_ARACC: Full-auto Ballistic assault rifle. Highest fire rate and stability with moderate damage.
PERKS_AR_M4: Full-auto ballistic rifle.  A moderate fire rate yields increased stability for best-in-class accuracy.  Ideal for mid to long range engagement.
PERKS_AR_M4_BURST: 2-Round burst Ballistic assault rifle.  Moderate fire rate for increased stability. Highest accuracy in class.
PERKS_SMG_CRB: Full-auto ballistic firearm.  Built-in ^5dual magazines^7 provide faster reloads and increased ammo capacity.
PERKS_SNIPER_KBS: Bolt-action ballistic rifle.  One shot, one kill from the waist up.  Rechambering breaks scope aim.
PERKS_SNIPER_M8: Semi-auto energy rifle.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to activate ^5assault rifle mode^7 for automatic fire and reduced power consumption.
PERKS_SNIPER_M8_CHARGE: Charged 3-Round burst energy rifle. Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to activate ^5assault rifle mode^7 for automatic fire and reduced power consumption.
PERKS_SNIPER_CHEYTAC: 2-round burst bolt-action ballistic rifle.  Features a unique ^5chamber stack^7 for predictable two round burst fire and a ^5lightweight mold^7 for increased mobility.

PERKS_DMR_M1: Semi-auto ballistic rifle.  Updated design retains the ^5top-loading clip^7 while granting moderate stopping power and low recoil.  Allows early clip ejection.
PERKS_DMR_M1_CLASSIC: Semi-auto ballistic rifle.  An old, reliable service rifle with moderate stopping power and low recoil.  The ^5top-loading clip^7 must be exhausted to reload.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_SPAS: Pump-action ballistic shotgun.  12 gauge ^5terrestrial ammo^7 provides superior stopping power, while the ^5integrated choke^7 increases ADS accuracy.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_SPAS_CLASSIC: Pump-action ballistic shotgun.  An esteemed and rugged firearm that trades a slow rechamber rate for incredible range and stopping power.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_SONIC: Pump-action sonic shotgun.  Employs a high decibel ^5acoustic driver^7 yielding balanced stopping power and fire rate.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_SDFSHOTTY: Full-auto energy shotgun.  Rapid fire capability is supported by a ^5high-capacity power cell^7.
PERKS_LAUNCHER_GLPROX: Grenade launcher.  Launches quick, deadly projectiles that explode on impact.
PERKS_SUPER_BLACKHOLEGUN_DESC: Fires a projectile that distorts gravity, sucking in enemies and exploding on impact.
PERKS_PISTOL_G18: Semi-auto ballistic pistol.  Allows ultra-fast trigger cycling in a ^5lightweight mold^7 for increased hip fire control.
PERKS_PISTOL_G18_FATAL: Semi-automatic pistol. Extremely high damage with very few bullets.
PERKS_PISTOL_G18_CLASSIC: Full-auto ballistic pistol.  Delivers the highest fire rate and recoil across all weapon classes.
PERKS_AR_FMG: Full-auto energy rifle.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to split the rifle into ^5akimbo auto-pistol mode^7 for close quarter combat.   Features the highest fire rate in class.
PERKS_AR_FMG_SHTGN: Full-auto energy rifle.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to split the rifle into ^5akimbo semi-auto shotgun mode^7 for close quarter combat.   Features the highest fire rate in class.
PERKS_BEAM_STEELDRAGON: Powerful energy beam with auto tracking.
PERKS_RAIL_RAILGUN: High powered rail gun that penetrates any surface.
PERKS_REAPERBLADE: Fast melee weapon with increased range.
PERKS_SMG_CBJMS: Fully automatic. Highest rate of fire in its class with custom ^5Armor-Piercing^7 tungsten rounds.
PERKS_SMG_K7: Fully automatic. Integrated ^5Silencer^7 allows for best effective silenced range in its class.
PERKS_SMG_MICROTAR: Fully automatic. Rifle-class range with large ammo capacity and SMG handling.
PERKS_AR_FADS: Fully automatic. Highest rate of fire in its class, with moderate recoil.

PERKS_SMG_VEPR: Fully automatic. Largest ammo capacity in its class with low recoil.
PERKS_SMG_KRISS: Fully automatic. .45 ACP rounds provide highest damage in its class with increased wall penetration.
PERKS_SMG_ERAD: Full-auto energy firearm.  A wide ^5dispersion muzzle^7 dampens recoil, providing highest accuracy in class.

PERKS_SMG_ERAD_BEAM: Beam energy firearm. An exotic design of unknown origin; some speculate it was a prototype for the Steel Dragon.

PERKS_SMG_UMP45_AKIMBO: Twin full-auto ballistic firearms.  Uses heavy ^5terrestrial ammo^7 for best in class stopping power.

PERKS_SMG_FHR: Full-auto ballistic firearm.  Offsets a modest range with an extreme fire rate thanks to a unique ^5magnetic bolt carrier^7.
PERKS_LMG_AMELI: Fully automatic. Increased damage and range with a slower rate of fire for stability.

PERKS_LMG_LMG03: Full-auto energy weapon.  Delivers high damage with strong recoil.
PERKS_AR_SDFAR: 3-round burst energy rifle.  Each burst applies extreme stopping power at precise intervals.
PERKS_AR_SDFAR_AUTO: Full-auto energy rifle.  Applies extreme stopping power at precise, slower, intervals.

PERKS_SNIPER_SVU: Semi-automatic. Effective at long range with moderate recoil.

PERKS_SNIPER_L115A3:
Bolt-action. Deadly from the knee up through center mass.
^5Recoil Compensator^7 reduces kick with each kill.

PERKS_SHOTGUN_FP6: Pump action. Strongest damage in its class with moderate range.

PERKS_PISTOL_EMC_SHOTGUN: Semi-auto energy pistol.  Modified to fire in a shotgun style spread pattern.
PERKS_SMG_RIPPER: Full-auto ballistic firearm.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to toggle ^5assault rifle mode^7.  An integrated ^5hybrid sight^7 enhances longer range engagements.
PERKS_SMG_RIPPER_BURST: 4-round burst ballistic firearm.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to toggle ^5Assault Rifle Mode^7.  An integrated ^5hybrid sight^7 enhances longer range engagements.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_SONIC_SONAR: Pump-action Sonic shotgun.  Press ^5[{+toggleads,+toggleads_throw,+speed_throw}]^7 to release a sonar blast, detecting nearby enemies.
PERKS_LAUNCHER_MK32: Revolving cylinder semtex launcher that fires 2 rounds in quick succession.
PERKS_LAUNCHER_RGM: Grenade launcher. Fires rounds that explode on impact.
PERKS_PLASMA_AUTO: Rapid fire plasma shot with splash damage and ricochet.
PERKS_LAUNCHER_CHARGESHOT_DESC: Charged energy launcher.  Deploys volatile plasma charges that explode for extreme splash damage.
PERKS_LAUNCHER_LOCKON_DESC: Lock-on launcher.  Primarily anti-air with an ^5optical smart lock^7, but can be dumb fired.
PERKS_KNIFE_ONLY_DESC: CQC tactical knife.  Standard military issue, employed for fast, quiet, and deadly wetwork.
PERKS_DESC_THERMAL_SNIPER: Scope that detects enemy heat signatures.
PERKS_DESC_PROTO_RICOCHET_DEVICE: When this device is deployed, it can be shot at to redirect bullets around corners or cover.
PERKS_DESC_BULLETSTORM_DEVICE: A shield that will protect the user, and charge itself from the damage absorbed.  Any stored energy will be released in an explosion when the shield ends.
PERKS_DESC_CHAIN_REACTION: Kills with explosives set off a chain reaction that increases based on the victim's remaining equipment.
PERKS_BATTLESLIDE_DESC: Gives you the ability to slide into an enemy producing a knock back effect and some damage.
PERKS_DESC_PLAYER_TROPHY_SYSTEM: Triggers a personal trophy system countermeasure for incoming projectiles.^2 Cannot be used with Extra Tactical perk.^7
PERKS_DESC_GAS_GRENADE: Temporarily creates a cloud of poisonous gas that slows and disorients enemies moving into it.
PERKS_DESC_ACTIVE_RELOAD: Press the reload button at the right time to reload faster.
PERKS_DESC_BLACKOUT_GRENADE: Cause a gradual blackout of the player's vision for a short time.
PERKS_DESC_LIFEPACK: Kills drop cooldown packs for your team, giving a temporary boost in cooldown reduction.
PERKS_DESC_ADRENALINE_MIST: Device that emits adrenaline inducing mist, giving players higher pain tolerance while surrounded by it.
PERKS_POWER_SENSORGRENADE_DESC: Bouncy grenade that outlines close enemies. Temporarily disorients and slows enemies on detonation.
PERKS_POWER_BIOSPIKE_DESC: Thrown ballistic knife that explodes on enemy impact.  Can be recovered after use.
PERKS_POWER_GASGRENADE_DESC: Temporarily creates a cloud of poisonous gas that slows and disorients enemies moving into it.
PERKS_POWER_BLINKKNIFE_DESC: Thrown high-tech knife that warps to enemy position on kill.  Can be recovered after use.
PERKS_POWER_CLUSTERGRENADE_DESC: Cookable grenade that explodes in a series of smaller blasts.
PERKS_POWER_IMPLOSION_GRENADE_DESC: Hold to control fuse time, remember to release.  Two-part explosion damage seperated by a vacuum effect.
PERKS_POWER_SPLIT_GRENADE_DESC: Splits into multiple propelled grenades on impact.
PERKS_POWER_WRISTROCKET_DESC: Rocket propelled system that delivers a timed, sticky plastique payload.
PERKS_POWER_SIEGEMODE_DESC: Transorm into a stationary turret with strong frontal armor.
PERKS_POWER_PLAYERTROPHYSYSTEM_DESC: Activates a trophy system on the player that shoots down incoming projectiles.
PERKS_POWER_SHOULDERCANNON_DESC: Shoulder mounted weapon that auto fires at enemies once activated. Can be toggled on / off with [{+frag}].
PERKS_POWER_BULLETSTORM_DESC: Collects incoming damage and explodes that damage after 2 seconds.
PERKS_POWER_KINETICPULSE_DESC: EMP radius blast that disables enemy abilities as well as stuns.
PERKS_POWER_PROXYBOMB_DESC: Bouncy grenade that detonates on contact with enemy targets.
PERKS_POWER_BOUNCINGBETTY_DESC: Deployable projectile that launches into the air before detonating.
PERKS_POWER_SMOKEGRENADE_DESC: Creates a smoke screen that blocks vision and automated targeting systems.
PERKS_POWER_BLACKOUTGRENADE_DESC: Stuns enemies, causing vision and hearing loss.
PERKS_POWER_DASH_DESC: Use [{+breath_sprint}] to quickly move in the aimed direction. Forward dashes require the user to be in the air.
PERKS_POWER_OPTICWAVE_DESC: Brief pulse that personally outlines enemies through walls.
PERKS_POWER_PERIPHVIS_DESC: Activated sensor array that tracks enemy location by heat signature.
PERKS_POWER_PHASESPLIT_DESC: Suit bends light creating a hologram decoy of the player that runs out ahead.
PERKS_POWER_DISC_MARKER_DESC: Throw down a marker for a Maverick VII missile strike.  (Best used outdoors)
PERKS_POWER_CLOAK_DESC: Turn invisible for a few seconds or until you shoot.  Sniper glint and your nameplate will not be visible to enemies, as well.
PERKS_POWER_ADRENALINE_MIST_DESC: Device that emits adrenaline inducing mist, giving players higher pain tolerance while surrounded by it.
PERKS_POWER_ENG_DRONE_DESC: Deployable drone. Hold [{+smoke}] and press [{+activate}] to cycle between drone states: ^5Defense^7 or ^5Support^7.
PERKS_POWER_CASE_BOMB_DESC: Deploy a High Explosive Case bomb. Volitile bioplasma causes chain reactions
PERKS_POWER_THERMOBARIC_DESC: Fuel-air grenade that creates a large but low damage blast radius and weakens armor.
PERKS_POWER_OVERCHARGE_DESC: Increased damage for non explosive weapons.
PERKS_POWER_DOMESHIELD_DESC: Deployable electromagnetic dome that blocks projectiles.
PERKS_POWER_THROWING_KNIFE_SMOKEWALL_DES: Thrown device that deploys a quickly forming ionic smoke wall.  Great for distraction.
PERKS_POWER_BLACKHOLE_GRENADE_DESC: Creates a singularity that pulls in enemies with crushing force.
PERKS_POWER_COPYCAT_GRENADE_DESC: Shock grenade that steals an enemy's [{+smoke}] or [{+frag}] ability.
PERKS_POWER_SPEED_STRIP_DESC: Passing through the ^5Velocity Ehancement Field^7 gives the player a temporary boost to speed and cooldown reduction.
PERKS_POWER_COMLINK_DESC: Battle positions updated in visor computer.
PERKS_POWER_EMP_GRENADE_DESC: Grenade that disables enemy suit abilities and damages equipment.
PERKS_POWER_SHARD_BALL_DESC: Sticky grenade that launches itself in the air, scattering a series of explosive shards in all directions.
PERKS_POWER_SPLASH_GRENADE_DESC: Sticky grenade that sprays burning plasma in all directions.
PERKS_POWER_CRYO_MINE_DESC: Magnetic mine that releases a supercoolant cloud, hindering movement systems.
PERKS_POWER_TELEREAP_DESC: Leap through enemy attacking with super human speed.
PERKS_POWER_FORCEPUSH_DESC: Release a wave of concussive force that stuns and pushes enemies.
PERKS_BEAM_FORGE: Plasma based beam weapon rifle, with integrated heat meter.
PERKS_POWER_KINETICWAVE_DESC: EMP wedge-shaped blast that disables enemy abilities as well as stuns.
PERKS_POWER_THROWING_REAPER_DESC: Plasma spear damages and stuns struck enemies.
PERKS_POWER_PORTAL_GENERATOR_DESC: Create a physical portal that allows anyone to enter phase shift for a short time.
PERKS_POWER_TRANSPONDER_DESC: Thrown device that allows you to instantly teleport to the device's location when activated.
PERKS_DESC_CORPSE_STEAL: Hold [{+activate}] on a corpse to scan and copy their equipment.
PERKS_POWER_SONICSENSOR_DESC: Device that detects enemy sounds via sonic pulses, revealing enemy positions.  ^5Countered by^7 equipping sound nullifying perks (^5Dead Silence^7)
PERKS_DESC_HEADGEAR:
Provides additional protection against sniper headshots.  
^1* Countered by equipping FMJ^7
PERKS_POWER_BARRIER_DESC: Fire this ability at teammates to provide them with light armor.  Land a precision shot on the head to give the ally additional protection from ^5headshots^7.
PERKS_POWER_BATTERY_DESC: Activating this ability will cause you to periodically pulse a wave, giving players in the vicinity a temporary boost to their cooldown rates.
PERKS_POWER_MORTARMOUNT_DESC: Fire a devastating mortar off your back. Use indoors at your own risk.
PERKS_POWER_REPULSOR_DESC: Release a wave of concussive force that stuns and pushes enemies.
PERKS_GROUND_POUND_SHOCK_DESC: Release an EMP on Ground Pound.
PERKS_GROUND_POUND_SHIELD_DESC: Deploy a temporary, destructible shield on Ground Pound.
PERKS_PHASE_SLIDE_DESC: Temporarily phase shift when you slide.
PERKS_TELE_SLIDE_DESC: Teleport a short distance instead of slide.
PERKS_POWER_STICKY_MINE_DESC: Mine that attaches to any surface.
PERKS_POWER_TRIP_MINE_DESC: Magnetic mine that detonates when an enemy interrupts the beam.
PERKS_PHASESLASH_REPHASE_DESC: After a successful kill using melee, automatically go into Cloak
PERKS_DESC_SIXTH_SENSE: Your HUD pulses yellow when enemies out of your view are targeting you.
PERKS_POWER_ADRENALINE_DESC: Activated combat stimulant that super-charges health regeneration.
PERKS_MULTIVISOR_DESC: Gain multiple vision sets at once (^5Thermal^7, ^5SitRep^7, and ^5Phase-Vision^7).  Times out after ^510 seconds^7.
PERKS_POWER_STEALTH_MODE_DESC: Gives all stealth perks for a set time and adds a silencer to your weapon.
PERKS_POWER_DISRUPTOR_DESC: Thrown device that sights in on enemy optics and sends a focused shock at them.  Most effective if the enemy is currently in ADS.
PERKS_HARDWIRED_DESC:
Immune to EMP effects, blocks equipment or abilities that outline you for enemies, and hides you from scorestreak tracking missiles. 
 
Counters: 
■ Trojan Sight 
■ Pulsar 
■ Counter UAVs
■ Tracker footprints
■ Pin Point 
■ Marked Target 
■ Jammer Grenade (EMP effects) 
■ Centurion (EMP effects)
PERKS_DESC_PULSE_GRENADE: Sticky grenade that emits 3 medium damage AoE pulse waves.
PERKS_BATTLESLIDE_OFFENSE_DESC: Greatly increase the lethality of Battle Slide.
PERKS_POWER_NIAGARA_DESC: Airburst grenade launcher that showers your enemies with explosives on detonate.  Press [{+attack}] once to fire, and again to detonate in mid air.
PERKS_POWER_SIPHONKNIFE_DESC: Siphon power from your enemies and use it to empower your defenses and health regeneration.
PERKS_AURA_REGEN_DESC:
^5Morale Boost^7
Health regen gets a boost after a kill.  Nearby teammates will also benefit.
PERKS_AURA_QUICKSWAP_DESC:
^5Morale Boost^7
After a kill, you gain faster reloading of weapons temporarily.  Nearby teammates will also get this benefit.
PERKS_AURA_SPEED_DESC:
^5Morale Boost^7
After a kill, gain a small speed boost for a short amount of time.  Nearby allies will also benefit from this.
PERKS_MARK_TARGETS_DESC: Damaging enemies with gunfire will mark them for death, preventing regen for 5 seconds.
PERKS_BULLET_OUTLINE_DESC:
Outline enemies when dealing or taking weapon damage. 
 
Countered by: 
■ Hardwired
PERKS_BATTERY_PACK_DESC: Kills drop cooldown reduction packs for your team.
PERKS_CAMO_ELITE_DESC: Camo systems activate when they detect enemies that are targeting you.  Duration = ^54 seconds^7
PERKS_POWER_CHARGEMODE_DESC: Sprint grants a mounting speed increase. Buck your foes out of the way on impact, damaging and disorienting them.
PERKS_POWER_ARC_GRENADE_DESC: Discharges electric shock to nearby enemies. Electricity will continue to arc to affected enemies that are too close to each other for a short time.
PERKS_POWER_AMMO_BOX_DESC: Deploy an ammo station for your allies.
PERKS_POWER_PORTAL_GRENADE_DESC: A grenade that applies an extreme reverse gravitational impulse against any enemy within the blast radius.
PERKS_POWER_VIRUS_GRENADE_DESC: Infects enemy suits, temporarily blocks regenerative systems. The virus can spread to enemies near the virus host.
PERKS_SCORESTREAK_PACK_DESC: Kills drop bonus scorestreak point packs for your team.
PERKS_SUPER_PACK_DESC: Kills drop Payload cooldown packs for your team.
PERKS_POWER_FEAR_GRENADE_DESC: Places a mine. Upon detonation, releases nanomachines that hack enemy Visors, causing them to see threats that are not real.
PERKS_POWER_DISTORTIONFIELD_GRENADE_DESC: This device deploys an aerial cloaking system that provides visual cover to those that are inside its sphere of influence.  Note that you are still vulnerable to all damage types, including ^5EMP^7 and ^5explosives^7, but you will be harder to pin down.
PERKS_POWER_ATTACK_DRONE_DESC: Sends out an attack drone. Can manually be called back with [{+frag}]. Self destruct sequence can be initiated by double-tapping [{+reload}].
PERKS_POWER_EXPLODING_DRONE_DESC: Launched aerial drone that explodes on impact or remotely with [{+frag}] or by double-tapping [{+reload}].
PERKS_ENHANCED_SIXTH_SENSE_DESC: Detects off screen enemies viewing the player, depicted by on screen indicators.
PERKS_CLOAK_DESC: Sprint to charge and activate cloak.  Cloak then stays active for another 5 seconds, until sprinting has ceased, or lethal actions have been performed. Wallrunning and jumping will not break Cloak.
PERKS_DODGE_WAVE_DESC: Whenever you dodge, create a small EMP wedge-shaped blast that disables enemy abilities as well as stuns.
PERKS_POWER_CONE_FLASH_DESC: Fires a blinding wave of force that increases your armor with each target hit.
PERKS_POWER_SPIDER_GRENADE_DESC: Autonomous sticky device that seeks out nearby enemies and explodes.
PERKS_MELEEKILL_DESC: All melee strikes use fists and are lethal. Riotshield excluded.
PERKS_SPRINTFIRE_DESC: Shoot, use equipment and scorestreaks while sprinting.
PERKS_POWER_HACK_KNIFE_DESC: Nanomachines infiltrate enemy rigs, turning them to your side for a short time.
PERKS_POWER_CONCUSSION_GRENADE_DESC: Jams enemy mini-map, movement, and aiming systems.  Effective against equipment.
PERKS_DESC_POWERCELL: Tacticals and Lethals refresh on cooldowns.
PERKS_DESC_COLD_BLOODED:
Invisible to thermal detection systems.  Enemies cannot see your nameplate. 
 
Counters:
■ Thermal Sights 
■ Perception
■ Personal Radar
PERKS_DESC_ENGINEER:
Detect enemy equipment and scorestreaks through walls and delay activation of enemy mines. Plant the bomb silently in bomb objective game modes.
 
Counters:
■ Trip Mines
■ Cryo Mines
■ Relay
PERKS_DESC_TRACKER_PERK:
See recent enemy trails, even when they are cloaked.  
 
Counters:
■ Dead Silence
■ Active Camo
PERKS_GROUND_POUND_DESC: Press [{+specialmove,+melee_zoom}] while in the air to perform a devastating ground slam.
PERKS_DODGE_DESC: Execute a quick move in any direction by pressing the [{+specialmove,+sprint}] button.
PERKS_PERSONAL_TROPHY_DESC: Portable trophy system that will destroy one incoming lethal grenade and then recharge.
PERKS_DISRUPTOR_PUNCH_DESC: When using melee, an additional knockback is applied to enemies just outside of melee range.  Capable of knocking enemies out of ^5Phase Shift^7
PERKS_DESC_EQUIPMENT_PING: Placed equipment will alert the player of nearby enemies on the minimap.  Thrown equipment will paint enemy targets upon detonation.
PERKS_DESC_RUGGED_EQP: Placed equipment has increased protection from damage and will also persist through death, which gives you 1 extra piece of equipment you can have active.
PERKS_DESC_MAN_AT_ARMS: Start with maximum ammo capacity and weapons no longer slow default movement.
PERKS_RUSHDOWN_DESC: Improved thrusters allow energy to recover faster and also damage enemy players below.
PERKS_WALL_LOCK_DESC: Lock to a wallrunning surface for a short time when going into ADS.  Length of time is determined by how much of the boost meter is left.
PERKS_DESC_RUSH: After each kill, gain a brief boost to movement speed.
PERKS_DESC_MOMENTUM: Sprint faster over time.  Jumping, sliding, and wall running will reset your momentum.
PERKS_SHOCKER_DESC: Targets of this upgraded knife get electrocuted
PERKS_DESC_HOVER: While in the air after boost jumping, activate ADS to hover in place for a couple seconds.  Caution: Hover will deplete the rest of your boost meter.
PERKS_DESC_SCAVENGER_EQP: Resupply lethals and tacticals by picking up ammo boxes after successful kills with non-explosive ballistic or energy weapons.
PERKS_DESC_PHASE_FALL: Press ^5[{+togglecrouch}]^7 while in the air to quickly shift to the ground, knocking enemies directly below into phase briefly.
PERKS_DESC_EXPANDED_MINIMAP: Minimap shows a larger area.  Gain a single radar sweep when a standard enemy UAV appears and another when it dies.
PERKS_DESC_FASTSLIDE: Gain increased sliding distance and the ability to ADS while sliding while using less boost meter.
PERKS_DESC_IMPROVED_PRONE: Improves overall movement speed while in a prone state.
PERKS_DESC_SUPPORT_KILLSTREAKS: Disables the reset of scorestreaks on death while making scorestreaks cost increasingly more points.  You can only earn each of your scorestreaks once per match.
PERKS_DESC_BLAST_SUPPRESSOR: Prevent boost jumping from putting you on the mini-map.
PERKS_DESC_CLOAK_AERIAL: Cloaking systems engage while in an active wallrun
PERKS_SLASHER_DESC: Melee attacks get up close and personal with this lightweight tactical knife
PERKS_DESC_SPAWN_RADAR: Reveals general position and direciton of nearby enemies for a short time after spawn.
PERKS_AR_ARCLASSIC: Full-auto ballistic rifle.  Celebrated for rapid, powerful fire and an ^5integrated grenade launcher^7.
PERKS_DESC_THIEF: Improved speed and distance on melee.  Upon landing a successful melee attack, you will receive a copy of the victim's primary weapon.
PERKS_DESC_IMPROVED_MELEE: Melee attacks are now slightly faster and close from an extended distance.
PERKS_DESC_ADS_AWARENESS: Audio cues provide advance warning of fast moving or aerial hostiles. Getting lower to the ground will increase the range of detection.
PERKS_SP_LAUNCHER_LOCKON_DESC: Anti-air launcher. Supports straight dumb fire and locking-on to air targets. (No ammo crate refills)
PERKS_SP_BEAM_STEELDRAGON: Powerful energy beam with auto tracking. (No ammo crate refills)
PERKS_SP_ATOMIZER_DESC: Experimental energy based handgun that blasts victims into a cloud of mist. (No ammo crate refills)
PERKS_SP_LAUNCHER_CHARGESHOT_DESC: Charge up plasma launcher with extreme splash damage. (No ammo crate refills)
PERKS_SP_PENETRATOR_DESC: Highly accurate electromagnetic projectile launcher with increased penetration capability. (No ammo crate refills)
PERKS_DESC_REARGUARD: Equips a back shield that provides protection against an attack from behind including melee attacks.
PERKS_LMG_MAULER_MPL: Full-auto heavy ballistic weapon.  Augmented with a unique ^5nanofluid coolant^7 that lets it fire ^550mm Jackal rounds^7, albeit slowly.
PERKS_THROWING_AXE_DESC: An ancient ceremonial axe used primarily for executions.  Can be thrown by using [{+speed_throw}].
PERKS_AXE_DESC: A standard wood axe, perfect for making kindling out of your enemies.
PERKS_AR_RVN: 2-round burst, auto-fire, energy rifle.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to split the rifle into ^5melee mode^7 for faster movement and 1 hit kills.
PERKS_PISTOL_UDM45: Full-auto ballistic pistol built from modular pieces.  This configuration has a slow fire rate but high damage that is effective at longer ranges.
PERKS_PISTOL_UDM45_SNIPER: Semi-auto ballistic pistol built from modular pieces.  This configuration is equipped with a sniper scope and outputs sniper-class damage in a lightweight package.
PERKS_PISTOL_NRG_BLOODANVIL: Full-auto energy pistol.  Features a ^5harmonic microcontroller^7 that fires at an extreme rate then stabilizes over time.
PERKS_AR_VR: Full-auto energy rifle.  ^5Advanced recoil compensator^7 provides focused hip fire.  Aiming down sights increases fire rate.  ^5Integrated optics^7 provide enhanced detection capabilities.
PERKS_SMG_CRDB: Full-auto ballistic firearm.  ^5Dual barrels^7 and ^5dual magazines^7 provide both increased bullets down range and faster reloads.
PERKS_LMG_MINILMG: Full-auto ballistic minigun.  Sustained fire allows the rate of fire to climb for maximum bullets downrange.
PERKS_LMG_MINILMG_AKIMBO: Full-auto ballistic ^5akimbo^7 minigun.  Sustained fire allows the rate of fire to climb for maximum bullets downrange.
PERKS_SMG_MP28: Full-auto ballistic firearm.  Modest fire rate and magazine grip provide natural stability.
PERKS_SMG_MP28_LAUNCHER: Full-auto ballistic firearm.  Modest fire rate and magazine grip provide natural stability.  Built in ^5gas-propelled grenade launcher^7 adds an additional explosive to your arsenal.
PERKS_SNIPER_BA50CAL: Single fire ballistic rifle.  Powerful, high caliber bullets allow for one shot, one kill capability anywhere on the body at the cost of aim assist.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_MOD2187: Lever action ballistic shotgun.  Advanced materials provide the longest range shotgun in class.
PERKS_SNIPER_BA50CAL_EPIC: Single fire ballistic rifle with two available rounds.  Powerful, high caliber bullets allow for one shot, one kill capability on any part of the body.
PERKS_AR_AKE_BAL: Full-auto ballistic rifle.  Deploys best-in-class stopping power at a low, dependable fire rate.  The built in Ballistic Conversion Kit overrides energy attachments to perform as their ballistic equivalents.
PERKS_AR_GAUSS: Semi-auto ^5gauss rifle^7 that fires ^5electromagnetically propelled bullets^7.  Aiming down sights charges the weapon to fire a more powerful shot at ^5max charge^7.
PERKS_SNIPER_LONGSHOT: Pump action sniper/shotgun hybrid rifle that fires shotgun rounds in highly concentrated trajectories while aiming down sight.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to toggle ^5shotgun mode^7 which provides short range firepower at wider dispersions.  Highly effective on targets from the neck up.
PERKS_PISTOL_MAG: Single fire ballistic revolver.  Fanning the hammer provides faster fire from the hip that gets increasingly more accurate.
PERKS_AR_GAUSS_BURST: 4-round burst, auto-fire, ^5gauss rifle^7.  Aiming down sights charges the weapon to fire more powerful bullets at ^5max charge^7.
PERKS_AR_GAUSS_BURST2: 2-round burst, auto-fire, ^5gauss rifle^7.  Aiming down sights charges the weapon to fire more powerful bullets at ^5max charge^7.
PERKS_AR_GAUSS_BURST3: 3-round burst, auto-fire, ^5gauss rifle^7.  Aiming down sights charges the weapon to fire more powerful bullets at ^5max charge^7.
PERKS_SNIPER_LONGSHOT_EPIC: Pump action sniper/shotgun hybrid rifle that fires shotgun rounds in highly concentrated trajectories while aiming down sight.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to toggle ^5shotgun mode^7 which provides short range firepower at wider dispersions.  Highly effective on targets from the chest up.
PERKS_SHOTGUN_MOD2187_EPIC: Lever action ballistic shotgun.  Advanced materials provide the longest range shotgun in class.  Damage to extremities is increased.
PERKS_SMG_TACBURST: 3-round burst ballistic firearm.  Accurate at longer ranges but can be fired quickly at the expense of accuracy.  Comes with a built in ^5EMP launcher^7 that detonates on impact.
PERKS_SMG_TACBURST_EPIC: 4-round burst, auto-fire, ballistic firearm.  Accurate at longer ranges.  Comes with a built in ^5EMP launcher^7 that detonates on impact.
PERKS_LMG_UNSALMG: Full-auto ballistic weapon.  Best in class ^5initial^7 accuracy and range but has limited ammo capacity.  The built in underbarrel fires a tactical ^5Smoke Drone^7 that moves down range while producing visual cover.
PERKS_LMG_UNSALMG_EPIC: 3-round burst ballistic weapon.  Best in class ^5initial^7 accuracy and range but has limited ammo capacity.  The built in underbarrel fires a tactical ^5Smoke Drone^7 that moves down range while producing visual cover.
PERKS_LAUNCHER_VENOMX_DESC: Experimental projectile launcher with two modes.  Press [{+attack}] once to fire a long range projectile that sticks on impact.  Press [{+speed_throw}] to quickly shoot shorter range projectiles with lower damage.
PERKS_KATANA_DESC: Slice and dice opponents at an extended range.  Press [{+attack}] or [{+speed_throw}] to attack.
PERKS_NUNCHUCKS_DESC: Pulverize enemies with this melee weapon that acquires targets in a wider range.  Press [{+attack}] or [{+speed_throw}] to attack.
PERKS_AR_M4_SINGLE: Semi-auto ballistic rifle that can switch to full-auto fire when equipped with a hybrid sight by pressing and holding ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7.  Semi-auto mode provides greater distance and stability than full-auto mode.  Ideal for long range engagements.
PERKS_PISTOL_UDM45_SNIPER_AUTO: Full-auto ballistic pistol built from modular pieces.  This configuration is equipped with a sniper scope and outputs sniper-class damage in a lightweight package.
PERKS_AR_GAUSS_AUTO: Full-auto ^5gauss rifle^7 that fires ^5electromagnetically propelled bullets^7.  Aiming down sights charges the weapon to fire a more powerful shot at ^5max charge^7.
PERKS_AR_RVN_BURST6: 6-round burst, auto-fire, energy rifle.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to split the rifle into ^5melee mode^7 for faster movement and 1 hit kills.
PERKS_AR_FMG_BURST: Full-auto energy rifle.  Hold ^5[{toggleweapalt,+weapnext}]^7 to split the rifle into ^5akimbo 4-round burst pistols^7 for close quarter combat.   Features the highest fire rate in class.
PERKS_PISTOL_G18_BURST: Semi-auto, ^5multi-round burst^7, ballistic pistol.  Allows ultra-fast trigger cycling in a ^5lightweight mold^7 for increased hip fire control.
PERKS_SNIPER_BA50CAL_EPIC2: 2-round burst ballistic sniper rifle.  Powerful, high caliber bullets allow for one shot, one kill capability on any part of the body.
PERKS_AR_M4_HB: Full-auto ballistic rifle.  This model features an ^5integrated suppressor^7 that modifies the firing characteristics in a way reminiscent of a particular weapon from the past.  Reduced effective ranges are compensated for with increased fire rate.  Ideal for mid to long range engagement.
LUA_MENU_PC_COPY_KEYS_MP_DESC: Copy your Keyboard Binds from Single Player
LUA_MENU_PC_COPY_KEYS_SP_DESC: Copy your Keyboard Binds from Multiplayer
LUA_MENU_PC_COPY_KEYS_FROM_SP: Copy Keyboard Binds from Single Player and override your Multiplayer Keyboard Binds? Note that some important keys may need to be manually bound.
LUA_MENU_PC_COPY_KEYS_FROM_MP: Copy Keyboard Binds from Multiplayer and override your Single Player Keyboard Binds?  Note that some important keys may need to be manually bound.
EUROPA_FSPAR_SWITCH: Tap ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 to switch to the F-SPAR Torch.
EUROPA_FLY_KB: Use movement keys to adjust flight path.
EUROPA_HALOJUMP_FAIL: You waited too long and missed the landing zone.
EUROPA__DBL_JUMP1: Jump - then press and hold [{+gostand}] to boost mid-air.
EUROPA_DBL_JUMP2: press and hold ^3[{+gostand}]^7 to boost mid-air
EUROPA_DBL_JUMP1: Press ^3[{+gostand}]^7 to jump, and then press and hold ^3[{+gostand}]^7 to boost.
EUROPA_HINT_EQUIP_BFG: Press ^3[{+actionslot 1}]^7 to equip F-SPAR Cannon Controller.
EUROPA_SCOPE_CONFIRM: Press ^3[{+speed_throw,+toggleads_throw,+speed_throw}]^7 to use the alternate scope.
EUROPA_HINT_SCOPE_BOTH: Hold ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 or Press ^3[{+actionslot 2}]^7 to change weapon sight.
EUROPA_CHYRON_LOCATION: E u r o p a
EUROPA_DOUBLEJUMP_MAGLEV: Press ^3[{+gostand}]^7 twice to boost onto the Maglev
EUROPA_DRONE_TUT_SWITCH: Press ^3[{+actionslot 3}]^7 to switch to Support Drone.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_YOUWONTHAVELONG11ADV: ^2Reaper: ^7You won't have long, 1-1. Advise you exfil immediately.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WOLFTAKEONEWEGOTTHEO: ^2Tee: ^7Wolf, take one, we got the others.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WOLFJUMPDOWNWEGOTYOU: ^2Sipes: ^7Wolf, jump down. We got your six.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WHATABOUTTHEAIRSHIPW: ^2Admiral Kotch: ^7What about the airship we shot down?
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WELLHAVETOSPLITUPTOT: ^2Sipes: ^7We'll have to split up to take it down!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WELLDRAWITSFIREUSEYO: ^2Tee: ^7We'll draw its fire- use your heavy weapon!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WEGOTTAGETOFFTHEXNOW: ^2Sipes: ^7We gotta get off the X, now!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WEGOTTADOUBLETIMEITH: ^2Sipes: ^7We gotta double time it here, Wolf.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WEAPONSONTHEOTHERSID: ^2Tee: ^7Weapon's on the other side. We beat ‘em to it.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WEAPONSBEHINDTHOSEDO: ^2Tee: ^7Weapon's behind those doors. All you, Wolf.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WARNINGTEMPERATURECR: ^2Computer Voice: ^7Warning, temperature critical, oxygen system, unstable.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WARNINGAIRSUPPLYREST: ^2Computer Voice: ^7Warning, air supply restri---, equip---- fail---
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_WARLORDTHISISSCAR1ST: ^2Wolf: ^7Warlord this is SCAR-1. Standing by for tasking.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_THEYBOOTEDUPAC12WOLF: ^2Tee: ^7They booted up a C12- Wolf, use your heavy weapon!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_THERMALISSPOTTYATYOU: ^2Reaper: ^7Thermal is spotty at your depth so stay alert.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_THATISWHYYOUCANNOTWI: ^2Admiral Kotch: ^7That is why you cannot win.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_TERMINALSONTHEOTHERS: ^2Tee: ^7Terminal's on the other side. Just in time.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_SURFACETEMPSNOTGEARF: ^2Sipes: ^7Surface temp’s not gear friendly, let’s keep moving.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_STICKWITHTHEGROUPTHI: ^2Sipes: ^7Stick with the group this time, T.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_SCAR1IMTAKINGHEAVYFI: ^2Reaper: ^7SCAR 1, I'm taking heavy fire. Where the hell are you?!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_REAPERWEREINSIDETHEA: ^2Wolf: ^7Reaper, we're inside the armory. Moving to secure the weapon.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_REAPERWEREINRDMOVINT: ^2Wolf: ^7Reaper, we’re in R&D, movin' to the armory.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_REAPERWEAREAPPROACHI: ^2Wolf: ^7Reaper, we are approaching the entry point. Be advised, we've encountered steady SDF presence.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_REAPERWEAPONSECURECO: ^2Wolf: ^7Reaper, weapon secure. Confirming execute order on self destruct.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_REAPERSAYAGAINYOUARE: ^2Wolf: ^7Reaper, say again! You are broken and unreadable!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_OURWEAPONSINTHEARMOR: ^2Sipes: ^7Our weapon's in the armory vault. Half a klick up.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_ONEOFOURWEAPONSFACIL: ^2Warlord: ^7One of our weapons facilities is under attack by the SDF. We believe this is part of an operation, codenamed: RIAH.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_ONCETHEWEAPONISSECUR: ^2Reaper: ^7Once the weapon is secure, I can activate the self-destruct sequence.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_MOVINGONTHETARGETNOW: ^2Wolf: ^7Moving on the target now, exfil in six mikes. Out.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_LETSGIVEEMAPROPERWEL: ^2Tee: ^7Let's give them a proper welcome, then.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_LETSGETTOTHEWEAPONBE: ^2Wolf: ^7Let’s get to the weapon before they do.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_INTELSUGGESTSTHEIRTA: ^2Warlord: ^7Intel suggests their target is a prototype weapon. Your team will extract our prototype and torch the site before SDF can locate it.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_HOWMANYDIDYOUCOMEWIT: ^2Admiral Kotch: ^7How many did you come with?
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_GETTHATHEAVYWEAPONUP: ^2Tee: ^7Get that heavy weapon up, Wolf! We'll distract 'em!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_GETHIMUPHENEEDSAIR: ^2Admiral Kotch: ^7Get him up. He needs air.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_FACILITYISDARKWEGETO: ^2Wolf: ^7Facility is dark. We get our weapon, torch the site.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_ENTRYPOINTS30METERSD: ^2Wolf: ^7Entry point’s 30 meters dead ahead. Keep moving.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_ENTERINGEUROPAATMOPS: ^2Reaper: ^7Entering Europa atmopshere. One minute, SCAR Team.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_EMERGENCYYOUHAVE2MIN: ^2PA Announcer: ^7Emergency. You have 2 minutes to reach minimum safe distance.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_DANGERTHISZONEWILLSE: ^2PA Announcer: ^7Danger. This zone will self destruct.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_DANGERSELFDESTRUCTAC_4: ^2PA Announcer: ^7Danger. Self-destruct active in this zone. Evacuate immediately.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_DANGERSELFDESTRUCTAC: ^2PA Announcer: ^7Danger. Self-destruct active. You have sixty seconds to evacuate.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_COPYWEREOSCARMIKERVI: ^2Wolf: ^7Copy, we're Oscar Mike. RV in five.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_COPYBEADVISEDSDFISAL: ^2Reaper: ^7Copy. Be advised, SDF is almost inside. Operation RIAH cannot succeed.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_COPY11WEAPONISINTHEV: ^2Reaper: ^7Copy 1-1. Weapon is in the vault. Once it's secure, I'll initiate the self-destruct sequence.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_COPY11INSERTISAVERTI: ^2Reaper: ^7Copy, 1-1. Insert is a vertical drop, North of your position.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_BOOTITUPSIPESWEREGON: ^2Wolf: ^7Boot it up, Sipes. We're gonna need it.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_BLASTSAREGETTINGCLOS: ^2Tee: ^7Blasts are getting close, we gotta push!
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_BEADVISEDSETDEFHASFI: ^2Reaper: ^7Be advised, SetDef has fifty plus infantry and machines inbound. You need to get out of there now.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_ATTENTIONBURNSEQUENC: ^2PA Announcer: ^7Attention, burn sequence will initiate in 30 seconds. Evacuate.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_ADMIRALKOTCHGUNDESTR: ^2SDF Lieutenant: ^7Admiral Kotch. Gun destroyed. Data retrieved. Initiating RIAH.
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_11WEREOFFTHETIMELINE: ^2Reaper: ^71-1, we’re off the time-line and close to bingo fuel, what’s your status?
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_11UHHTHISCANTBERIGHT: ^2Reaper: ^71-1, uhh… This can’t be right. We have an enemy carr--- ----- biggest vesse-- I have ev----
SUBTITLE_EUROPA_11TOREAPERSETDEFGUNN: ^2Wolf: ^71-1 to Reaper- SetDef gunners in the AO. Troops in contact.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEBELIEVERIAHSMISSIO: ^2Raines: ^7We believe Riah's mission was to incinerate himself along with the AATIS.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEAREAFRATERNITYOFTW: ^2Ferran: ^7We are a fraternity of two, you and I. A fifty percent attrition rate is not gonna fly.
VIDSUBTITLES_WARHASNOFRIENDSREYES: ^2Ferran: ^7War has no friends, Reyes. Perhaps my motivations were selfish, but I have no intention of fighting out here alone.
VIDSUBTITLES_VESTA3WASNTTHEONLYMI: ^2Reyes: ^7Vesta 3 wasn't the only mining colony hit by the Olympus. Collateral left a huge cache of precious metals drifting near the Sun. Those resources are UNSA property. SetDef’s got Skelters guarding a salvage team – Let’s scramble air and claim what’s ours.
VIDSUBTITLES_VENGEANCETHISISRAVEN: ^2Raven-6: ^7Vengeance, this is Raven Six, we're on final approach.
VIDSUBTITLES_UNDERTHECIRCUMSTANCE: ^2Ferran: ^7Under the circumstances he deemed the recovery too risky.
VIDSUBTITLES_UNDERSTOODCOMMANDERI: ^2Jackal Pilot: ^7Understood, Commander. I’ll ram the gun-site.
VIDSUBTITLES_UNDERSTOODADMIRALTIG: ^2Ferran: ^7Understood Admiral. Tigris is prepared for tasking.
VIDSUBTITLES_UNCLEARHELMETCAMSTOP: ^2Raines: ^7Unclear. Helmet cam stopped transmitting. It’s been 18 hours, no contact, SetDef’s made no demands.
VIDSUBTITLES_TWOSECONDSSALTALLHEN: ^2Reyes: ^7Two seconds, Salt. All he needed was two more seconds.
VIDSUBTITLES_TOWHOMITMAYCONCERNIL: ^2Ferran: ^7To whom it may concern, I lead sailors and troops, I protect them, and sooner or later, I prepare to send them into the jaws of a hell that is the bloodiest, dirtiest, most vicious kind of warfare man has been able to devise.
VIDSUBTITLES_TOPCATTHISIS11CONVOY: ^2Reyes: ^7Top Cat, this is 1-1. Convoy is down. I say again, Echo is down! Route is compromised.
VIDSUBTITLES_TOMYDEARESTWIFESARAH: ^2Omar: ^7To my dearest wife Sarah, my son Noah, and my daughter, Abby, If you are reading this, I can tell you with the utmost confidence, that I died for something right and just. The cost of war is higher than any one life, and I happily give mine in defense of my men and family.
VIDSUBTITLES_TODEFENDITTHERETRIBU: ^2Omar: ^7To defend it, the Retribution will insert two teams. Alpha's and Bravo's. 1's and 2's.
VIDSUBTITLES_TODAYWASONEOFTHEWORS: ^2Ethan: ^7Today was one of the worst days in history, and forgive me for saying it- but it was the greatest day of my life. I did everything I was trained for, and more. Together, we fought the good fight.
VIDSUBTITLES_TODAYTHESDFISAWARMAC: ^2Reyes: ^7Today, the SDF is a war machine, ruled by its military. If a leader united that force…
VIDSUBTITLES_TODAYSATTACKWASNOTLI: ^2Raines: ^7Today's attack was not limited to Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISSONOFABITCHISAHA: ^2Auguste: ^7This son of a bitch is a handful, sir. Sooner he’s under sedation the better.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISVESTA3MININGCO: ^2Salter: ^7This is Vesta-3. Mining colony, provides us with raw materials we need to rebuild the fleet.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISTHENAVYIBELIEV: ^2Reyes: ^7This is the Navy, I believe the proper term is "blue nosing". May I continue?
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISPETERBRYANTREP: ^2Reporter: ^7This is Peter Bryant reporting from Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISNOTADRILLDIVER: ^2Raines: ^7This is not a drill! Divert and deploy all available assets immediately!
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISGEROMEDAVIESFO: ^2Reporter: ^7This is Gerome Davies for IW news.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISCAPTAINSALENKO: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7This is Admiral Salen Kotch of the Olympus Mons. The UNSA ship Tigris lies in ruin. There will be no rest for the enemies of The Front.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISANUPDATEONTHEA: ^2Raines: ^7This is an update on the AATIS gun saboteur.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISAGROUNDASSAULT: ^2Omar: ^7This is a ground assault. Captain's place is on the bridge.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISADMIRALSALENKO_1: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7This is Admiral Salen Kotch of the Olympus Mons. All SATO forces are ordered to surrender for immediate execution.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISADMIRALSALENKO: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7This is Admiral Salen Kotch of the Olympus Mons.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISADELIBERATEACT: ^2Reyes: ^7This is a deliberate act of aggression, Admiral. We should be out there on patrol, not down here throwing confetti.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISACLASSIFIEDBRI_1: ^2Raines: ^7This is a classified briefing regarding the POW known as Riah.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISISACLASSIFIEDBRI: ^2Raines: ^7This is a classified briefing regarding the POW apprehended in Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISDAYSNOTENDINGANY: ^2Reyes: ^7This day's not ending anytime soon. Let's keep the barrel side out, fight the enemy, not each other. You got the greenlight to do whatever it takes.
VIDSUBTITLES_THISCOULDTURNTHETIDE: ^2Brooks: ^7This could turn the tide of the war, Captain.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYWOULDMOBILIZEAND: ^2Reyes: ^7…They would mobilize, and try to take our homeland.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYWEREHERELESSTHAN: ^2Griff: ^7They were here less than 5 minutes. They took a cursory glance at the inventory and I adjusted their triggers to a five pound pull. They gave me a hat.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYUSETHEIRFLEETTOB: ^2Reyes: ^7They use their fleet to block us from raw materials we need to survive. Their mission is to erase everything Earth born.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYREPOLITICIANSREY: ^2Raines: ^7They’re politicians, Reyes. They’ll wipe hell’s ass with whatever flag keeps the smokestacks burning. To these men, the idea of mounting an offensive triggers a fresh and unplanned piss. Until there’s war, the warriors aren’t in charge.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYARENTREVOLUTIONA: ^2Reyes: ^7They aren’t revolutionaries. They want absolute power. They raid colonies, take resources, and control territories by force.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYARENEVERAFRAIDTH: ^2Ferran: ^7They are never afraid, they never complain, and they spend all of their time trying to think of ways to help one another achieve victory and save us all from certain death. It is selflessness beyond the pale. My dedication to them, stands above all else, save for the freedom of our world.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEYAPPEARTOBETRACKI: ^2Ethan: ^7They appear to be tracking our fleet.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEUNSAFLEETISFINISH: ^2SDF Operative: ^7The UNSA fleet is finished. Moving to AATIS system destruct now.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESTRENGTHOFTHEPACK: ^2MaCallum: ^7Look, the strength of the pack is in all the wolves, Captain. All in, no matter the cost. They were ready. Now, if you don't have the will to make that kind of choice, then like me, you have no place being in command.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESHOWMUSTGOONIDFEE: ^2Reyes: ^7The show must go on. I’d feel better if we were on patrol.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESHIPWONTFIRECAPTA: ^2Kloos: ^7The ship won't fire, Captain. The weapons system's not enabled.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESETTLEMENTDEFENSE: ^2Reyes: ^7The Settlement Defense Front built an army and broke away from the Earth with blood and violence.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESESDFVESSELSAREIN: ^2Ethan: ^7These SDF vessels are in dry dock, sir. They’re being built, repaired or resupplied.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESECRETMISSIONIUND: ^2MaCallum: ^7But the secret mission I undertook every single day, was to protect the two of you from anyone, or anything, that threatened your health and well being. So promise me you will take care of one another, and, please, live your lives to the fullest.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEREWASNOTHINGYOUCO: ^2Brooks: ^7There was nothing you could do, Captain!
VIDSUBTITLES_THERESALONEDESTROYER: ^2Reyes: ^7There’s a lone destroyer in an asteroid field orbiting Europa. They’re moving in to block our access to the water. Right now that ship is alone. This should be a fast win. We locate the Solis, and disable it.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEREARETHREEANTIAIR: ^2Reyes: ^7There are three Anti-Air guns that need to be taken out before our birds can move in and provide support.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEOFFICERSCOMMITMEN: ^2Admiral Coupe: ^7The officers commitment exhibited the highest traditions of Naval Service.
VIDSUBTITLES_THENUCLEAROPTIONWITH: ^2Gator: ^7The nuclear option with a pony tail.
VIDSUBTITLES_THENEWFRONTIEROFFERE: ^2Reyes: ^7The new frontier offered the promise of a new beginning…
VIDSUBTITLES_THENEEDSOFOURPLANETW: ^2Reyes: ^7The needs of our planet were greater than she could supply.
VIDSUBTITLES_THENAVYIMBUEDMETOACC: ^2Gibson: ^7The Navy imbued me to accomplish the mission and never quit. To that end, I’ll never stop loving you no matter where, or when, I go.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEINTERNALDRIVETHAT: ^2Gibson: ^7The internal drive that earned me my rank, cost me a marriage.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEINTELYOUVEBEENGET: ^2Salter: ^7The intel you’ve been getting from the Admiral.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEFRONTHAVEBEENSALV: ^2Reyes: ^7The Front have been salvaging parts from a scrapyard outside Pluto. They have one Destroyer and a small Skelter squadron on station. We deploy now, we can hit the ships and commandeer that salvage. We need all the scrap we can get.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEFRONTDESTROYEDOUR: ^2Reyes: ^7The Front destroyed our fleet. Let's do the same to them.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEFACILITYSTOASTLET: ^2Salter: ^7The facility's toast. Let's get back to base and report to Raines.
VIDSUBTITLES_THATSNOTMYNAMETHATIS: ^2Riah: ^7That’s not my name. That is the moniker of an Earthen fool.
VIDSUBTITLES_THATSFORDAMNSURECANT: ^2Reyes: ^7That's for damn sure. Can’t argue with that.
VIDSUBTITLES_THATSCHIEFBRYANTLING: ^2Ferran: ^7That's Chief Bryant Ling. He's a Tigris corpsman.
VIDSUBTITLES_THATSASHAMEHEWASAGOO: ^2Raines: ^7That’s a shame. He was a good man. A good Marine.
VIDSUBTITLES_THATFACILITYISABLACK: ^2Reyes: ^7That facility is a black site, Admiral. Why the hell is SetDef allowed in that airspace?
VIDSUBTITLES_THANKYOUBEINGTOGETHE:
^2Gibson: ^7Thank you. Being together was a gift.
With love always,
Laura
VIDSUBTITLES_THANKYOUASPARTOFTHEA: ^2Reyes: ^7Thank you. As part of the Admiral’s progressive command decree, our evaluation process includes an interview to be filed by a squad mate of lateral rank. In this case, that’s yours truly.
VIDSUBTITLES_THANKSFORHELPINGBRIN:
^2Griff: ^7Thanks for helping bring me into this world. I did my best to be a good man.
Maynard Griffin.
VIDSUBTITLES_THANKSCHIEFLETSGETBA: ^2Reyes: ^7Thanks, Chief. Let's get back to work.
VIDSUBTITLES_TELLAUNTJOYCEISAIDHI: ^2Kashima: ^7Tell Aunt Joyce I said hi and I love her, and give Baily a big kiss and a new tennis ball for me. Everyone here has a mother and father, but you and dad only have one son. So I'm sorry I didn't make it back.
VIDSUBTITLES_SURECOMEANDSEEUSMORE: ^2Gator: ^7Sure. Come and see us more often.
VIDSUBTITLES_STRATCOMSENDSUSOUTWE: ^2Reyes: ^7STRATCOM sends us out, we get hit. This time it was Tigris, next time it's Ret. All respect to the Admiral, the desk is not the deck. It’s time to raise the black flag and start cutting throats.
VIDSUBTITLES_STRATCOMISWELLAWAREO: ^2Raines: ^7STRATCOM is well aware of our grievances. At this time, no use of force is being considered on the operational level. These are the laws of war, son.
VIDSUBTITLES_STRATCOMHASINTELTHAT: ^2Reyes: ^7STRATCOM has intel that an SDF leadership conference is scheduled in the Kuiper belt. Four destroyers are meeting to transfer HVTs to the “Icarius.” We’ll get ourselves aboard and take out the HVTs. This one’s just you and me, Salt. Full stealth.
VIDSUBTITLES_STRATCOMCANONLYASSUM: ^2Raines: ^7STRATCOM can only assume an invasion would follow.
VIDSUBTITLES_STAFFSERGEANTOMARSAI: ^2Reyes: ^7Staff Sergeant Omar said to pick your mission, don’t let it pick you. That’s exactly what we’re gonna do.
VIDSUBTITLES_STAFFSERGEANTOMARKIA: ^2Reyes: ^7-Staff Sergeant Omar. KIA on Vesta-3 sir.
VIDSUBTITLES_SPRINGSPINSCOILSINNO: ^2Griff : ^7Springs, pins, coils. Innocuous by themselves, but put them in their proper place and you got something powerful and precise. That ain’t sheep.
VIDSUBTITLES_SPOTTEDBYADEFENSESPE: ^2Gator : ^7Spotted by a defense spectroscope, deep field scan. It’s gigantic.
VIDSUBTITLES_SOWEWOULDVELOSTOURGU: ^2MaCallum: ^7So we would've lost our guns, they would have lost their transponder signal.
VIDSUBTITLES_SOWEWENTBEYONDTHEREA: ^2Reyes: ^7So we went beyond the reaches of our atmosphere.
VIDSUBTITLES_SOWESTANDBYWITHOURBA: ^2Reyes: ^7So we stand by with our barrels in the sand and watch a fleet week parade?
VIDSUBTITLES_SOTOWHATDOIOWETHEPLE: ^2Gator: ^7So, to what do I owe the pleasure?
VIDSUBTITLES_SONOFABITCHTHISFLEET: ^2Salter: ^7Son of a bitch. This fleet sh...stuff is nonsense. We should be up in our jackals flying watch.
VIDSUBTITLES_SMARTBASTARDHOWMANYY: ^2Reyes: ^7Smart bastard. How many did you get?
VIDSUBTITLES_SIRYOUREOURLEADERNOT: ^2MaCallum: ^7You're our leader, sir. Not our savior.
VIDSUBTITLES_SIRWEREGETTINGSTITCH: ^2Brooks: ^7Sir, we're getting stitched up over here! No time to waste!
VIDSUBTITLES_SIRWEREBEHINDENEMYLI: ^2Ethan: ^7Sir, we’re behind enemy lines now, in the heat of battle. Time is short. You’ve given an order from which there is likely no return. You did what had to be done. All in. I’m proud of you. You’re a born leader, sir.
VIDSUBTITLES_SIRTHATOBJECTIVEREQU: ^2Reyes: ^7Sir, that objective required a full strike force, not a four man team.
VIDSUBTITLES_SIRIMNOTQUITESUREHOW: ^2Griff: ^7Sir, I’m not quite sure how a son greets his father after not seeing him for a lifetime. Guess I’ll say, "Hi, dad."
VIDSUBTITLES_SIRADMIRALRAINESISON: ^2Comms Officer: ^7Sir, Admiral Raines is on the line.
VIDSUBTITLES_SHUTTLEBROOKSTAKETHE: ^2Salter: ^7Shuttle. Brooks, take them out. Ethan, with me.
VIDSUBTITLES_SHOULDSTILLBESUPERSO: ^2Brooks: ^7Should still be supersonic at nine hundred.
VIDSUBTITLES_SHESRIGHTOUTTHEREINA: ^2Ferran: ^7She's right out there. In all her guts and glory.
VIDSUBTITLES_SETTLEMENTDEFENSEFRO: ^2Reyes: ^7Settlement Defense Front doesn’t make demands. They planted a flag on our rock. They executed three men and shot down a pilot.
VIDSUBTITLES_SETDEFLAUNCHEDACONCU: ^2Raines: ^7SetDef launched a concurrent strike on the Moon Gateway Port.
VIDSUBTITLES_SETDEFHELLASISINVENU: ^2Reyes: ^7SetDef Hellas is in Venus atmosphere repairing attack damage. Intel reports it’s carrying chemical weapons. SCARs and Marines will board for search and destroy. We’ll locate the chem-munitions and take out the carrier.
VIDSUBTITLES_SETDEFDESTROYERSENGA: ^2Reyes: ^7SetDef destroyers engaged a critical Port Operations outpost. A squadron of friendlies is defending, but they need reinforcement. Let’s deploy and disable those destroyers. We lose that outpost, we can’t get resources into our Lunar port.
VIDSUBTITLES_SDFSCOUTSHIPCAMETHRO: ^2Salter: ^7SDF scout ship came through. We shot it down.
VIDSUBTITLES_SDFMOVESINOURAATISGU: ^2Raines: ^7The rules of engagement prohibit definitive action under these circumstances.
VIDSUBTITLES_SDFISGUARDINGTARGETS: ^2Reyes: ^7SDF is guarding targets of opportunity, out here.
VIDSUBTITLES_SDFGALAXIUSISHOLDING: ^2Reyes: ^7SDF Galaxius is holding a weapon they poached off Europa. They’ve got kidnapped engineers on board to help replicate it. Best efforts to rescue the engineers but weapon retrieval is primary.
VIDSUBTITLES_SDFCARRIERCERBERUSIS: ^2Reyes: ^7SDF carrier Cerberus is dry docked for resupply in the Miranda moon asteroid field. Payload says there’s a prototype airship in the hangar. Let’s mount an infil, commandeer the prototype and keep it out of the fight.
VIDSUBTITLES_SDFAJAKSAREREFUELING: ^2Reyes: ^7SDF Ajaks are refueling on the surface of Titan. After the air battle with Olympus Mons, they won’t expect us back there. Element of surprise is on our side. Let’s move in for a strike.
VIDSUBTITLES_SATURNSMOONTITANITSH: ^2Raines: ^7Saturn’s moon, Titan. It’s home to a critical SDF fueling station.
VIDSUBTITLES_SATOSCARTEAMUNITSHAV: ^2Reporter: ^7SATO SCAR team units have recaptured top-secret SATO tech, stolen mere hours before today’s vicious attack on Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_SATOOFFICIALSHAVENOT: ^2Reporter: ^7SATO officials have not responded to questions regarding the nature of the weaponry retrieved, nor is there word on the fate of the allied engineers reportedly kidnapped from the UNSA site where the SATO tech in question was stored.
VIDSUBTITLES_SATOFORCESHAVEPREVEN: ^2Reporter: ^7SATO forces have prevented a chemical attack on Earth, destroying a Settlement Defense Front ship carrying the payload.
VIDSUBTITLES_SATOFORCESBACKEDBYSC: ^2Reporter: ^7SATO forces backed by SCAR-led airstrikes, have destroyed the Settlement Defense Front’s primary fueling station on Titan, Saturn’s largest moon.
VIDSUBTITLES_SATOFORCESARETRENCHE: ^2Salter: ^7SATO Forces are trenched in outside setting up a FOB.
VIDSUBTITLES_SARAHPLEASEKEEPOURBA: ^2Omar: ^7Sarah, please keep our babies safe and find it in your heart to forgive me for leaving you alone. If my last breath is not in the battlefield, then surely it will be in your arms. Keep me in your hearts, always.
VIDSUBTITLES_SALVAGEDWHATWECOULDF: ^2Salter: ^7Salvaged what we could from the Ret. Comms are up.
VIDSUBTITLES_SALTGETACOMBATRESCUE: ^2Reyes: ^7Salt, get a combat rescue team out there now.

VIDSUBTITLES_PETTYOFFICERGETTHATA: ^2Raines: ^7Petty Officer, get that AATIS back up. We still got enemy ships in our airspace.
VIDSUBTITLES_OVERTITANYOUSAIDWEWE: ^2Ethan: ^7Over Titan, you said we were brothers. I always wanted to know what a family really is. Now, I do.
VIDSUBTITLES_OVERAGRAINYPICTUREFA: ^2Gator: ^7Over a grainy picture? Fat chance. They didn’t cancel evolution over the Loch Ness Monster. Lots of confetti and tons of pride tied up in this thing.

VIDSUBTITLES_OURPRIMARYOBJECTIVEI_1: ^2Omar: ^7Our primary objective is to retake that port.
VIDSUBTITLES_OURPRIMARYOBJECTIVEI: ^2Reyes: ^7Our primary objective is infiltrating the orbital platform.  Flying directly up to the shipyard is a no-go due to their active intercept system so this a ground assault.
VIDSUBTITLES_OURENTERPRISINGRUSSI: ^2Griff: ^7Our enterprising Russian brethren did a little import export deal with their Canadian friends. “Exhibition hockey game-slash-Military surplus sale.”
VIDSUBTITLES_OURCOURSEOFACTIONMOV: ^2Raines: ^7Our course of action moving forward is to buy Earth time, while we rebuild our fleet.
VIDSUBTITLES_OURC12ANDASSAULTVEHI: ^2Salter: ^7Our C12 and assault vehicles are down. Without the ordnance they were carrying, we need to run an air-strike to take out the tower. MaCallum designated a gas venting turbine. We hit it, the pressure builds and the tower detonates. Ready to party?
VIDSUBTITLES_ONLYTHENAVYWOULDBUIL: ^2Omar: ^7Yeah. Only the Navy could build a ship designed to sink.
VIDSUBTITLES_ONLYIFYOUREFULLBORE: ^2Kashima: ^7Yeah, but only if you're full bore.
VIDSUBTITLES_ONEOFTHEMANYSIGNSIWA: ^2Griff: ^7One of the many signs I was born too late.
VIDSUBTITLES_ONCEIGETYOURHARDCOPY: ^2Admiral Coupe: ^7Once I get your hard copy signature on this we'll get it filed.
VIDSUBTITLES_ONCEABOARDWELLSHUTDO: ^2Salter: ^7Once aboard, we’ll shut down the bridge and aft combat systems.

VIDSUBTITLES_NOWTOROUNDYOUOUTTHER: ^2Griff: ^7Now, to round you out, there's equipment.
VIDSUBTITLES_NOPOPSDADWASATANKFAR: ^2Omar: ^7No. Pops. Dad was a tank farmer. Worked the pipelines for about thirty years. Retired just before the SDF took it over.
VIDSUBTITLES_NOONESGOINGHOMEYOUBO: ^2Reyes: ^7No one's going home. You board that ship and you terminate this place, Salt. Do as much damage as you can before SDF takes you out.
VIDSUBTITLES_NOONESEVERCOLLIDEDWI: ^2Gator : ^7No one’s ever collided with the sky. Granted, Retribution handles like a brick in the bay, but I got the old girl dialed in.
VIDSUBTITLES_NOMARINESEVERBEENTHI: ^2Omar: ^7No Marine’s ever been this close to the daystar, that’s for sure.
VIDSUBTITLES_NOBLEBUTTHESHIPYARDR: ^2MaCallum: ^7And that's noble, but the shipyard remains intact.
VIDSUBTITLES_NOAHBEANHONESTMANKEE: ^2Omar: ^7Noah, be an honest man. Keep your word. Only use violence as a last resort. You're the man of the house now.
VIDSUBTITLES_NISSRINEHELLOSWEETHE: ^2Gator: ^7Nissrine. Hello, sweetheart. I left for this tour before you were born. I’m sorry I won’t be able to see you grow up. Daddy wanted to make the world a better place. That’s why we made you.
VIDSUBTITLES_NEWRULESNEWAMBITIONS: ^2Reyes: ^7New rules, new ambitions, a new enemy.

VIDSUBTITLES_MYTIMEWASCUTSHORTBUT: ^2Gator: ^7My time was cut short, but I had countless blessings. I married the perfect woman. I have a brand new daughter on the way. I’d be selfish to ask for more.
VIDSUBTITLES_MYMOMSANDYPASSEDAWAY: ^2Griff: ^7My mom, Sandy, passed away this year. I went back to the old house just before shipping out and found a box with your silver star for Valor. My mom kept it all this time.
VIDSUBTITLES_MYGUYSEYESONMEASFARA: ^2Omar: ^7My guys, eyes on me. As far as Ethan goes- I will personally vouch for this stiff metal motherfucker. He’s one of us.
VIDSUBTITLES_MUSTERONTHEWELLDECKI: ^2Reyes: ^7Muster on the Well Deck in five, Staff Sergeant.
VIDSUBTITLES_MUSTERINFIVEONTHEFLI: ^2Omar: ^7Muster in five on the flight deck.

VIDSUBTITLES_MISSIONCOMESFIRSTOMA: ^2Salter: ^7Mission comes first. Omar's words, not mine.

VIDSUBTITLES_MECHANIZEDBOTSGUARDT: ^2Salter: ^7Mechanized. Bots guard the facility. Our mission is to assess what happened, and report back to the Admiral immediately.
VIDSUBTITLES_MARTATHENAVYHASMADEM: ^2Yetide: ^7Marta, the Navy has made my life a long distance love affair. The things I love are all far away. My home, my animals…You. I am doing important work. I’m ready for anything. Even this. The military did not take my life. I volunteered it.

VIDSUBTITLES_IWISHIDKNOWNYOUSTILL: ^2Griff: ^7I wish I’d known you still lived in Tennessee. I would have dropped by. We could’ve had a beer and caught up. I forgive you for leaving.  I hope you’re not mad at me for writing.
VIDSUBTITLES_IWILLKEEPYOUPOSTEDON: ^2Raines: ^7I will keep you posted on any and all developments. Top Cat out.
VIDSUBTITLES_IWANTYOUTOKNOWIFOLLO: ^2Griff: ^7I want you to know I followed in your footsteps. I joined the Navy. Thought it would make you proud and if we ever saw each other we’d have more to talk about. I went to sniper school to be sharpshooter but my vision changed and I became an instructor. I’m currently deployed aboard the UNSA carrier Retribution.
VIDSUBTITLES_IVEUPLOADEDTHETITAND: ^2Raines: ^7I’ve uploaded the Titan dossier. Direct your attention to the CIC, Captain.
VIDSUBTITLES_IVEGOTTENYEARSONTHEB: ^2Salter: ^7I've got ten years on the books with that loyal bastard. He saved my ass more time than I can count. I can’t do this without him.
VIDSUBTITLES_IVEBEENINFORMEDSTRAT: ^2Raines: ^7I’ve been informed, STRATCOM has approved your initiative in Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_ITWASPLANTEDINTHEOPE: ^2Reyes: ^7It was a suicide mission. It would've stopped transmitting when the operative was killed.
VIDSUBTITLES_ITWASMYHONORANDPRIVI:
^2Ferran: ^7It was my honor and privilege to command such brave souls.

Peace to the fallen,
Captain Maureen Ferran
VIDSUBTITLES_ITSDAMNGOODTOSEEYOUS: ^2Raines: ^7It's damn good to see you son.
VIDSUBTITLES_ITSATRANSPONDEREMITT: ^2Raines: ^7 It's a transponder. Emitting as we speak.
VIDSUBTITLES_ITHINKOFYOUANDMYHEAR: ^2Yetide: ^7I think of you and my heart races, I smile, I laugh out loud and people tell me I always seem so happy. I am. I have you.
VIDSUBTITLES_ITASKEDAPILOTANDTWOS: ^2Ferran: ^7I tasked a pilot and two spotters, and we set out to your last known location.

VIDSUBTITLES_IPROMISEDMYSELFIWOUL: ^2Kashima: ^7I promised myself I wouldn’t get close to people here, but it’s kind of impossible not to. I wasn’t scared here, but I was home sick. Mom, I had a dream, last night, that you were making dinner. Yes, my favorite, porkchops, and we were all at the table together.

VIDSUBTITLES_INOUREFFORTSTOBUYTIM: ^2Raines: ^7In our efforts to buy time for the fleet to rebuild, we need to hit SetDef's battle readiness.
VIDSUBTITLES_INEEDEDTHOSETWOSECON: ^2Salter: ^7I needed those two seconds to get us off the X…
VIDSUBTITLES_IMTHEPILOTOFTHISSHIP: ^2Salter: ^7I'm the pilot of this ship, It's my job to make sure that we get back!
VIDSUBTITLES_IMSORRYLIEUTENANTYOU: ^2Ferran: ^7I’m sorry, Lieutenant. You were following orders.
VIDSUBTITLES_IMINOVERMYPAYGRADEWH: ^2Griff: ^7I’m in over my pay grade when it comes to the finer points of war, Lieutenant, but I’ll be damned if we can’t find some solace in the simple beauty of a sidearm and a sixth grade teacher.
VIDSUBTITLES_IMGETTINGANTSYIFTHEG: ^2Reyes: ^7I’m getting antsy. If the good Lord wanted the Navy on terra firma he’d have made the sky brown. Pilots make bad pedestrians.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILOVEYOUOLIVIAYOULLB: ^2Gator: ^7I Love you Olivia. Welcome our baby into this world and cherish her for me. Remind her about her daddy, and, please, never be afraid to do what you need to find happiness.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILOVEDMYJOBBUTIHATED: ^2MaCallum: ^7I loved my job, but I hated war.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILLPRIMETHEORDNANCEI: ^2Ethan: ^7I'll prime the ordnance I commandeered from the Olympus Mons to hit those AA turrets.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILLPILOTARAVENTOUNSA: ^2Salter: ^7I’ll pilot a Raven to UNSA-HQ. We'll make that our base of operations.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILLLEAVEYOUBEGOTSOME: ^2Griff: ^7Well, I'll leave you be. Got some carbines to set up for you.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILLDOWHATEVERICANTOK: ^2Reyes: ^7I'll do whatever it takes to keep us secure.
VIDSUBTITLES_ILIKEDSCHOOLSIXHOURS: ^2Griff: ^7I liked school. Six hours a day of regimented repetitive instruction.
VIDSUBTITLES_IKNOWTHISISNTEASYPLE: ^2Yetide: ^7I know this isn’t easy. Please don’t cry for me, or us. Cry for a world that couldn’t make peace.
VIDSUBTITLES_IKNOWIHADWHATEVERYWO: ^2Gibson: ^7I know I had what every woman envied, a husband that gave life more meaning. You were my handsome better half. Since the day we locked eyes, I thought of you constantly. I still do.
VIDSUBTITLES_IKNEWTHEREWASSOMETHI: ^2Omar: ^7I knew there was something I didn't like about you sons of bitches.
VIDSUBTITLES_IKNEWITLEMMEGUESSOPE: ^2Gator: ^7I knew it. Lemme guess. Operation “why the hell was the Admiral on board”? Am I right?
VIDSUBTITLES_IKEEPSINGINGOURSONGO: ^2Yetide: ^7I keep singing our song over and over, trying to remind myself that it’s going to be okay, and that I will fall asleep next to you every night when all this distance is done.
VIDSUBTITLES_IHAVEFAITHTHISWARWIL: ^2MaCallum: ^7I have faith this war will end in victory and you will remain free to pursue whatever paths you wish, free from violence and cruelty.
VIDSUBTITLES_IHAVEEVERYTHINGITTAK: ^2Salter: ^7I have everything it takes in spades. I understand risk, I multi-task like a mother…really well, and I take myself and the equipment to the peak of proficiency. Plus, I can beat anybody like a drum. Shit goes down, you want me up.
VIDSUBTITLES_IFYOUAREREADINGTHISI: ^2Gator: ^7If you are reading this, I guess I didn’t make it home. I was prepared to face danger and death. I hope I did so with dignity.
VIDSUBTITLES_IFTHEYRESITTINGANDIM: ^2Reyes: ^7If they’re sitting and I’m standing, maybe. So what can’t you tell me that I can’t repeat?
VIDSUBTITLES_IFINALLYTRACKEDDOWNY: ^2Griff: ^7I finally tracked down your address through the human resource department in Washington. I had to use my birth certificate to prove we were related.
VIDSUBTITLES_IFALLGOESASPLANNEDTH: ^2Raines: ^7If all goes as planned the SDF fleet, including the Olympus Mons, will receive the all clear signal and enter our airspace provoking a counterattack by our AATIS guns.
VIDSUBTITLES_IDONTEITHERINPURELYM: ^2Ferran: ^7I don’t either. In purely mathematical terms, it’s a mistake to go after him. But we’ve buried 19 commanders today. I’m not losing another. Send me their last known coordinates and we’ll see what we can do.
VIDSUBTITLES_IDONTBUYTHATEITHERTH: ^2Gator: ^7I don’t buy that either. That’s your squadron, they look up to you.

VIDSUBTITLES_ICANALWAYSSICSALTERO: ^2Reyes: ^7I can always sic' Salter on you.
VIDSUBTITLES_IBRINGMYMENHOMESALTW: ^2Reyes: ^7I bring my men home, Salt, we do both!
VIDSUBTITLES_IAGREEWITHYOUBUTILLD: ^2Gator: ^7I agree with you, but I’ll deny it under oath.

VIDSUBTITLES_HOLDHEREGATORCALLYOU: ^2Reyes: ^7Hold here, Gator. Call you if I need you.
VIDSUBTITLES_HISIMPLANTEDTRANSPON: ^2Raines: ^7His implanted transponder would have been destroyed, halting its signal, sending an all clear to the enemy fleet.
VIDSUBTITLES_HINDSIGHTSATACTICALM: ^2Raines: ^7Hindsight’s a tactical miscalculation we can’t afford.
VIDSUBTITLES_HIGHLYNAVYBROUGHTINT: ^2Griff: ^7Highly. Navy brought in the Bureau.  Fleet-wide inspection. Big crackdown.

VIDSUBTITLES_HESRIGHTTHISELEVATOR: ^2MaCallum: ^7He’s right. This elevator is the only way up from the surface.
