VIDSUBTITLES_ETHANWHATSTHENAVYSOF: ^2Omar: ^7Ethan, what’s the Navy’s official policy for a gunfight?
VIDSUBTITLES_ETHANSETADROPCOURSEF: ^2Reyes: ^7Ethan, set a drop course for SetDef's Orbital Shipyard.
VIDSUBTITLES_ETHANSBOTSWILLCREATE: ^2Reyes: ^7Ethan's bots will create a diversion while our Ravens insert on the edge of the platform’s perimeter.
VIDSUBTITLES_ETHANHOSTILEFORCESAR: ^2Reyes: ^7Ethan, hostile forces are aboard the lieutenant's destroyer.
VIDSUBTITLES_ETHANGOTOENGINEERING: ^2Reyes: ^7Ethan. Go to engineering, see Mac, get a clean bill.
VIDSUBTITLES_ETHANGETOURTACTICALS: ^2Reyes: ^7Ethan, get our tacticals on the map, prepare a brief, get it to STRATCOM right away.
VIDSUBTITLES_ECHOISFIVEMIKESOUTFR: ^2Auguste: ^7Echo is five mikes out from the UNSA building. City’s evacuated so the convoy’ll move quick. We’ll RV with you and the Admiral in the Medical hall. What’s your ETA?
VIDSUBTITLES_EARTHSURVIVORSWILLLI: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7Earth survivors will live at gunpoint, and breathe by permission of the Front. Mars aeternum.
VIDSUBTITLES_EARTHSLUNARGATEWAYPO: ^2Omar: ^7Earth's Lunar Gateway Port is currently under siege.
VIDSUBTITLES_DUETOCAPTAINALDERSUS: ^2Raines: ^7Due to Captain Alder's use of force, the enemy was driven into retreat. At this time, Tigris and Retribution are the only operable ships we have.
VIDSUBTITLES_DOWHATYOUDIDATTHEGAT: ^2Omar: ^7You just do what you did at the Gateway and we'll zip this place right up.
VIDSUBTITLES_DOMYEYESDECEIVEMEORI: ^2Gator: ^7Do my eyes deceive me or is there a big time Jack pilot on my bridge?
VIDSUBTITLES_DIDYOUKNOWWEWEREGONN: ^2Salter: ^7Did you know we were gonna finish this here?
VIDSUBTITLES_DIDABOOKREPORTINSIXT: ^2Griff: ^7Did a book report in sixth grade, Ms. Trillscott. Meaner than a wet panther but she had other attributes. I couldn’t wait to get to class.
VIDSUBTITLES_DESTROYERTIGRISISDOC: ^2Boats: ^7Destroyer Tigris is docking a shuttle to come aboard.
VIDSUBTITLES_DESPERATETIMESCALLFO: ^2Raines: ^7…Desperate times call for desperate measures. I commend your actions.
VIDSUBTITLES_DEARANDREWITSFLEETWE: ^2Gibson: ^7Dear Andrew, It’s fleet week. Warships are dry docked against the dawn sky.  I’m home, but it’s not home without you.
VIDSUBTITLES_COUNTERINTELNEEDTOKN: ^2Reyes: ^7Counter-intel. Need to know. Until right now.
VIDSUBTITLES_COUNTERDECEPTIONWESE: ^2Reyes: ^7Counter deception. We set the table and they come to eat.
VIDSUBTITLES_COPYMOVINGASFASTASIC: ^2Reyes: ^7Copy. Moving as fast as I can. Hold them off!
VIDSUBTITLES_COPYCOMMSOFFICERSTRA: ^2Gator: ^7Copy. Comms Officer, STRATCOM, Top Cat Sovereign.
VIDSUBTITLES_COPYCOMMANDERECHOSUP: ^2MaCallum: ^7Copy, Commander. Echo support element is inbound. They'll get you through the door.
VIDSUBTITLES_COPYAFTERSHUTDOWNWEE: ^2Omar: ^7Copy. After shut down, we exit through the cargo bay.
VIDSUBTITLES_COPY12ANGLEISGOODYOU: ^2ATC Operator: ^7Copy, 1-2. Angle is good, you're clear. Welcome home.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERTIGRISISSET: ^2Ferran: ^7Commander, Tigris is set for close air support. Notify when your Marines are staged for insert.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERSERGEANTGOO: ^2Marine Guard: ^7Commander, Sergeant, good to see you guys. Right this way.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERREYESWHATTH: ^2Raines: ^7Commander Reyes, what the hell happened out there?
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERREYESSTRATC: ^2Raines: ^7Commander Reyes, STRATCOM decrypted a fleet transmission from Admiral Kotch broadcast six hours before the attack.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERREYESCAPTAI: ^2Boats: ^7Commander Reyes. Captain Alder's Operations Office is now yours. Be advised, his effects are still in place.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERREYESANDLTS: ^2Admiral Coupe: ^7Commander Reyes and Lt. Salter gallantly offered their own lives and those of their crew, mobilizing at close-range against superior fire power. The operation eliminated vital numbers of enemy vessels and destroyed the Settlement Defense Front's Orbital Shipyard.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDERAKEELMINRIA: ^2Riah: ^7Commander Akeel Min Riah, of the Settlement Defense Front.
VIDSUBTITLES_COMMANDCENTERMAAMITS: ^2Ethan: ^7Command center, ma'am. It's a shuttle ride that way.
VIDSUBTITLES_CMINUSPURPOSELYUSEDP: ^2Griff: ^7"C minus". Purposely used pencil. Immediate grounds for detention and an extra hour with Ms. Trillscott.
VIDSUBTITLES_CLASHESONTHELUNARSUR: ^2Reporter: ^7Clashes on the Lunar surface have come to an end as SATO forces reclaim the Moon Gateway harbor from the Settlement Defense Front. The gateway complex is the Earth's primary cargo commerce and passenger terminal…
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINTIGRISWILLDRO: ^2Ferran: ^7Captain, Tigris will drop in outside the Area of Operation. Once Ret joins, we'll hold position until your Marines are ready. Good flight. Out.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINTHEYWONTSTOPU: ^2Raines: ^7Captain, they won't stop until they take our world. This may be our last stand.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINSGOINGTONEEDM: ^2Ethan: ^7Captain's going to need my help to get to the command center.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINREYESTHEREISN: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7Captain Reyes. There is no hope of victory.  We will bury your brothers. We will hunt your sons. Death is no disgrace.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINPLEASEICANLOO: ^2Ethan: ^7Captain, please, I can look after myself.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINILLGIVEYOUACC: ^2Ethan: ^7Captain, I'll give you access to a drone to designate those strike positions. Hey, should be a blast.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINIDBELYINGIFID: ^2Raines: ^7Captain, I'd be lying if I didn't admit I got the green eye for this one. I'd gear up and join you if I could. Top Cat out.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINGETTINGTHEGRO: ^2Griff: ^7Captain. Just getting these ground-pounders gunned up for Titan.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINFERRANRETRIBU: ^2Salter: ^7Captain Ferran. Retribution was engaged by Olympus over Titan. Commander Reyes’s Jackal was hit. Ethan was aboard. They bailed. He ordered 141 out of the battle zone. Ret was taking heavy fire. Helm spooled up and pulled the plug. We left him. No weapons, no cover.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINFERRANLADIESG: ^2Raines: ^7Captain Ferran. Ladies, Gentlemen. It's good to see you.
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINCANYOUHEARMEC: ^2Ferran: ^7Captain, can you hear me? Captain Reyes?
VIDSUBTITLES_CAPTAINBEADVISEDAAGU: ^2Jackal Pilot: ^7Captain, be advised, AA guns are still online!
VIDSUBTITLES_CANYOUIDENTIFYASHIPW: ^2Salter: ^7Can you identify a ship we can use?
VIDSUBTITLES_BYTHEPERMISSIONOFTHE: ^2Raines: ^7By the permission of the Accords, all nations have access to free an un--
VIDSUBTITLES_BYMETHESEMENANDWOMEN: ^2Ferran: ^7By me, these men and women are loved with a kind of bond that exists no other place but the military. These young warriors go for days without food or sleep. They persevere when they are sick, perform miraculous feats when they are wounded, and take death defying orders without pause.
VIDSUBTITLES_BUTTHEDISTANCEGAVEWA: ^2Reyes: ^7…but the distance gave way to a movement, with no connection to the place we call home.
VIDSUBTITLES_BUTSIRBYTHETIMETHERE: ^2Reyes: ^7But, sir, by the time there’s war it’s too late. ‘Hesitation is a hole in the head’. You drilled that into us relentlessly in flight school. ‘Work the problem, respond’.
VIDSUBTITLES_BUREAUOFFIREARMSPAID: ^2Griff: ^7Bureau of Firearms paid us a surprise visit.
VIDSUBTITLES_BULLSHITYOUREDOINGRE: ^2Gator: ^7Bullshit. You’re doing recon for eight highly trained aviators who wouldn’t be caught dead poking around up here.
VIDSUBTITLES_BOTHOFFICERSAWAREOFT: ^2Admiral Coupe: ^7…both officers, aware of the imminent danger, in spite of extensive casualties, planned and skillfully executed an attack with unwavering devotion to their duty.
VIDSUBTITLES_BOATSHOWCANWEENABLET: ^2Reyes: ^7Boats? How can we enable the payload?
VIDSUBTITLES_BLUEBLUECOMMANDERREY: ^2Reyes: ^7Blue, blue! It's Commander Reyes. I've got Marines with me.
VIDSUBTITLES_BLASTWAVEALONEWOULDB: ^2MaCallum: ^7Blast wave alone would be quite destructive.
VIDSUBTITLES_BETYOURASSLONGTIMECO: ^2Omar: ^7You bet your ass. This has been a long time coming.
VIDSUBTITLES_ATYOURBEHESTTHEPRISO: ^2Raines: ^7At your behest, the prisoner will be transported to UNSA Headquarters. A med team will remove the transponder from the subject at which point the device will be incinerated.
VIDSUBTITLES_ATTHISTIMEITSUNCLEAR: ^2Raines: ^7At this time it's unclear if the guns can be destroyed from another location
VIDSUBTITLES_ATLEAST100MILITANTSW: ^2Reporter: ^7At least 100 militants were killed in the ground-based operation to cut off enemy fueling capability in the region on this, the first day in what will no doubt be a protracted war between SetDef and the UNSA.
VIDSUBTITLES_ASYOUSHOULDYOUABORTE: ^2MaCallum: ^7As you should. You aborted the mission, Captain.
VIDSUBTITLES_ASTRATCOMSPOKESMANWA: ^2Reporter: ^7A STRATCOM spokesman was quoted as saying, "Our orbital defenses are intact and the fleet is holding strong, keeping the enemy on the run." For now, the battle rages on, outside the Earth’s perimeter. This is  Renee Syhan in New Delhi.
VIDSUBTITLES_ASTRATCOMOFFICIALSAY: ^2Reporter: ^7A STRATCOM official says,  “we are standing with our UNSA allies against both traditional and ‘hybrid warfare’ aggression,“- referring to the mechanized brigades the SDF fight alongside, increasingly elevating their troop numbers to well beyond the Marine and SCAR team elements currently deployed.
VIDSUBTITLES_ASTHEHIGHESTRANKINGO: ^2Gator: ^7As the highest ranking officer on board…
VIDSUBTITLES_ASTEROIDROTATIONSFLU: ^2Salter: ^7Asteroid rotation's fluctuating. About a minute give or take.
VIDSUBTITLES_ASSAULTINGANENEMYSHI: ^2Raines: ^7Assaulting an enemy ship with no reinforcements…
VIDSUBTITLES_AREYOUBROWNNOSINGRIG: ^2Salter: ^7Are you brown nosing right now? You're totally brown nosing.
VIDSUBTITLES_APPROX1800VESTAHQWEN: ^2Salter: ^7Approx. 1800, Vesta-HQ went dark, all attempts to make contact have since failed.
VIDSUBTITLES_ANINTERNALLYPLANTEDD: ^2Raines: ^7An internally planted device was found on the prisoner.
VIDSUBTITLES_ANDTHOSECARGOTERMINA: ^2Raines: ^7And those cargo terminals receive freight critical to rebuilding our fleet. So your mission is to retake that port.
VIDSUBTITLES_ALRIGHTYOUSHOULDHAVE: ^2Gibson: ^7Alright, you should have air now, Lieutenants.
VIDSUBTITLES_ALRIGHTSOADMIRALRAIN: ^2Reyes: ^7Alright, so, Admiral Raines, a man of great wisdom, has ordered us to…
VIDSUBTITLES_ALRIGHTITHINKMYWORKH: ^2Reyes: ^7Alright, I think my work here is through.
VIDSUBTITLES_ALLSTATIONSSHOTSFIRE: ^2Radio Operator: ^7All stations, shots fired at the AATIS control tower, say again, SHOTS FIRED!
VIDSUBTITLES_ALLCALLSIGNSECHOVICT: ^2Auguste: ^7All callsigns, Echo Victors in contact, taking heavy enemy fire!
VIDSUBTITLES_AJOINTOPERATIONBETWE: ^2Reporter: ^7A joint operation between Gateway Coast Guard Defense Forces and special operations groups including the Navy's elite SCAR Team and UNSA Marines forced the SetDef into a full-scale retreat.
VIDSUBTITLES_AHYOUHEARTHATLIEUTEN: ^2Kashima: ^7Ah, you hear that, Lieutenant? We’re setting some sort of record.
VIDSUBTITLES_AFTERUSINGOURAATISGU: ^2Raines: ^7After using our AATIS guns against our fleet, the operative known as Riah attempted to destroy the entire AATIS system. This would have left Earth vulnerable to aerial attack.
VIDSUBTITLES_AFTERTHEGUNSAREDOWNW: ^2Reyes: ^7After the guns are down, we push into the facility and ascend to the shipyard.
VIDSUBTITLES_AFFIRMATIVETHISSTRIK: ^2Raines: ^7Affirmative. This strike'll keep the enemy on the defensive and away from Earth.
VIDSUBTITLES_ADROPINTOATMOSPHEREC: ^2Yetide: ^7A drop into atmosphere could be catastrophic.
VIDSUBTITLES_ADMIRALRAINESTOLDMET:
^2Ethan: ^7Admiral Raines told me that a soldier is only as good as his last mission. If this is ours, then I can say with certainty, we were damn good, sir.
Better to burn out, than it is to rust.
VIDSUBTITLES_ADMIRALRAINESE3NISIN: ^2Petty Officer: ^7Admiral Raines. E3N is in position on the roof.
VIDSUBTITLES_ACTUALTHISISRETRIBUT: ^2Gator: ^7Actual, this is Retribution. SetDef fleet is descending, inbound.
VIDSUBTITLES_ACTUALLYDIDNTKNOWTHE: ^2Reyes: ^7Actually didn’t know the Admiral was here. We saw Captain Alder and half of STRATCOM skip a two martini breakfast to do a walk through.
VIDSUBTITLES_ACALCULATEDRISKLIEUT: ^2Ferran: ^7A calculated risk, Lieutenant. I'll be returning to Tigris now. Let's get back to work.
VIDSUBTITLES_ABBYIMSORRYIDIDNTKEE: ^2Omar: ^7Abby, I’m sorry I didn’t keep my promise when I said I was coming home. My hopes for your future, gave me the strength to protect everything we hold dear. You will always be daddy’s little girl.
VIDSUBTITLES_AATISISWORKINGOVERTI: ^2Reyes: ^7AATIS guns are working overtime today, huh, Admiral?
VIDSUBTITLES_AATISGUNSAREMOMENTSA: ^2Ethan: ^7AATIS guns are moments away from acquiring enemy targets, Admiral.
VIDSUBTITLES_11TOBRIDGEWHATTHEHEL: ^2Reyes: ^71-1 to Retribution. What the hell happened, Gator?
SPECIALIST_MODE_YARD_RARE: You are so close to the end, keep going!
SPECIALIST_MODE_EUROPA_RARE: And this is only the first level!
SPECIALIST_MODE_QA_RARE: QA Testers assured us this was beatable.
SPECIALIST_MODE_STICKING_HEAD_RARE: Try not sticking your head out so much.
SPECIALIST_MODE_SUPER_HELPFUL: A Nano Shot would have been super helpful just now.
SPECIALIST_MODE_BRAGGING_RARE: Keep going for the bragging rights!
SPECIALIST_MODE_BUMMER_RARE: Bummer.  We were just about to checkpoint you, too.
SPECIALIST_MODE_SALEN_KOTCH_RARE: Salen Kotch holds the record for fastest Specialist Mode completion.
SPECIALIST_MODE_MILE_HIGH: And you thought Mile High Club was hard. . .
SPECIALIST_MODE_DONT_WORRY: Don't worry, we die a lot in this mode too.
SPECIALIST_MODE_MORE_FUN: For even more challenge, try #YOLO mode!
SPECIALIST_MODE_HAPPINESS: Just imagine how happy you'll be once you succeed.
SPECIALIST_MODE_MORE_KILLING: More killing guys, less getting killed.
SPECIALIST_MODE_QUIT: Pause and Quit to Main Menu when you've had enough.
SPECIALIST_MODE_FACT_GUN_CATCH: You can catch a recently dropped gun after an enemy shoots it out of your hands.
SPECIALIST_MODE_FACT_SUFFUCATE: Without a helmet, you will suffocate in space.
SPECIALIST_MODE_FACT_ARM_RIGHT: Right arm injuries increase weapon sway.
SPECIALIST_MODE_FACT_ARM_LEFT: Left arm injuries disable all equipment but Nano Shots.
SPECIALIST_MODE_FACT_LEG: Leg injuries hinder the ability to ADS while moving.
SPECIALIST_MODE_DEATH_SUFFUCATE: Equip your helmet to breathe in space.
SPECIALIST_MODE_DEATH_HELMET: Equip your helmet to block fatal headshots.
SPECIALIST_MODE_DEATH_NANOSHOT: Use your Nano Shot equipment to heal and repair broken bones.
EQUIPMENT_UNLOCK_EXTRA: Slot is unlocked with the Extra Equipment suit perk.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_FOAM_ONE: Quickly double tap ^3[{+usereload,+activate}]^7 to detonate the Foam Wall on command.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_DRONE_ONE: The maximum amount of ATADs that can be deployed at once is increased to four.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_SHIELD_ONE: Upgrades the battery to improve the radar and allow for longer-lasting protection.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_HACK_ONE: The Hacking Device is faster at hacking C6 robots and can also now lock on to and control C8 robots.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_SEEKER_TWO: Hold ^3[{+frag}]^7 when deploying the Seeker to choose the target.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_SEEKER_ONE: Quickly double tap ^3[{+usereload,+activate}]^7 to detonate the Seeker on command.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_ANTIGRAV_TWO: Increases the radius of the explosion.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_ANTIGRAV_ONE: Increases the duration of the grenade.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_SHOCK_TWO: Increases the damage done to C8 robots.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_SHOCK_ONE: Enemies caught in the center of the grenade take greater damage.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_FRAG_TWO: Enemies that survive the explosion will be highlighted by your visor.
EQUIPMENT_UPGRADE_FRAG_ONE: Increases the damage done to enemy robots.
EQUIPMENT_COVERWALL_UNLOCK: Unlock in Retribution: Doing What Needs to be Done
EQUIPMENT_NANO_SHOT_LONG: Nano Shots heal broken bones and provide partial health regeneration.
EQUIPMENT_HELMET_LONG: Helmets provide greater protection against headshots.
EQUIPMENT_COVERWALL_LONG: Fast deploying foam wall will create a temporary barrier against bullets and other damage.
EQUIPMENT_TRACKING_LONG: Frag grenade used in zero-g that tracks the enemy.
EQUIPMENT_HACKINGDEVICE_LONG: Advanced hacking software integrated into a soldier's helmet visor. Able to give the user full control over C6 robots.
EQUIPMENT_FRAG_LONG: High-powered fragmentation grenade. Employs a 2-stage explosive that releases flammable gas before detonating.
EQUIPMENT_SUPPORTDRONE_LONG: Personal flying drone with advanced AI. Automatically fires at enemy soldiers, and possesses a grenade-destroying trophy system.
EQUIPMENT_ANTIGRAV_LONG: Deploys an array of anti-gravity generators. Lifts enemy soldiers into the air, exposing them to gunfire.
EQUIPMENT_EMP_LONG: The Shock grenade will neutralize threats in a tight radius and stun threats in an expanded radius. Especially effective against robotic combatants.
EQUIPMENT_SHIELD_LONG: Suit-powered personal shield that quickly expands from the user's arm. Limits shooting ability but stops most ballistic weapons.
EQUIPMENT_SEEKER_LONG: A small, deployable robot that seeks out enemies and self-destructs.
NEW_HYENA_DEATH_TOO_SOON_ALT: Too early. Press ^3[{+melee}]^7 when the hint appears to grab a hyena.
NEW_HYENA_DEATH_TOO_LATE_ALT: Too late. Press ^3[{+melee}]^7 when the hint appears to grab a hyena.
NEW_HYENA_DEATH_DO_NOTHING_ALT: Press ^3[{+melee}]^7 when the hint appears to grab a hyena.
NEW_DOG_DEATH_DO_NOTHING_ALT: Press ^3[{+melee}]^7 when the hint appears to grab a dog.
NEW_DOG_DEATH_TOO_LATE_ALT: Too late. Press ^3[{+melee}]^7 when the hint appears to grab a dog.
NEW_DOG_DEATH_TOO_SOON_ALT: Too early. Press ^3[{+melee}]^7 when the hint appears to grab a dog.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_STEER_DRONE: Use the mouse to steer the missile.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_CHEAT_USETOSLOWMO: Use ^3[{+melee}]^7 to start or stop Slow-Mo.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_SPOOL_MINIGUN: Press and hold ^3[{+speed_throw}]^7 to spool up the minigun.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_GET_DETONATOR: Hold down^3 &&1 ^7to pick up the detonator.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_PLANTEXPLOSIVES: Look at the explosives spot and press ^3[{+activate}]^7 to plant the explosives.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_LAUNCHFACILITY_A_HINT_SM: Throw smoke^3 [{+smoke}] ^7to safely approach the enemy vehicle.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_LAUNCHFACILITY_A_HINT_PL: To plant C4, approach the glowing objective marker and press^3 [{+activate}] ^7.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_AC130_HINT_TOGGLE_THERMA:
Press ^3[{+activate}]^7 to toggle thermal vision
between white hot and black hot.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_AC130_HINT_ZOOM_AND_FIRE: Press ^3[{+speed}]^7 to control zoom and press ^3[{+attack}]^7 to fire.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_LEANRIGHTKEY: Hold down^3 &&1 ^7to lean to the right.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_LEANLEFTKEY: Hold down^3 &&1 ^7to lean to the left.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_PICKUPWEAPONKEY: To pickup a weapon, look at it and press USE^3 &&1].
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_SWAPWEAPONSKEY: HOLD USE^3 &&1 ^7to swap your current weapon for another that you are looking at.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_SECONDWEAPONKEY: Press^3 &&1 ^7to switch to your second weapon.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_FIRSTWEAPONKEY: Press^3 &&1 ^7to switch to your first weapon.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_ADSSTOP: Press^3 &&1 ^7a second time to stop aiming down the sight.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_STANDLETGOPRONEKEY: Let go of^3 &&1 ^7to come out of prone.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_STANDFROMCROUCHKEY: Double tap^3 &&1 ^7to stand up from crouch.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_STANDLETGOSECONDKEY: If this makes you go prone, double tap^3 &&1].
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_RAISEFROMPRONETOCRO: Press^3 &&1 ^7to switch from crouch from prone.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_CROUCHTOGGLEFROM: Press^3 &&1 ^7a second time to stand up from crouch.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_SWITCHTOSECONDWEAPO: You now have two weapons. Press^3 &&1 ^7to switch to your second weapon.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_MOVEBACKWARD: Press your Move Back key^3 &&1 ^7to move backwards.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_MOVEFORWARD: Press your Move Forward key^3 &&1 ^7to move forward.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_STRAFERIGHT: Press your Move Right key^3 &&1 ^7to move right.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_STRAFELEFT: Press your Move Left key^3 &&1 ^7to move left.
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_FIRSTOBJECTIVE: Look at your first objective and press USE^3 &&1 ^7to retrieve
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_LEANOUTWINDOW: Press USE^3 &&1 ^7to lean out of the window
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_DOG_DEATH_DO_NOTHING: Melee the dog right when it bites to grab its throat. ^3( [{+melee}] )^7
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_DOG_DEATH_TOO_LATE: Melee the dog before it bites to grab its throat. ^3( [{+melee}] )^7
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_DOG_DEATH_TOO_SOON: Wait for the dog to bite to grab its throat. ^3( [{+melee}] )^7
SCRIPT_PLATFORM_HINT_HOLDDOWNADSKEY: Hold down^3 &&1 ^7to aim down the sight

SCRIPT_BREACH_PARTNER_NOT_READY: Both players are not ready to breach

SCRIPT_BREACH_NEED_FRIENDLY: Waiting for friendlies to get in position...

SCRIPT_LEARN_M14_SWITCH: Press ^3[{weapnext}]^7 to switch to your M21 Sniper Rifle

SCRIPT_LEARN_GRENADE_LAUNCHER: Press^3 [{+actionslot 3}] ^7to use the M203 Grenade Launcher.
SCRIPT_INTELLIGENCE_PTS: You have found &&1 enemy intel pts.
SCRIPT_INTELLIGENCE_PICKUP: Press and hold^3 &&1 ^7to secure the enemy intelligence.

Red barrels will explode when shot.
SCRIPT_EXPLODING_DESTRUCTIBLE_DEATH:
You were killed by an explosion.
Some burning objects can explode.
SCRIPT_EXPLODING_VEHICLE_DEATH:
You were killed by an exploding vehicle.
Vehicles on fire are likely to explode.
SCRIPT_GRENADE_SUICIDE:
You died holding a grenade for too long.
Holding ^3[{+frag}]^7 allows you to cook off live grenades.
SCRIPT_GRENADE_DEATH:
You were killed by a grenade.
Watch out for the grenade danger indicator.
SCRIPT_ARTILLERY_TOOFAR: You are too far from your radio man to use artillery.
SCRIPT_USE_THE_PANZERFAUST_ANTITANK: Use the Panzerfaust anti-tank weapons behind the bunker to destroy the tanks.
SCRIPT_CLEARBUILDING: Clear the building with the Machine Guns in it.
SCRIPT_GLOWING_MARKER: Look for the glowing marker on the German anti-aircraft vehicle.
SCRIPT_HINT_PICKUPAMMOKEY: To pickup ammo from another weapon, walk close to it or look at it and press USE^3 &&1^7.
SCRIPT_HINT_CANT_OPEN_DOORS: This door cannot be opened. You never need to try to open closed doors.
SCRIPT_OBJ_FOLEYDEBRIEF: Debrief with Captain Foley at the crossroads.
SCRIPT_HINT_OBJECTIVEONCOMPASS: The star on your compass marks your next objective
SCRIPT_MISSIONFAIL_CIVILIAN_KILLED: You killed a civilian. Watch your fire!
SCRIPT_MISSIONFAIL_KILLTEAM_AMERICAN: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
SCRIPT_MISSIONFAIL_KILLTEAM_BRITISH: Friendly fire will not be tolerated!
SCRIPT_HINT_PLANT_EMP: Press ^3[{+activate}]^7 to plant the EMP Device
DEADQUOTE_SDF00: “We do not mourn the dead, we arm the living.” -Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF63: “People mustn’t think, they must follow.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF60: “All Earthen shall submit to unconditional obedience without exception.”  -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF59: “No mother, father or child shall be spared our siege.” Admiral Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF58: “Earth will not be permitted to maintain industry, sustain economy, or enable itself to rearm.” - Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF57: “Our world is beginning- theirs is dying.” - Admiral Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF56: To the SDF, the color blue is associated with evil.
DEADQUOTE_SDF55: The SDF secret oath begins and ends with the words “Death to the blue world.”
DEADQUOTE_SDF54: The SDF has an elite propaganda division called “The Veritas.”
DEADQUOTE_SDF53: The “Settlement Defense Front” chose its name to give the appearance of a noble underdog.
DEADQUOTE_SDF52: “The only invincible army on Earth will be the SDF.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF51: “We will force the Earth to braid the ropes from which they hang.” - Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF50: Admiral Kotch is the original orator of The Front’s infamous motto, “Death is no disgrace.”
DEADQUOTE_SDF49: Salen Kotch climbed to the summit of Mars’ 22,000 meter shield Volcano Olympus Mons that became the namesake of his warship.
DEADQUOTE_SDF48: The Olympus Mons is the largest battle class warship ever built.
DEADQUOTE_SDF47: Salen Kotch was a proponent for the construction of the supercarrier Olympus Mons.
DEADQUOTE_SDF46: Salen Kotch was the youngest recipient ever of The Front’s Iron Sword for loyalty.
DEADQUOTE_SDF45: “We love death. The Earth loves life.”  -Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF44: SDF cadets are assigned to off-world territories to assist in the deportation of Earth born personnel.
DEADQUOTE_SDF43: “Harboring the enemy results in three generations of punishment.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF42: SDF Council members are “elected” for life.
DEADQUOTE_SDF41: “Hiding or protecting the Earth born is punishable by death.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF40: Items from Earth are considered contraband in SDF territory.
DEADQUOTE_SDF39: SDF does not allow its citizens to “own” anything.
DEADQUOTE_SDF38: Earth history is not taught to SDF children.
DEADQUOTE_SDF37: Gun possession is mandatory in SDF controlled territory.
DEADQUOTE_SDF36: Earth based broadcasts are not permitted in SDF controlled territory.
DEADQUOTE_SDF35: SDF backed pirates steal cargo bound for Earth.
DEADQUOTE_SDF34: The SDF ranks citizens by loyalty to the regime.
DEADQUOTE_SDF33: For the SDF, it is the year 31, counted after the secession.
DEADQUOTE_SDF32: “The Earth has outstayed its welcome.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF31: “The function of a citizen and a soldier are one.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF30: “The SDF state is the only lasting absolute in the solar system.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF29: “Freedom is a fundamental Earth born flaw.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF28: “Let us use dagger, bullet and bomb to prove the victor.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF27: “Freedom has no place in the light of our sun.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF26: “The torch of war will burn until the Earth falls once and for all.”  -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF25: “The Earth born impede the progress of the SDF doctrine.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF24: “Those who want to live must wage war, and those who do not want war don’t deserve to live.” - Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF23: “The days of individual happiness have passed away.” -  SDF proverb
DEADQUOTE_SDF22: “Mars control of the Earth is the only measure of right and wrong.” -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF21: “It is weak to defend, but strong to attack.” - Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF19: “Freedom is a mark of stupidity and cowardice. “ -The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF18: “Any regime without the intention to wage war is senseless and useless.” - Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF17: “SDF activities must focus on bringing about the end of the free Earth.” - The SDF High Council
DEADQUOTE_SDF16: “An SDF state on Earth involves purifying the planet of anyone who resists Front rule.” - Salen Kotch
DEADQUOTE_SDF15: The Settlement Defense Front seeks to destroy all signs of Earth history in their new world.
DEADQUOTE_SDF14: Early SDF members sold idols looted from historical sites in the Solar system to fund their war effort.
DEADQUOTE_SDF13: 15 years of Military service is mandatory for all SDF males starting at age 12.
DEADQUOTE_SDF12: Per capita, The Settlement Defense Front has 900% more soldiers than the UNSA.
DEADQUOTE_SDF11: The SDF plans to establish a “museum of an extinct race,” full of Earthen “souvenirs.”
DEADQUOTE_SDF10: SDF commanders collect photos of massacred Earth born civilians.
DEADQUOTE_SDF09: Settlement Defense Front offers asylum to convicted war criminals.
DEADQUOTE_SDF08: SetDef doctrine deems Earth bloodlines a “contaminated malignancy.”
DEADQUOTE_SDF07: The Earth born have no rights on Mars.
DEADQUOTE_SDF06: The SetDef authority maintains a 4 to 1 male to female procreation policy.
DEADQUOTE_SDF05: SDF soldiers use an experimental drug that allows fighters to march 55 miles (88.5 kilometers) without fatigue.
DEADQUOTE_SDF04: The Secession Wars were initiated by the SDF to withdraw from the UNSA 30 years ago.
DEADQUOTE_SDF03: SetDef radicals used terrorism to extend their influence across moons, planets and asteroids.
DEADQUOTE_SDF02: The SDF was formed decades ago to enforce martial law on off world territories.
DEADQUOTE_SDF01: The Settlement Defense Front operates forced work camps throughout the Solar System.
DEADQUOTE_SDF: The Settlement Defense Front (SDF) brainwashes their society with propaganda, seeking subjugation of the Earth's population.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEHAVEACCESSTOANSDFT: ^2Reyes: ^7We have access to an SDF transponder. It was planted in the operative who took out the AATIS in Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEHAVEINTELTHEENEMYI: ^2Admiral Coupe: ^7We have intel the enemy is planning a surge. Time frame is unknonw but I need you back out there right away.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEJUSTNEEDSDFTOTHINK: ^2Salter: ^7We just need SDF to think they are. They’ll be caught off guard. AATIS will engage their fleet.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLASTHISLETTERWILL: ^2MaCallum: ^7Well, as this letter will only be used in the event of my death, it may seem somewhat sorrowful, but I don’t want you to see it that way, okay? I have always felt that our stay on Earth, the time we call “life”, it's a temporary gift to be spent in service of something greater than ourselves. Death comes to us all. It is not to be feared.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLBAILOUTOVERTHEPO: ^2Reyes: ^7We’ll bail out over the port side bow and zero-g to the bridge.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLGOWITHOUTITTHATS: ^2Omar: ^7We'll go without it. That's how we do things in the infantry, Lieutenant.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLHAVETOFIGHTOURWA: ^2Brooks: ^7We'll have to fight our way on.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLIGUESSILLSEEYOUB: ^2Salter: ^7Well, I guess I'll see you both in hell.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLUSETHEIROWNSHIPA: ^2Reyes: ^7We'll use their own ship against them and launch a full assault from the Olympus bridge.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELURETHEOLYMPUSTOGE: ^2Reyes: ^7We lure the Olympus to Geneva, and take it out.
VIDSUBTITLES_WENEEDTOACTONTHISINT: ^2Raines: ^7We need to act on this intel, Captain.
VIDSUBTITLES_WERECEIVEDANEMERGENC: ^2Gator: ^7We received an emergency OPREP captain, what's your ETA?
VIDSUBTITLES_WEREGOINDOWNTHERESEA: ^2Reyes: ^7We’re goin’ down there. Search and rescue.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEREGONNATURNTHETABL: ^2Reyes: ^7We’re gonna turn the tables. Set up an ambush of our own back home.
VIDSUBTITLES_WESHOULDCONTACTADMIR: ^2Gator: ^7We should contact Admiral Raines now, Commander.
VIDSUBTITLES_WESHOULDFINDAPLACETO: ^2Reyes: ^7We should find a place to land.
VIDSUBTITLES_WESHOULDNTHAVEBEENDO: ^2Salter: ^7We shouldn't have been down there in the first place…
VIDSUBTITLES_WESTAYTRENCHEDINHERE: ^2Salter: ^7We stay trenched in down here, we're sitting ducks.
VIDSUBTITLES_WETAKERETOUTOFTHEEQU: ^2Reyes: ^7We take Ret out of the equation. She’s seen enough.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEVEGOTLIMITEDBOOTSA: ^2Reyes: ^7We've got limited boots and guns. Lieutenant Salter and I will deploy with you.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEVESUFFEREDUNTHINKA: ^2Raines: ^7We’ve suffered unthinkable casualties today. Captain Alder, Captain Ferran-
VIDSUBTITLES_WEWERESETUPONVESTATH: ^2Salter: ^7We were set up on Vesta. They knew the Tigris or Ret would respond.
VIDSUBTITLES_WEWILLREPORTTHELATES: ^2Reporter: ^7We will report the latest developments as details become available.
VIDSUBTITLES_WHATDIDYOUGETONTHERE: ^2Reyes: ^7What did you get on the report?
VIDSUBTITLES_WHATDOYOUNEEDFROMMEL: ^2Ferran: ^7What do you need from me, Lieutenant?
VIDSUBTITLES_WHATSOURPLANOFATTACK: ^2Brooks: ^7What’s our plan of attack when we get to the top?
VIDSUBTITLES_WHOLEFLEETHEREINGENE: ^2Salter: ^7Whole fleet here in Geneva, doesn't seem right.
VIDSUBTITLES_WILDEASTNINTHCENTURY: ^2Griff: ^7Wild East. Ninth century China, Tang dynasty. Invention of gunpowder. That’s where I belong.
VIDSUBTITLES_WITHALLTHELOVEINMYHE: ^2MaCallum: ^7With all the love in my heart, Mom.
VIDSUBTITLES_WOULDYOUHAVELEFTMEOU: ^2Reyes: ^7Would you have left me out there?
VIDSUBTITLES_YEAHSILVERLININGAROU: ^2Omar: ^7Yeah. Silver lining around that reticle is SetDef didn't ask permission then, and we're not asking permission now.
VIDSUBTITLES_YEAHWELLJUSTREMEMBER: ^2Gator: ^7Yeah, well, just remember, I control the well deck from up here. Those plasmaspheric winds get awful tough if you’re ‘inadvertently’ locked out.
VIDSUBTITLES_YESMAAMIVELOCATEDONE: ^2Ethan: ^7Yes, ma'am. I've located one with drop capabilities.
VIDSUBTITLES_YESSIRWHOELSEKNOWSAB: ^2Reyes: ^7Yes, sir. Who else knows about this?
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUCHANGEDTHECOURSEO: ^2Admiral Coupe: ^7You changed the course of the war, Commander Reyes. Because of you, our fleet's back online. STRATCOM is very proud of your actions.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUFAMILIARWITHTHEAI: ^2Salter: ^7You familiar with the air intercept systems, Ethan?
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUGOTSOMESHOESTOFIL: ^2Omar: ^7You got some shoes to fill now, Captain.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUGOTTHEGREENLIGHTT: ^2Reyes: ^7You got the green light to do whatever it takes. Just finish the mission.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOULLHAVEWHATYOUNEED: ^2Omar: ^7You'll have what you need from me, Lieutenant.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOULLLANDATRANSPORTO: ^2Raines: ^7You’ll land a transport outside their patrol perimeter with Marines to scout an LZ for reinforcements. Once those troops are on the surface, you'll take out their main fueling tower.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOULLNEVERMAKEITBACK: ^2Salter: ^7You'll never make it back to the ship. If we wait, they'll fire on us.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOURCREWISWAITINGFOR: ^2Salter: ^7Your crew is waiting for you, Captain.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUREGOINGTOWANTANEN: ^2Griff: ^7You're going to want an energy weapon, then. Makes quick work of those SetDef bots.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUREJUSTAMANFROMEAR: ^2Riah: ^7You're just a man from Earth, dying for a lost cause.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUREMACHONEATSEVENH: ^2Griff: ^7Now you're Mach One at seven hundred meters.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOURENEEDEDONTHEBRID: ^2Gator: ^7You're needed on the bridge ASAP, sir.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUREONASHUTTLEFROMM: ^2Ferran: ^7You're on a shuttle from my vessel Tigris. I'm taking you back to Retribution.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOURESERGEANTNOWYOUR: ^2Reyes: ^7You're Sergeant now. You're the commander of the Marines on this ship.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOURMENAREWAITINGFOR: ^2Salter: ^7Your men are waiting for you, Sergeant. Get'em set. Stand by for orders.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUTHINKTHEYLLCANCEL: ^2Reyes: ^7You think they’ll cancel the fleet week festivities?
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUWEREALWAYSAFASTLE: ^2Raines: ^7You were always a fast learner, Lieutenant.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUWILLNOTTAKEMYCARR: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7You will not take my carrier, Captain Reyes! We will all die here. I will detonate this vessel and level your city.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEIRCITIESWILLBURN: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7Their cities will burn along with the pages of their history.
VIDSUBTITLES_OURWORLDISJUSTBEGIN: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7Our world is just beginning. Theirs is dying!
VIDSUBTITLES_ITISNOTENOUGHTOBREAK: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7It is not enough to break free. We will break them!
VIDSUBTITLES_WARLORDTHISISSCAR1: ^2Wolf: ^7Warlord this is SCAR-1. Standing by for tasking.
VIDSUBTITLES_ONEOFOURWEAPONSFACI: ^2Warlord: ^7One of our weapons facilities is under attack by the SDF. We believe this is part of an operation, codenamed: RIAH.
VIDSUBTITLES_INTELSUGGESTSTHEIRTAR: ^2Warlord: ^7Intel suggests their target is a prototype weapon. Your team will extract the prototype and torch the site before SDF can locate it.
VIDSUBTITLES_CONTINUINGCOVERAGE: ^2Reporter: ^7Continuing coverage following today’s horrific attack on Geneva.
VIDSUBTITLES_REPORTSARENOWCOMINGIN: ^2Reporter: ^7Reports are now coming in about a targeted strike by SATO forces on a secret SetDef leadership conference.
VIDSUBTITLES_ACCORDINGTOSOURCES: ^2Reporter: ^7According to sources, high-ranking SetDef officials were targeted and eliminated by an elite SCAR team.
VIDSUBTITLES_INRELATEDNEWSSETDEF: ^2Reporter: ^7In related news, SetDef fleet movements continue to impede the flow of off-world resources back to earth. Without those resources, chances severely dwindle for damaged SATO warships to be repaired.
VIDSUBTITLES_FORIWNEW5: ^2Reporter: ^7For IW News, this is Gerome Davies.
VIDSUBTITLES_JUSTMOMENTSAGOUNSA: ^2Reporter: ^7Just moments ago, UNSA forces along with the Navy’s elite SATO teams launched a surprise offensive near the Uranian moon, Miranda.
VIDSUBTITLES_OURSOURCESTELLUSTHE: ^2Reporter: ^7Our sources tell us the target was a Settlement Defense Front ship harboring some kind of prototype technology. After a brief skirmish, SATO forces were able to board the vessel and apprehend that prototype.
VIDSUBTITLES_ANOFFICIALUNSAANNOU: ^2Reporter: ^7An official UNSA announcement is expected shortly, but this is already being hailed as a critical blow to the SetDef’s offensive capabilities.
VIDSUBTITLES_BEADVISEDIWILLBE: ^2Salter: ^7Be advised, I will be recording my interview with you as well so, watch your a…tread accordingly, Lieutenant.
VIDSUBTITLES_LETSTALKALITTLE: ^2Reyes: ^7Let's talk a little about your disciplinary record.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUHADSOMEISSUES: ^2Reyes: ^7You had some issues with Major Kenny...
VIDSUBTITLES_MAJORKENNYWASAMAJOR: ^2Salter: ^7Major Kenny was a major blow hard, and he was full of shit, and his wife was a stuck up broom rider.
VIDSUBTITLES_AHMANIMGOINGTOHAVE: ^2Reyes: ^7Ah, man. I'm going to have to edit this.
VIDSUBTITLES_WELLTOKEEPTHINGSCOP: ^2Reyes: ^7Well, to keep things copacetic, just tell the ‘snake shit’ story.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUAREGOINGTOHAVETO: ^2Salter: ^7You are going to have to edit this.
VIDSUBTITLES_SOIHEARTHISGUYINABAR: ^2Salter: ^7So, I overhear this guy in a bar talking about having the record for flying low, says he can fly under snake shit, so I chime in...
VIDSUBTITLES_ANDITELLHIMYOUCAN: ^2Salter: ^7And I tell him you can only tie the record for flying low.
VIDSUBTITLES_RIGHTBECAUSEEVENT: ^2Reyes: ^7Right, 'cause eventually you’re just landing or crashing.
VIDSUBTITLES_BINGOSOISEETHEGUY: ^2Salter: ^7Bingo. So I see the guy the next morning on the way out to the transport, and I say “good morning snake shit”, and he says, “that’s Major snake shit, Lieutenant Salter”.
VIDSUBTITLES_ONEINTHESAME: ^2Salter: ^7One in the same. We never got back on track after that.
VIDSUBTITLES_YOUBUZZEDHISHOUSE: ^2Reyes: ^7You buzzed his house in San Anselmo while his wife was hosting the officers wive’s club formal in the backyard, Salt.
VIDSUBTITLES_IWASDOINGALITTLELOW: ^2Salter: ^7I was doing a little low flying myself. Apparently it made quite a mess.
VIDSUBTITLES_SEVERALTIMESBUTWHEN: ^2Salter: ^7Several times. But, when the major retired he signed the petition for my Distinguished Flying Cross so, hey, I guess he got over it.
VIDSUBTITLES_DESPITETHESUCCESSR: ^2Reporter: ^7Despite the success, reports indicate that the chemical agent was not completely contained.
VIDSUBTITLES_THEHEALTHORGANIZATION: ^2Reporter: ^7The Health Organization announced that relief efforts for off-world colonies are underway.
VIDSUBTITLES_OUREXPERTSTELLUS: ^2Reporter: ^7Our experts tell us that the vacuum of space should render the compound inert, but without the exact makeup of the agent, they cannot say this with complete certainty.
VIDSUBTITLES_THESUNTHEMOONANDTHE: ^7"The sun, the moon and the stars would have disappeared long ago..."
VIDSUBTITLES_HADTHEYHAPPENED: "Had they happened to be in the reach of predatory human hands."
VIDSUBTITLES_TODAYTHEFRONTEM: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7Today, the Front embarks on a conquest.
VIDSUBTITLES_HEREANDNOWWE: ^1Admiral Kotch: ^7Here and now, we will eradicate the authority and influence of the Earth!
FLUFF_MESSAGES_CAPOPS_BODY: New updates available at your computer sir
FLUFF_MESSAGES_NEWS_BODY: A news reel is available for viewing in the Ward Room.
FLUFF_MESSAGES_SDF1_BODY: New cards available on wanted board.
FLUFF_MESSAGES_ENERGY_WEAPON_BODY: Energy weapons are effective against bots.
FLUFF_MESSAGES_NEW_SCAN_BODY: Weapon info added to armory printer.

WEAPON_HELP_FMG_AKIMBO: Hold ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 to transition into akimbo machine pistols.
WEAPON_HELP_FMG_AR: Hold ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 to transition back into Assault Rifle mode.
WEAPON_HELP_RIPPER_SMG: Hold ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 to transition into SMG mode.
WEAPON_HELP_RIPPER_AR: Hold ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 to transition back into Assault Rifle mode.
WEAPON_HELP_ERAD_SHOTGUN: Hold ^3[{+weapnext}]^7 to use the ERAD's undermount shotgun.
WEAPON_HELP_M8_AR_DPAD: Press ^3[{+actionslot 2}]^7 to transition into Assault Rifle mode.
WEAPON_HELP_M8_SNIPER_DPAD: Press ^3[{+actionslot 2}]^7 to transition back into Sniper mode.
WEAPON_HELP_FMG_AR_DPAD: Press ^3[{+actionslot 2}]^7 to transition back into Assault Rifle mode.
WEAPON_HELP_RIPPER_SMG_DPAD: Press ^3[{+actionslot 2}]^7 to transition into SMG mode.
WEAPON_HELP_RIPPER_AR_DPAD: Press ^3[{+actionslot 2}]^7 to transition back into Assault Rifle mode.

WEAPON_HELP_EXTRA_EQUIPMENT_LETHAL: Press ^3[{+actionslot 4}]^7 to swap to your stored lethal equipment.
WEAPON_HELP_EXTRA_EQUIPMENT: Press ^3[{+actionslot 3}]^7 or ^3[{+actionslot 4}]^7 to use your stored equipment.
